title: Talkin: Global Friends & Chat
description:
Talkin is a global multilingual community where voices from different countries and cultural backgrounds meet in real time.

Here, you can meet native speakers of English, Japanese, Korean, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Arabic, Thai, Vietnamese, Chinese, Portuguese, and 180+ other languages.
Through chat, voice calls, voice parties, global posts, and smart matching, Talkin helps you cross cultures and start making friends in the most natural way—true social experiences that connect real people.

Why choose Talkin?

• Global Moments – Discover Real Lives Worldwide
Explore real posts and short videos from people across the globe — their food, travels, landscapes, daily life, and unique moments. You can like, comment, join discussions, or share your own stories.
Talkin’s Global Moments is a multilingual social plaza that lets you experience "global travel" and expand your international friendships from home.

• Voice Party – Real-time multi-person Voice Connection
Want to talk freely without pressure?
Talkin’s voice party lets you join lively global rooms anytime and interact with people from different cultures in real time—whether you're chatting about daily life, discussing culture, singing, sharing stories, or simply getting to know a stranger who might become your next chat friend.
The voice-only space feels natural: no camera, no stress, just voices that create real connections. Real-time subtitles and free translation help everyone participate effortlessly, no matter your language.

• Smart Matching System & Free AI Translation
Looking for someone to talk to or simply curious about different cultures?
Talkin’s smart matching pairs you with partners who share similar interests, personality traits, or social preferences, allowing you to instantly connect with people from all over the world for deep one-on-one conversations and helping you build more natural, deeper, and personalized global friendships.
Whether you’re finding people from the U.S., Japan, Korea, the Middle East, Europe, or Southeast Asia, Talkin makes every interaction smooth and meaningful—like a digital handshake with the world.
Free built-in translation keeps communication seamless for everyone.

• Global Cultural Exchange & Gift Interactions
Share your stories, explore different cultures, and send country-themed gifts that make every chat more expressive. With Talkin’s unique global gift system, cross-cultural exchange becomes fun, engaging, and full of emotional connection.


Join Talkin now to experience a new way of connecting across languages and cultures, and say Hello to the world. Here, there is no distance and no cultural walls, only real, relaxed, and diverse global social experiences.

Whether you are a student, an office worker, or someone who simply loves multilingual and cross-cultural communication, Talkin is your best choice. Meet real people worldwide, share cultures, and enjoy authentic conversations beyond language barriers.

Download now to start your global social journey and meet new friends from all over the world!

title: Vocabulary Builder - Test Prep
description: ★ Over 5 MILLION students have used Magoosh to improve their GRE vocab! ★ Build your vocabulary with Magoosh's free GRE vocabulary game for your Android device. Quiz yourself every day to learn the 1200 most important words on the GRE test! Our app helps you improve your vocab and prep for the GRE test – now you can practice and improve your vocabulary anywhere, any time! Why students LOVE our app… ✓ 1200 GRE vocab words picked by an expert tutor ✓ Audio pronunciation for each of the words in the app ✓ Definitions and example sentences for every word ✓ Basic, Intermediate, and Advanced vocabulary sections ✓ Beat levels to unlock new words ✓ Track your progress as you study This app gives you free access to all of Magoosh’s general, GRE, SAT, and TOEFL vocab quizzes. Sign in with a Magoosh account (or create a new one) to save your progress to the web. Created by experts The entire wordlist is selected and defined with usage examples by Magoosh’s expert tutors, led by Chris Lele. He has been teaching the GRE for more than 10 years, runs a popular vocabulary series on YouTube and he’s also written an eBook on vocabulary. He is unbeatable in Scrabble, or any other word game for that matter. Designed for fun and learning that really sticks Each level you beat unlocks a harder one: more words and more advanced vocabulary. Words you don't know will be repeated until you master them, using spaced repetition which has been shown to be a very effective memorization strategy. About Magoosh We're an online test prep company with a focus on teaching the GRE, GMAT, ACT, SAT, TOEFL, and IELTS through videos and personalized customer support. In addition to our online course, we blog about words, roots, formulas, grammar, problem solving, quantitative reasoning, and reading comprehension along with study guides and study tips. Articles from the blog have been compiled into 3 separate free ebooks with over 6,000 downloads. Have any questions? Please ask! Customer satisfaction is incredibly important to us. If you have any questions or comments, please send us an email at help@magoosh.com. Build your vocab & practice for the GRE test – download GRE Vocabulary Builder free!

title: Learn Japanese. Speak Japanese
description: Speak Japanese faster than you ever imagined with Mondly’s proprietary ILA-method. How? The secret is to make it simple. Have you ever heard a song in the radio which had you bopping your head and wanting to sing along? The first step of learning Japanese is pretty similar. You listen to the sound of native Japanese speakers and repeat some of their words. Mondly’s state-of-the-art speech recognition shows you how well you already speak and where you can improve. It’s fun and doesn’t even feel like learning. Especially because Mondly by Pearson uses your mother language so you never get lost in translation. The second step is even easier. Take a break. Your lesson is never more than 9 minutes long and here is why: Your brain needs a rest to store the new information. And while you’re busy with your life, Japanese words and sentences get anchored in your long-term memory. The result: You find yourself effortlessly knowing what to say and when. Don’t worry about the exact timing. Mondly by Pearson gives you control over the entire process. You receive friendly reminders exactly when your brain is set for the next dose of knowledge. The third step is all about you. Because now you’re ready to create your own phrases and adding your individual touch and personality back into the conversation. And when you want to practice, Mondly’s interactive chat-bot becomes your pocket tutor. There are over 40 practical, real-life situations which take you to the restaurant, shopping, exploring the city and many more. But that’s not the only reason why Mondly by Pearson gives you the confidence to speak Japanese. Because the HandsFree mode lets you practice without looking at the screen. Just connect your headphones and you’re in Paris, chatting away with the locals. Need a quick boost of motivation? Check your progress with the advanced statistics and intelligent reporting. It shows you how far you have come in your journey to master the 5,000 words and phrases Mondly by Pearson offers you. We all learn in different ways so here are some of the other highlights Mondly by Pearson offers: • Well-structured grammar drills which integrate seamlessly into the content of the lessons • Verb conjugations to show you the underlining structure and further boost your confidence • Reading and writing games to complete your skills and give you full independence So what does the ILA-Method stand for? It’s Immersive Language Acquisition and it means with Mondly by Pearson you pick up Japanese in the most natural way possible. But don’t trust the over 100 million users who have given the app a 4.7/5.0 rating. Here’s what the press had to say: » “The new and sexier way to learn languages” - Huffington Post » “Closest thing to actual immersion” - TNW » “A practical approach to language learning likely to be widely adopted.” - Forbes » “The new way to learn languages” - Inc.com Join the revolution and speak Japanese now! There’s a new free lesson every day and no ads.

title: SiriusXM: Music, Sports & News
description:
Expand your listening universe with SiriusXM. Explore live radio, ad-free music, podcasts, news, sports, comedy, and more. Get closer to your favorite stars with music and entertainment tailored just for you.

Turn on the holidays and soundtrack your season. Stream your favorite festive tunes with over two dozen holiday music channels, exclusively on SiriusXM. Enjoy Holiday Traditions, Radio Hanukkah, Country Christmas, Jimmy Fallon’s Holiday Seasoning Radio, and more.

Listen to seasonal soundtracks, festive mixes, and celebrity-hosted countdowns featuring big names and bright stars. Whether you're driving home for the holidays, hosting celebrations, or simply getting into the spirit of the season, celebrate with SiriusXM.

Stream live pro and college play-by-play, including NFL, NBA, & NHL®. Catch the latest college football matchups with broadcasts from the country’s top conferences. From live games to in-depth analysis, SiriusXM is the ultimate destination for sports fans.

Explore expertly curated entertainment with SiriusXM — the ultimate ad-free music, podcast, and radio app.

SiriusXM Features*

Online Music Streaming
- Unlock exclusive artist stations — The Beatles, Bruce Springsteen, Carrie Underwood, Dave Matthews Band, Diplo, Disney Hits, Eminem, Eric Church, John Mayer, Kenny Chesney, LL COOL J, Metallica, Pearl Jam, Red Hot Chili Peppers, Shaggy, Smokey Robinson, Steve Aoki, U2, & more
- Listen to Christmas music stations and holiday radio all season long

Live Sports Radio & Analysis
- Stream play-by-play of every major professional sport PLUS expert talk & analysis — NFL, MLB®, NBA, NHL®, the PGA TOUR®, & NASCAR®. Stay up-to-date with live scores in the app.
- Tune in to top NCAA® conferences — ACC, SEC, Big 12, Big Ten, & more
- ESPN Radio, NBC Sports Radio, FOX Sports, & Infinity Sports Network in just a few taps
- Listen to sports talk radio for news, fantasy sports analysis, & more

News, Podcasts, Talk Shows, & Comedy
- Hear live news radio & political talk from all angles — FOX News, CNN, MS NOW, BBC World Service, FOX Business, CNBC, Bloomberg Radio, C-SPAN, NPR Now, & more
- Listen to Howard Stern on two exclusive channels*
- Stream unscripted talk radio with A-list hosts — Andy Cohen, Conan O’Brien, & TODAY Show Radio
- Laugh along to exclusive comedy — Kevin Hart’s LOL Radio, Netflix Is A Joke Radio, & Comedy Central Radio

Discover & Save More of What You Love
- Expand your listening with personalized recommendations
- Explore dedicated pages for teams, genres, bands, channels, & more
- Save & organize your favorite radio stations, artists, & content in Your Library
- Get alerts when your shows or game-day programs go live
- Browse SiriusXM music and audio on our channel guide

Streaming Made For You
- Stay connected to the SiriusXM app on the road via Android Auto
- Listen everywhere on your favorite smart speaker or app-enabled device
- Cast from your phone or tablet for seamless listening on your TV, soundbar, or speaker

*Some programming includes explicit language.
All features and content vary by plan and are subject to change.

SUBSCRIPTION OFFER DETAILS: Upon purchase of any plan, your subscription will AUTOMATICALLY RENEW and you will be charged (after any free trial) the rate + applicable tax on a recurring monthly basis until you cancel. Cancel at least 24-hours before any renewal date in your account to avoid future charges. No refunds or credits, unless permitted by your billing platform. Promotional offers are for new subscribers only. All fees, content, and features may change. The SiriusXM app is made available to you by Sirius XM Radio Inc. Use of the SiriusXM app is limited to the United States and certain U.S. territories and is subject to the SiriusXM Customer Agreement at siriusxm.com/customeragreement. Some restrictions apply. Data charges may apply.

Privacy Policy: siriusxm.com/privacy
Your Privacy Choices: siriusxm.com/yourprivacychoices

title: Rosetta Stone: Learn Languages
description: Why the Rosetta Stone app? Because the best way to learn a new language is to surround yourself with it, and our language learning app does just that. Rosetta Stone’s Dynamic Immersion® method uses interactive and contextual language lessons blended with Extended Learning features. Everything you need is literally at your fingertips–any time, anywhere, any device; online or off and completely ad-free. RECENT AWARDS • 2019 PCMag Editors’ Choice • 2019 Tabby Awards Winner • 2019 Best Mobile App Awards: Best Designed App and Best Overall App For the first time, we’re offering every one of our languages under one subscription. Flip between languages as often as you’d like and enjoy the freedom to get seriously curious. To access all languages, simply select Unlimited Languages when you subscribe. Practice and learn to speak Spanish, French, German, Italian, English, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Arabic, Portuguese, Russian, Dutch, Filipino, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Irish, Persian, Polish, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese, and more! Rosetta Stone helps you speak confidently. With a variety of speaking-focused lessons and features, instantaneous pronunciation feedback with TruAccent, a track record of getting people speaking any language confidently and a near-five star rating in the app store, the award-winning Rosetta Stone mobile app is the best way to learn and speak new languages. What you want to learn, first. Let us know why you're learning a new language and we'll create a game plan with curated content and helpful lesson reminders to help you stay on track in your learning journey**. Fits any schedule. Take a 10-minute lesson anywhere, study online or off. Never leaves your side. Practice languages here, there, and everywhere. Learn to speak English, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese or any language you want. Don’t get lost in translation. Touch and hold anything from your Core Lessons to reveal its translation*. Speak confidently. TruAccent® technology provides real-time pronunciation feedback and helps you speak confidently. Go beyond memorization. Learn in context using our Dynamic Immersion® method. Extended Language Learning Features Say it like a local. Improve pronunciation and practice speaking by reading aloud while listening to native speakers with stories and useful conversations. Always know what to say. Get easy-to-understand greetings, phrases, expressions, daily conversations and more with Phrasebook*. Train your ear. Take a break from the screen by listening to Audio Companion® lessons. Select a language learning subscription: Choose from 3 and 12-month subscriptions—as well as a Lifetime option. No translators, grammar books or dictionary needed! Available Languages: Spanish (Latin American or Spain) French German Italian English (American or British) Japanese Korean Chinese (Mandarin) Arabic Portuguese (Brazil) Russian Dutch Filipino (Tagalog) Greek Hebrew Hindi Irish Persian (Farsi) Polish Swedish Turkish Vietnamese Enterprise and Education Learners Unlimited use of Rosetta Stone's mobile app is available for existing Enterprise and Education Learners. Features may vary for Enterprise and Education Learners. *Available with select languages on the Rosetta Stone: Learn Languages app. **Your Plan languages offered for Android are English, French, Italian, German, and Spanish.

title: Pocket FM: Audio Series
description:
Pocket FM is an audio series platform pioneering audio entertainment with millions of listeners worldwide. It features various audio series in multiple genres: romance, horror, thriller, and drama. It has an extensive library of audio series delivering whole new entertainment experiences for audiobook and podcast lovers.

Pocket FM enriches millions of listeners with the best entertainment experience with its audio series, delivered by its large creator community, including the best authors, storytellers, voice-over artists and writers. The app has a vast content library for everyday entertainment, with stories ranging from romance, drama, fantasy, thriller, horror and more.

Pocket FM has a library with more than 100,000 hours of content, introducing a new binge factor with non-stop entertainment. Listeners spend an average of over 110 minutes daily on the platform, binge-ing new episodes of their favorite stories from a diverse range of titles in the library. 

The genres include - 

Romance
Horror
Thriller
Drama
Fantasy & Sci-fi


With Pocket FM, you can listen to your favorite audio series anytime, anywhere. The user-friendly interface makes browsing and searching for audio series easy, and its built-in player allows you to listen to them with just a tap. Our offline listening feature lets you download episodes and listen without an internet connection. And with adjustable playback speed, you can listen at the pace that's most comfortable for you.

We have replaced screen boredom and fatigue with audio series that can be consumed 24x7. With the unique storytelling, Pocket FM has introduced a new entertainment format that can be consumed while commuting, driving, at the gym, cooking, at bedtime or even while working, whenever your ears are free. 

Every click on Pocket FM brings entertainment with fresh and new stories. So, stop getting bored with repetitive music numbers or the same old audiobooks and podcasts and get into the next era of entertainment.

What you'll love about Pocket FM:

1. We keep adding new audio stories and other audio content all the time. You can browse or search your favorite series and listen to them anytime, and anywhere you want from mobile, tablet, desktop, laptop etc
2. Experience listening to your favorite audio series with a fun-loving and active community of listeners
3. Smooth navigation between episodes and chapters and quickly going back and forth by ten seconds in our player, which is specially designed for audio content.
4. The delight of having a great sleep while listening to your favorite audio series with our in-built sleep timer.

Listen to Audio Series on your mobile, tablet, desktop, Chromecast, TV or Wear OS

You get free episodes of your favorite audio series everyday. However, the premium experience has been beautifully designed to elevate your listening experience, without any additional wait time.

Wondering why more and more listeners are opting for our unique micropayment model? Here are the reasons 

1. You don't have to pay for the content you don't want. On Pocket FM, you only pay for the audio content you want to consume. Freedom is in your hand. 
2. No lock-in period. You only pay when you exceed the free episode limit.
3. Zero waiting period for new episodes. Binge-listening is the only way forward.
4. The choice to unlimited download and listen offline
5. Eliminate ads with 'No-ads' pack

Pocket FM is the ultimate entertainment destination that offers a wide range of best-selling audio series to keep you engaged. With our binge-worthy library, you can immerse yourself in the world of storytelling and experience the thrill of unlimited entertainment.

Download Pocket FM today. 
Privacy Policy - https://www.pocketfm.com/privacy-policy 
Terms and conditions - https://www.pocketfm.com/terms-and-conditions 

Love Pocket FM?
Follow us on Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/pocketfm.official/ 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PocketFM_App

title: Hello Ado
description:
Find out important information about puberty, love, pregnancy, HIV, AIDS, COVID-19, and more you might be wondering about. Access a collection of texts that you can also read offline, and videos, audios, and testimonials, by browsing the app or typing a keyword directly in the search bar.

Are you looking for help? a condom ? a pregnancy test? If necessary, easily find health, protection or support services near you or in the location you want.
Data on health, protection and support services are already available for Côte d'Ivoire (Abidjan, Daloa, San Pedro, Yamoussoukro), Cameroon (Douala, Soa and Yaoundé), Mali (Bamako, Sikasso, Ségou), Senegal (Dakar, Kolda, Mbour, Ziguinchor).

The Hello Ado team is constantly working to add new content and complete the list of services.

Do you still have questions that you don't have answers to? So don't hesitate to ask them in the Chat! The questions are completely anonymous, and you will be able to interact with other young people like you and competent facilitators.

If you want to have fun with educational quizzes and situation games on these topics, feel free to install Hello Ado Games!

title: Grammar Checker & Spell Check
description: Our Grammar Checker is your modern-day companion for impeccable writing. You can now improve your writing & communication skills to ensure that your social media posts, blog documents, and emails leave a positive impression on your readers. You can now say goodbye to embarrassing check grammar mistakes and hello to polished and flawless drafts. How to Use Our AI Grammar Checker & Spell Check Application? Here are the steps to easily use our proofreader to check spelling and English grammar errors. 1) Type your text or paste it in the input box of the grammar check app 2) Tap on the "sentence correction" / “Check Spelling” / “Check Grammar” button below the input box 3) Start correction by clicking on the highlighted issues one by one to fix the errors 4) Save the corrected document by downloading the file or copy text from the output box This is how easy it is to use our ai grammar checker and spell check word app. Main Features of Our Grammar Punctuation Checker! Here, we have mentioned some features that make our proofreader better than many overrated apps. Accurate Proofreading: This English grammar checker uses the latest technology to analyze text and catch even the most complicated grammar errors. Whether subject-verb agreement, tense consistency, or punctuation perfection, our app can find and fix all errors. AI Grammar Checker and sentence correction app can help you a lot in your writing process by providing real-time suggestions to improve your overall writing quality. Contextual Corrections: Unlike traditional ai grammar checkers, our grammar check understand context. It analyzes your words' meaning and provides contextually relevant suggestions. This ensures that your writing adheres to grammatical rules and makes sense. Vocabulary Suggestions: You can also improve your language with our app’s vocabulary suggestions. Grammar Checker not only corrects spelling and grammar but also offers suitable synonyms to enhance your word choice. This makes your writing more sophisticated. Sentence Correction Structure Analysis: Our grammar checker app would also assess the flow and structure of your sentences. You would get suggestions to restructure your sentences for improved readability, ensuring that your ideas are expressed in the simplest way possible. Secure and Private: We prioritize your privacy. Our English grammar checker app operates quite securely, ensuring sensitive information stays on your device. Rest assured that your documents and uploaded raw text are safe and secure. Multiple Applications: Whether you're composing an email on your smartphone or drafting a blog article on your tablet, our Grammar Checker is available on different Android devices and can easily be used for multiple purposes. User-Friendly Interface: Our grammar check and spell check applications are extremely easy to use, and this is because we have kept a simple and clean layout. Even a new user without technical experience can use our application like an expert. We have designed and developed this grammar and spell checker app as a writing assistant for content creators, bloggers, social media experts, and marketers of all ages. This application allows users to make detailed spell check and grammar check automatically and find and fix missing punctuations. The app saves a lot of time and effort which are otherwise consumed in manual proofreading. You can download our grammar checker and sentence correction app now and experience the power of an advanced proofreader. You can improve your write-ups and ensure there is no room for grammar mistakes. Note: that the grammar checker may request access to device-type data with your permission. The accessibility permission is used to process the text entered into the app and offer appropriate writing help and corrections. Contact our technical team or leave us a detailed review for any suggestions and feedback.

title: Learn French with flashcards!
description:
ReWord is a highly effective foreign language learning app. It is your best tool to learn French and improve your vocabulary. Did you know you can learn languages just taking 5-10 minutes a day? With our interval system, your French lessons will reach a new level. And will give you greater results, of course!

As with any other language, French lessons must include learning French grammar and memorizing new French words. However, one of the problems with foreign language learning is you can’t achieve good results if you don’t systematize the memorizing.
With ReWord, you get a dedicated system and will memorize new French words without much effort on your part.

Features:
• 5000 words vocabulary. Thousands of French words and phrases divided into thematic categories: choose the category you want to learn this time and change it whenever you want.
• Add your own words and categories easily: you can create your own word base you want to master first.
• Handy French flashcards with pictures and example sentences: helpful mental shortcuts to build your vocabulary and understand the nuances of word meaning and how these words are used in real practice.
• Spaced repetitions really work: ReWord has a science-based approach to memorizing foreign words so you can learn languages at the highest efficiency.
• Tracking your progress: set your daily goal and keep achieving it every day.
• Learn French offline: now it is possible to improve your vocab wherever you go.

Yes, with ReWord, memorizing new words is extremely easy and utterly efficient!

Use the app at least twice a day, with regular breaks every few hours. Start with just five words a day and you will have at least 1,825 new words in your active vocabulary within a year. Increase your daily goal, take more French lessons, and you will accelerate your progress and learn French even faster.
ReWord – your best foreign language learning app! We are here to help you learn languages in a hassle-free way! Start to speak French!

title: Google Classroom
description:
Classroom makes it easy for learners and instructors to connect—inside and outside of schools. Classroom saves time and paper, and makes it easy to create classes, distribute assignments, communicate, and stay organized.

There are many benefits to using Classroom:
• Easy to set up – Teachers can add students directly or share a code with their class to join. It takes just minutes to set up.
• Saves time – The simple, paperless assignment workflow allows teachers to create, review and mark assignments quickly, all in one place.
• Improves organization – Students can see all of their assignments on an assignments page, and all class materials (e.g., documents, photos, and videos) are automatically filed into folders in Google Drive.
• Enhances communication – Classroom allows teachers to send announcements and start class discussions instantly. Students can share resources with each other or provide answers to questions on the stream.
• Secure – Like the rest of Google Workspace for Education services, Classroom contains no ads, never uses your content or student data for advertising purposes.


Permissions Notice:
Camera: Needed to allow the user to take photos or videos and post them to Classroom.
Storage: Needed to allow the user to attach photos, videos, and local files to Classroom. It's also needed to enable offline support.
Accounts: Needed to allow the user to choose which account to use in Classroom.

title: Hello Guadeloupe
description:
Your travel companion to discover the islands of Guadeloupe!
Download the official application of the Islands of Guadeloupe and enjoy a unique experience to prepare and enjoy your stay in this paradise archipelago.

A 100% free application
No need to break the bank to enjoy it! The app is completely free, with no hidden fees. You can explore all its features without any limits.

An interactive map
With this detailed map, never get lost, even on hiking trails or in remote corners. Easily locate your activities, accommodation and restaurants, even without a network.

Complete tourist content
Accommodation: Find that rare gem, whether it’s a comfortable hotel, a villa or a lodge.
Restaurants: Discover the authentic flavors of Creole cuisine thanks to carefully selected addresses.
Activities and events: Diving, excursions, festivals, local markets… the application allows you not to miss anything.
Practical advice: Take advantage of tips for traveling smart, discovering the hidden treasures of the islands and avoiding tourist traps.

Download now and leave with peace of mind!

Look no further: this application is all you need to transform your stay in Guadeloupe into an unforgettable moment. The islands are waiting for you!

title: Learn English Easily
description:
Vocabulary Flashcards: Learning Words and English app: learn to use English for travel, vacation, dating, study, school, and business. 

• English app with flashcards and sentences with examples of using these words. More than 10,000 thousand words.

• The simplest English learning app for mobile phone and tablet.

• 100% free lessons: you can choose and start at the level that suits you best. You can start from scratch, or you can choose the advanced level and start learning the words of the B2-C1 level. Colorful photos, detailed explanation and simple learning using artificial intelligence. It’s suitable for both adults and children. With our English app, you will quickly learn the most frequent English words and travel phrases, right before your holidays. And your friends will be shocked when they see how easy you communicate with locals in English. Proven methodology for learning English without stress. More than 10,000 thousand words. High-quality photo and audio materials! Better than any other app!

Main characteristics and features of the application: 
► 10,000 flashcards with English words and phrases and their translation in your native language
► Accelerated learning method with repetition, based on artificial intelligence
► Beautiful, easy to remember and high-quality photos
► Only high-quality pronunciation. We have both, an American and a British pronunciation.
► Can be used on a mobile phone and on a tablet
► We have all levels. From zero to advanced


What if you compare our English learning app to others?
► 100% Free: there are no restrictions that will force you to buy the paid version of the application. Everything is free.
► Over 10,000 words and related phrases.  Have you learned a new word? Then have a glance on phrases samples how to use this new word. Plus, we made our dictionaries adapted for different needs, you will find words for travel and business and even for dating, if you decided to date someone.
► Adaptive, fast and the easiest way of learning English language. We use a unique technique which will help you to learn new words and phrases without even a single effort from your side.
► Spaced repetition based on the artificial intelligence. This means you can learn English faster.
► Add your own word lists. Do you have your own words that you learn in a language course, university or school? You can add your words to the app from anywhere.
► Track your progress using the app.  You can keep track of your progress and, we have word speed meter. That means, once you start, you will see your studying speed. No other app has word speed meter.

Vocabulary Flashcards: Learning Words and English is suitable for: 
- English learners at: beginner, intermediate and advanced levels;
- students who are preparing for TOIEC, IELTS. etc.;
- those who wish to improve their level.

Working on “Vocabulary cards: learn words and English language” is still in progress, thus your comments and feedback are very important to us. Please comment so we can make the app better for you. We are a team that loves English and always tries to share our love with the community, so if you like this app, please take the time to rate it 5 stars to support us! You can also contact us by commenting or by clicking the "Feedback" button on the settings screen.

Learn Japanese! provides a fast and easy way to learn the Japanese language.

Features include:
- Writing lessons with all Hiragana and Katakana.
- Lessons with Vocabulary and Grammar.
- Spaced repetition review quizzes.
- Easy Show And Quiz style Teaching Method.
- English to Japanese and Japanese to English.
- Easily review previously learned lessons.
- Audio pronunciation.
- Network access not required.

title: Puzzle English
description:
It is an excellent tool to learn English without tutors for those who have basic knowledge of the language.
 
Tasks:
VideoPuzzles and AudioPuzzles — exercises for developing your English listening skills.

Games:
Phrase Master — complete the phrase you hear on the video using the first letter of each word.
Word Miner — make words out of the given letters and learn their meaning.

Words:
Vocabulary Builder — Revise words from your personal dictionary using the SuperMemo algorithm.
Dictionary — Your personal dictionary, to which you can add words when playing games, doing tasks or using Search function.

Learn English with Puzzle English and speak English like a native speaker!

title: Dr French, French grammar
description: Dr French is the ultimate app to learn and review French grammar. In this easy-to-use and intuitive app, the content is organized by topic and level. You will find simple and straight forward lessons with translated examples, as well as exercises to practice what you learn and strengthen your skills. With Dr French, French grammar becomes easy! What is Dr French? • Over 240 lessons and 700 exercises • Content organized by topics and levels • A "Homework" section • Lessons suggested to you according to your skills and your learning pace to ensure a steady progression • A search bar: search for a word or concept you have trouble with • Offline access • Lessons available in French, English and Chinese (simplified and traditional characters) • No advertisement or unwanted notifications • A responsive team Dr French was developed by teachers of French as a foreign language with a view to helping learners from all over the world understand the workings of French grammar. 241 lessons: short and straightforward lessons with over 1000 translated examples, in order to answer ALL your grammar questions. 700 exercises: stimulating exercises to practice what you learn and strengthen your skills, with over 5500 questions. Easy and efficient: the lessons are organized by topic and level. Read the lesson, then do the exercises! Homework: add lessons to your homework and review them when you want. The doctor’s suggestions: to ensure a regular progression, you can ask Dr French to automatically add lessons to your homework, at the frequency and level of your choosing. Offline access: review French grammar anywhere: on the bus, on the tube, at home or between two meetings. A search bar: using the search bar, you can now enter a word or a notion that you are interested in and directly access the relevant lessons. 4 languages: the content of Dr French is available in French, English, Portuguese and Mandarin Chinese (simplified or traditional characters) in order to enable you to understand the explanations regardless of your level. Over 1000 examples have been translated to ensure a perfect understanding of the grammatical issues at hand. No advertisement or unwanted notifications: The developers of Dr French have given priority to a maximal comfort of use and have removed all undesirable stimulation liable to disturb the learning process. Grammar and only grammar: Dr French focuses on French grammar, and not on vocabulary. There are many other apps out there to help you learn and review French vocabulary! A responsive team: if you encounter any problem with the app, our team is here to answer your questions! We do not use pop-ups to get you to rate our app, so if you like Dr French, please come and rate it! Do you want to learn French? Do you want to learn French grammar? With Dr French, French grammar becomes easy!

title: Audacy: Radio & Sports Talk
description:
Listen to music, news, and sports talk, AM & FM radio, and our podcast player, free on the Audacy app.

YOUR FAVORITE LISTENING IN ONE FREE APP
 
SPORTS — The most sports talk and sports radio anywhere and live play-by-play and game-analysis for many NFL, MLB, NBA and NHL teams.*
 
NEWS — Local news radio plus national coverage from CBS News, Fox News and more.

MUSIC — Popular AM & FM radio stations and hosts you know and love, plus on demand radio stations programmed by music lovers.

PODCASTS — Free podcast player with access to millions of episodes plus exclusive Audacy Originals.


ONE PLACE FOR ALL YOUR FAVES

> Save all the listening you love in My Audio.

> Access your favorite FM radio stations, local radio stations, sports radio, our podcast player, and NFL content with one tap.

> Keep clips and episodes for later listening.


LIVE & LOCAL MUSIC

Streaming audio of top FM and AM local radio stations, including V103 (Atlanta), 106.7 KROQ (L.A. and Orange County), 93 XRT (Chicago) and more. On demand stations for every mood, with tracks selected by music lovers, not machines.


SPORTS TALK & PLAY-BY-PLAY

Sports talk from FM radio stations and shows nationwide, including WEEI 93.7 FM (Boston) and WFAN Sports Radio 101.9 FM/66AM). Live play-by-play for many NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL and college football teams* plus league-wide coverage from CBS Sports Radio and sports betting tips from BetQL Network.


YOUR PODCASTS & AUDACY ORIGINALS

All of your favorite podcasts are here, including Dateline NBC, We Can Do Hard Things, Smartless, Search Engine, The Daily,Sports Junkies,  Office Ladies, and more.


MORE NEWS & TALK

Fox News and CBS News, plus local news WWJ Newsradio 950 (Detroit), 1010 Wins (NY), NewsRadio 1120 KMOX (St. Louis) and many more.


AUDACY EN ESPAÑOL

Your Spanish-language live music stations and podcasts, as well as Unanimo Deportes, and on demand music stations for artists like Bad Bunny and Shakira.


Please note: This app features Nielsen’s audience measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, such as Nielsen’s TV Ratings. To learn more about our digital audience measurement products and your choices in regards to them, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information..

*Play-by-play audio only available within designated market area (DMA) for available teams.

To learn more about our privacy and data practices visit: www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

title: Learn English with Hello-Hello
description:
LEARN ENGLISH WITH THE # 1 APP FOR LANGUAGE LEARNING ON PLAY STORE

Top-Selling English course in US, UK, Italy, Spain, France, Germany, Brazil, China, Russia, etc 

Research-based methodology developed in collaboration with the most prestigious institution for language teachers and professionals: The American Council on the Teaching of Foreign Languages – ACTFL 


INNOVATIVE METHODOLOGY: Developed in collaboration with ACTFL - The American Council on the Teaching of Foreign Languages, which is the largest and most respected association for language teachers and professionals. ACTFL's guidelines are followed by all major universities in the USA.

COMMUNICATION SKILLS: Learn to communicate effectively from LESSON 1! Learn English with Hello-Hello  offers 30 conversational lessons based on real life situations rather then a collection of out-of-context words and phrases. Dialogues are presented and then broken down into sentence by sentence where you can practice pronunciation and writing skills

VOCABULARY BUILDING: Practice vocabulary with hundreds of fun and interactive Flashcards plus our innovative Build Your Vocabulary exercise where you can practice alternate words and phrases from within the dialogues

FULL LOCALIZATION: You can see the entire app, including the translations of the lessons and words lists in your native language! You can choose your default language of translation from 12 Foreign Languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Dutch, Indonesian, Hindi and Hungarian, .

NOTES: Save your own notes from within the lessons to review later!

LEARN ANYTIME, ANYWHERE: No Internet required! All the content is stored in the app so that you have great responsiveness when you are ready to learn a language. You do not need to be connected to Wi-Fi or 3G networks to run the app.

BEAUTIFUL INTERFACE: user friendly interface with beautifully designed graphics

CONTACT US: We are constantly trying to improve the app and take feedback from our users very seriously. The app has a “Contact Us” icon so that you can contact us easily, so please do not hesitate and send us an email if you have any questions, comments, complaints or suggestions. 

-- Try before you buy :-) You can check out our content for free first and buy the rest later if you like it. 

ABOUT US

title: Simple Radio: Live AM FM Radio
description: 📻 Simple Radio by Streema is the easiest way to tune in to your favorite FM radio, AM radio & online radio stations. You can access music, news & live sports radio in seconds with our free radio app. 🎧 With over 90,000 stations, you can tune in to the ones you’ve learned to love, or sit back and discover new gems from around the world. Simple Radio combines the benefits of online radio with the simplicity of the radio tuners of yore. 📱 It's really easy to find any global radio station. Search by genre to discover new music e.g. pop radio, rock radio or by category to unearth new stations e.g. news radio, live sports radio. You can also search by country, state or city. 🎙 Listen to your favorite free FM & AM stations including: NPR Radio, BBC Radio, MRN, 77 WABC, La Mega 97.9, KNBR & WNYC. Catch up on news, listen to music or Christian radio & tune in to a huge range of live sports radio stations to catch the latest action from the NFL, MLB, NBA, MLS, NHL, Nascar & more. Simple Radio is the only app you need for… 📣 News 💬 Talk Shows 🎶 Music: Pop, Rock, Hip Hop, Latin, Rap, Blues, Country, Jazz, Classical & more. 🏈 Live Sports Radio: NFL Football, MLB Baseball, NBA Basketball, MLS Soccer, NHL Hockey, Nascar & more. --------------------- Why Simple Radio? 🔝 Clean User Interface: Simple Radio sports a clean user interface that gets out of your way and makes tuning in straightforward. Many radio apps can be too complex when you're just trying to get a station to play. With Simple Radio, that’s a thing of the past. ❤ One Tap Access to Favorites: Getting to the station you want to listen to as fast as possible is super important - with Simple Radio you’ll always have one-tap access to your favorites. The app is optimized to make day-to-day use as smooth as possible, whether at home, at work or in the car. ⏱ No Buffering or Interruptions: Using Streema’s experience in serving more than 10 million listeners per month, Simple Radio features unparalleled levels of stability and reliability. We know how important this is. That’s why we push relentlessly to further improve the quality of the listening through the app on each release. *An internet connection (wifi or mobile data) is needed to play any FM radio, AM radio or online radio station. 🚗 Listen Anywhere: Open Simple Radio on Android Auto and tune in to your favorite live radio stations in the car or cast what you are listening to on any Google Chromecast compatible device. Simple Radio is available on multiple platforms such as: Android Auto, Google Chromecast, iPhone, iPad, iWatch, Amazon Alexa, mobile and web. In a nutshell… Simple Radio by Streema provides free access to thousands of FM radio, AM radio & online radio stations. You can listen to music, talk shows, news & live sports radio. Tune in to your favorite stations including NPR Radio, BBC Radio, MRN, 77 WABC, La Mega 97.9, KNBR, WNYC & many more. It couldn’t be easier to use our free radio app. Just download & start listening. Simple! --------------------- Questions or feedback? We read every single email Want us to add a specific radio station? Have suggestions? Please, feel free to reach us at simple@streema.com or visit our help center https://help.streema.com/. This software uses code of FFmpeg (ffmpeg.org) licensed under the LGPLv2.1 (www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/lgpl-2.1.html). Privacy policy: http://streema.com/about/privacy/ Terms of use: http://streema.com/about/terms/ Product names, logos, brands, and other trademarks featured or referred to within this profile and the Simple Radio app are the property of their respective trademark holders. These trademark holders are not affiliated with Streema or our services.

title: Wlingua - Learn French
description:
Learning French has never been so easy. It's perfect for you, whether you already have a beginner, basic, intermediate, or advanced level of French. Thanks to our online French courses, you’ll notice your French improving very quickly. Millions of students have already tried our courses. Would you like to join them?

Our Online French Courses:

French Course In this course you will learn French from scratch. Guaranteed! Regardless of the level you start from, it is designed to help you learn French from day one. French Pronunciation Course The French alphabet has 26 letters, but more than 30 different sounds! In this course you will be able to learn to distinguish them, see example words of each of them, and practice all of them using various exercises.

Our Learning Method:

A learning process designed for you that is both easy and guided: You’ll feel like you’re learning more and more French every day. Every sentence, exercise, review, and reading has been carefully selected for you. Audio clips in French: A wide variety of accents with clear, crisp pronunciation. Recorded by professional narrators. Linked concepts: Each word is linked to its use or precise meaning. When you click on the words in each sentence, exercise, or reading, their meaning or an explanation of their use will appear. Lesson structure: Concepts are introduced progressively throughout the course. Only concepts that are explained in the course are used to create the content (sentences, exercises or readings). Vocabulary: Learn the meaning, pronunciation, and use of words with activities adapted to your progress. Grammar exercises: Practice your grammar with exercises linked to explanations. Vocabulary topics: Words are grouped by topic categories. Spaced reviews: Review the vocabulary and grammar at increasingly long intervals. Search function: Find whatever you’re looking for, including vocabulary and grammar. Reading comprehension texts (readings): Learn and practice with conversations, news, emails, and interviews, among others. Certificates: Earn a certificate that proves your knowledge at the end of each level. Account types: ✔ Basic: With a Basic account, the course is free, but has some limitations. ✔ Premium: With a Premium account, you’ll have access to all course content and activities. At Wlingua, we work hard every day to offer you a quality French app that will help you in your work, with that upcoming exam, on your vacation, in communicating with people from around the world... Download our app to learn French!

title: Improve French listening
description:
Welcome to ListenUp French, the ultimate app to help you improve your listening skills in French! Join thousands of learners and start mastering French by listening to authentic native speaker recordings. It's free to sign up and play!

Key Features:

🎧 Thousands of Native French Speaker Recordings: Immerse yourself in a vast collection of short audio clips recorded by native French speakers from various countries and regions, covering a wide range of topics and accents.

🔂 Unlimited Replays: Listen to each recording as many times as you want before diving into the transcript, perfect for honing your listening skills at your own pace.

📖 Interactive Transcripts: Access word-for-word transcripts with real-time highlighting that follows the recording, allowing you to visually track and reinforce your understanding.

🔍 Tap & Play: Tap on any word in the transcript to play just that word, making it easier to focus on specific sounds, pronunciation, and vocabulary.

📚 In-App Dictionary: Quickly access helpful dictionary links for any word in the transcript, expanding your vocabulary and deepening your understanding of the French language.

💎 Free & Premium Versions: Sign up for free and enjoy a limited number of sentences per day, or upgrade to the premium version for unlimited daily access and accelerated French learning progress.

Unlock the full potential of your French listening skills with ListenUp French. Download now and embark on your journey to listening mastery!

title: French Verb Master: French App
description:
Get Online French Verb Learning Courses for conjugations! 
Become the French Verb Master!

Stop struggling with remembering the right verb or the right conjugation as you learn French verbs and speak French fluently. Master this challenging area of the language with French Verb Master. Ideal for everyone who wants to learn French for making their trips easier in France, Belgium, Switzerland, Quebec and other French speaking countries.
 
Benefits from French Verb Master:
+ Free online French courses
+ Lots of French verb lessons
+ Free Conjugating App


One part reference, and one part trainer, French Verb Master is an essential tool in your toolbox:

Reference:
+ Comprehensive: Hundreds of the most often used Verbs
+ Rapid: fast search and filtering to find what you are looking for
+ Focused: common usage ranking helps you focus on what verbs are used most often

Trainer:
+ Guided: Comprehensive training plan guides you through to mastery

Upgrade To PLUS - Support future development and unlock your true Verb Master potential.

title: TOEIC - 600 essential words
description:
Improve your TOEIC score with the 600 TOEIC Vocabulary app, designed to help you quickly and effectively master the essential vocabulary needed for the TOEIC exam. With engaging learning tools and fun games, this app helps you enhance your English skills across listening, speaking, reading, and writing.

Why learners love this app:

• Comprehensive Word List: Learn 600 key TOEIC words, sorted by topic for easier navigation, with definitions, examples, and standard pronunciations.
• Personalized Learning: Mark and prioritize words you’re learning to stay organized and avoid forgetting crucial vocabulary.
• Daily Progress Tracking: Track your study progress with daily reminders to keep you on target with your learning goals.
• Daily Learning Goals: Stay motivated by learning 20 new words every day to continually expand your vocabulary.
• Fun Vocabulary Games: Improve your skills with enjoyable vocabulary games that make learning TOEIC words less stressful.
• Custom Quizzes: Test yourself with quizzes based on words you’ve learned, currently studying, or all 600 words.
• Flashcard System: Reinforce difficult words with flashcards to boost your memory retention.
• Structured Review Program: Review words you’ve memorized after intervals of 3, 7, 14, and 30 days to ensure long-term retention.
• Offline Mode: Study anytime, anywhere, without needing an internet connection.

This app continues to evolve with new updates to enhance your TOEIC preparation. Achieve your learning goals and be well-prepared for the TOEIC exam!

For feedback or suggestions, contact us: mobileapps.customer@gmail.com
Visit our website: https://toeicexamstore.com

Download 600 TOEIC Vocabulary now and take the next step toward TOEIC success!

title: Key English | IELTS Vocabulary
description:
The best way to learn vocabulary is to start with the most common words. Key English | IELTS Vocabulary will teach you the most frequent words in Academic, IELTS and TOEFL English texts. It also has an IELTS Writing Task 2 section to help you develop your essay writing!

Vocabulary features:
•	Written by a professional Academic English Instructor.
•	Learn the words, their definitions AND example sentences to see how they are used in context.
•	Follow your progress and save your data to the cloud.
•	Game mode with leveling system will help keep you motivated.
•	Synonyms help you learn words in groups.
•	Multiple choice, spelling, synonym and grammar games give you confidence! 
•	Save difficult words to view and play games with later. 
•	Important vocabulary lessons teach you how to study.
•	Examples and definitions are carefully prepared for English learners.
•	No annoying logins or internet connection needed!
•	Includes important vocabulary for essay writing.

Writing Task 2 features:
•	Interactive lessons help you learn important essay techniques.
•	Practice with example tasks and study our model answers, complete with notes that focus on the key aspects of essay writing.
•	Know more about band descriptors with our band descriptors guide.

This app contains no ads and all its features are free. If you want to support us, you can make an in-app donation or pay a small fee to have your essays marked with feedback emailed to you by our experienced IELTS teachers.

About the developer

My name is Sam and I am an Academic English teacher. I have found that my students often are able to understand new words, but find it difficult to use them in the correct situations. I decided to write this app to not only teach students the most important academic words, but also help them know how and when to use them. Consequently, the dictionary entries contain definitions AND example sentences written at a level of English that learners can understand.

Spelling, synonyms and grammar is all covered for each word to help students remember what they learn. 

If you are unable to pay the small fee for the full app, send me an email (see additional information) and I’ll send you a code to unlock the full app for free!

Happy learning!

title: Learn French for Beginners
description:
Learn French for Beginners & Kids: Fun Language App 🇫🇷

Embark on a journey to learn French with our engaging app for beginners and kids! Ideal for those new to the language, our app offers a fun way to master french vocabulary, french phrases, and french alphabet pronunciation through vibrant visuals and games. 🌟

Why Choose Our App? ✨

Our app helps you learn French and speak French confidently with features like french words, french sentences, and interactive french language games. Here’s what makes it special:

1. Master the French Alphabet 📚

Learn the french alphabet with fun french language games. Practice french alphabet pronunciation through engaging activities, perfect for kids starting to learn French. 🎲

2. French Vocabulary with Pictures 🖼️

Explore 60+ topics of french vocabulary with colorful images. From animals to food, this visual approach helps you memorize french words easily, ideal for those learning how to learn French. 🐶🍎

3. Common French Phrases 💬

Master french phrases and the most common french words for everyday use. Practice french sentences for greetings, shopping, and travel to speak French fluently. 🗣️

4. Fun French Language Games 🎮

Stay motivated with french language games like word puzzles. Compete on daily and lifetime leaderboards to track your progress while mastering the alphabet and french words. 🏆

5. Stickers & Avatars 🎨

Unlock fun stickers and customize eye-catching avatars for the leaderboards. These rewards keep you excited to learn French! 😎

6. Learn French Numbers & Math 🔢

Practice french numbers and basic math with kid-friendly exercises. Learn counting and calculations to build a strong foundation. ➕➖

7. Multi-Language Support 🌍

Available in multiple languages, our app ensures learners worldwide can learn French comfortably, perfect for how to learn French as a beginner or with kids. 🌐

Key Features 🌟

★ French Alphabet: Learn pronunciation with games. 🔤
★ French Vocabulary: 60+ topics with pictures. 📷
★ French Phrases: Common expressions for daily use. 🗨️
★ French Language Games: Word games and puzzles. 🧩
★ Leaderboards: Track progress daily. 📊
★ Stickers & Avatars: Collect rewards. 🎉
★ French Numbers: Learn counting and math. 🔢
★ Multi-Language: Learn in your language. 🌎

Perfect for Kids & Beginners 👶

Our app makes learn French for beginners fun with french alphabet pronunciation and french words. Kids can learn French in a safe, ad-free environment. 🛡️

Start Learning Today! 🚀

Ready to learn French? Download now to explore french vocabulary, french phrases, and french language games. Join thousands mastering the alphabet! 🇫🇷

Download now for fun, easy French learning! 🎉

title: Lingedia: Learn Spoken English
description: Learn English faster without switching between apps. Lingedia has everything you need to go from Beginner to Advanced. It combines a Smart Dictionary, Vocabulary Builder, and Listening & Speaking Practice in one simple app. Perfect for students preparing for IELTS, TOEFL, GRE, or anyone who wants to speak like a native. 🏆 WHY CHOOSE LINGEDIA? 1. The "Super" Dictionary (5 Sources in 1) Search once and get results from everywhere: ✅ Oxford, Collins, & Merriam-Webster ✅ YouGlish (Watch videos of the word) ✅ Google Images (See pictures of the word) ✅ Translator (Support for 100+ Languages) Everything is on one screen. No need to open many tabs. 2. Smart Vocabulary Builder (Automated SRS) Memorize new words and never forget them. Unlike other apps where you have to plan your own study schedule, our Smart Algorithm does it for you. How does it work? We track your progress on every word: 🔥 The more you answer a word correctly, the LESS it appears in future quizzes. 🔥 If you get it wrong, we show it more often until you master it. This saves your time because you only focus on the words you don't know. 3. Build Your Own Word Lists Hate boring, pre-made lists? With Lingedia, YOU decide what to learn. ✅ Create Custom Folders: Organize words by topic (e.g., "Medical Terms," "Business English," "My Exam"). ✅ Add Any Word: Found a new word in a movie? Add it instantly. Stop wasting time on words you don't need. 4. Shadowing Technique (Speaking Coach) Do native speakers talk too fast? Use our Speed Control to practice: 🗣️ Step 1: Listen at 0.5x (Slow) speed. 🗣️ Step 2: Repeat after the speaker (Shadowing). 🗣️ Step 3: Record your voice and check your pronunciation. 5. Interactive Listening Practice Stop listening to robotic voices. Learn from Real-Life Videos. 📺 Watch thousands of short movie clips and TV shows. ✅ Take interactive quizzes to check your understanding. It is the fun way to improve your listening skills. 6. Read Any Website Read news (BBC, CNN) or books inside the app. 👆 Tap any word to translate it instantly. 💾 Click "Save" to add it to your custom folder automatically. 7. Magic "Copy-to-Translate" Chatting on WhatsApp or reading a PDF? Just copy any English word. Lingedia will show the translation immediately. You don't have to leave your app. 🚀 KEY FEATURES: ★ Offline Mode: Dictionaries for Spanish, French, Arabic, Hindi, and more. ★ Pronunciation: Compare US, UK, and Australian accents. ★ Exam Prep: Word lists for IELTS, TOEFL, SAT, and GRE. ★ Test Your Level: Check your vocabulary size fast. Don't just memorize words. Use them. Download Lingedia today to improve your Speaking, Reading, Listening, and Memory.

title: ClassDojo
description:
Ready to build an amazing classroom community?

ClassDojo is a beautiful, safe, and simple communication app for teachers, parents, and students. 

* Teachers can encourage students for any skill, like “Working hard” and “Teamwork”
* Teachers can bring parents into the classroom experience by sharing photos, videos, and announcements
* Students can add their classwork easily to their own digital portfolios for their parents to see
* Teachers can also safely and instantly message with any parent
* Parents see their child’s updates at home, as well as a stream of photos and videos from school
* All your favorite teacher tools, like Group Maker and Noise Meter, are now in one place!

ClassDojo helps teachers build a positive classroom culture by encouraging students and communicating with parents.

ClassDojo is free for everyone, and K-12 teachers, parents, students, and school leaders in over 180 countries have joined. It works on all devices, like tablets, phones, computers, and smartboards.

See how much people love ClassDojo at: www.classdojo.com/wall-of-love/

Join the ClassDojo community today!

title: Kahoot! Play & Create Quizzes
description:
Play engaging quiz-based games (kahoots) at school, at home and at work, create your own kahoots and learn something new! Kahoot! brings the magic of learning for students, teachers, office superheroes, trivia fans and lifelong learners. 

Here’s what you can do with the Kahoot! app, now available in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Brazilian Portuguese and Norwegian:

Students
- Study with unlimited free flashcards and other smart study modes
- Join kahoots hosted live - in class or virtually - and use the app to submit answers
- Complete self-paced challenges
- Study at home or on the go with flashcards and other study modes
- Compete with friends in study leagues
- Challenge your friends with kahoots you found or created
- Create your own kahoots and add images or videos
- Host kahoots live for family and friends directly from your mobile device

Families and friends
- Find a kahoot on any topic, fit for any age
- Host a kahoot live by casting your screen to a big screen or screen share via video conferencing apps
- Engage your kids with studying at home
- Send a Kahoot! challenge to family members or friends
- Create your own kahoots and add different question types and image effects 

Teachers
- Search among millions of ready-to-play kahoots on any topic
- Create or edit your own kahoots in minutes
- Combine different question types to increase engagement 
- Host kahoots live in class or virtually for distance learning
- Assign student-paced challenges for content review
- Assess learning outcomes with reports

Company employees
- Create kahoots for e-learning, presentations, events and other occasions
- Encourage audience participation with polls and word cloud questions
- Host Kahoot! live in person or in a virtual meeting
- Assign self-paced challenges, for example, for e-learning 
- Assess progress and results with reports

Premium features:
Kahoot! is free for teachers and their students, and it’s our commitment to keep it that way as part of our mission to make learning awesome. We offer optional upgrades that unlock advanced features, such as an image library with millions of images and advanced question types, such as puzzles, polls, open-ended questions and slides. To take advantage of these features, users will need a paid subscription.
 
To create and host kahoots in a work context, as well as get access to additional features, business users will need a paid subscription.

title: Learn AI
description: 🚀 Learn AI Skill– Earn a Professional Certification! 🚀 Welcome to Learn AI App Master essential topics like Introduction to Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Generative AI, AGI, Deep Learning, and Prompt Engineering. After completion give one exam and earn a professional AI certification to showcase your new expertise. Whether you’re exploring AI for the first time or looking to boost your skills, our step-by-step lessons make learning simple and rewarding. Start your journey today and unlock the limitless potential of artificial intelligence now! Why AI Skills Are Important Today? ● Career Opportunities and High Demand. ● Competitive Advantage in Any Field. ● Automation and Efficiency. ● Data-Driven Decision Making. ● Empowering Creativity and Innovation. ● Personal and Professional Growth. ● Preparing for Future Technologies. ● Entrepreneurial Opportunities. ● Improving Social Impact and Solving Real-World Problems. Topics Covered: ● Introduction: Understand what AI is and its importance in today's world. ● History: Find the evolution of artificial intelligence. ● Artificial General Intelligence (AGI): Learn about AGI and its future impact. ● Real-Life Use Cases: Explore how AI is applied in various industries by tools. ● Generative AI: Delve into generative AI and how it creates new content. ● Prompt Engineering: Master crafting effective prompts for AI models. ● AI Terms and Tools: Familiarize yourself with key AI terminology and tools. ● Machine Learning and Deep Learning Basics: Get introduced to foundational concepts. Interactive Learning: ● Quizzes: Test your knowledge with quizzes in each section to reinforce your learning. Certification: ● Take the Exam: Assess your overall understanding with our comprehensive exam. ● Earn Your Certificate: Score 80% or higher to receive your certificate and showcase your new skills. Take the First Step Towards Success Join many of satisfied learners who have transformed their understanding of AI with our app. By investing a small amount of your time in this AI course, you're setting yourself up for a lifetime of benefits. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to master the basics of artificial intelligence and open new doors to exciting opportunities. Get Certified: Show off your new skills with a certificate that proves your proficiency. Empower Yourself Today Download the Learn Artificial Intelligence app now and start building your AI skills today. Empower yourself and see the difference it makes tomorrow! Perfect for anyone looking to start a journey in artificial intelligence or just wanting to improve their understanding of AI concepts. If you have any queries, feel free to contact us at info@technologychannel.org Happy Learning AI

title: ELSA Speak: English Learning
description:
Meet ELSA Speak - Your personal AI-powered English tutor.

ELSA Speak is an AI-powered language coach designed to help professionals and learners speak English with confidence. Engage in real-time, speaking scenarios to practice job interviews, presentations, meetings, and more. Reinforce your skills with interactive AI-powered games that make learning engaging and effective. With 8,000+ lessons, you'll learn proper pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary faster than ever.

Download the best AI-powered English learning app today and start your journey to confident English communication!

ELSA SPEAK FEATURES:

ENGLISH COMMUNICATION
- Career-Specific Focus - Learn vocabulary and communication styles tailored to your field - Confident Exam Preparation
- Prepare for IELTS, TOEFL, TOEIC, EIKEN, and more with targeted practice in our bilingual app to boost fluency.

HYPER-PERSONALIZED LEARNING PATHS
- Personalized language learning - Learn to succeed in workplace interviews, giving presentations, interacting in meetings, succeeding at client calls, and daily conversations.
- AI-Driven Conversations & Open-Ended Dialogues - Personalized language learning through practicing realistic conversations. 

REAL-LIFE CONVERSATION PRACTICE
- Grammar & Vocabulary - AI-driven conversation helps you build a solid foundation in English grammar and expand your vocabulary with everyday, practical words. The adaptive AI adjusts to your progress, ensuring you always learn exactly what you need.
- Conversation Practice - Improve fluency with role-plays, open-ended dialogues, and real-life scenarios. Learn to speak English confidently and with clarity. Leave language misunderstandings behind, whether in the workplace or the classroom.
- Pronunciation Training - Practice speaking English and conquer tricky sounds, learn nuanced English pronunciation.
- Personalized Study Sets – Save words, phrases, or sentences from lessons or create your own, explore and share sets, and improve your pronunciation with real-time feedback.

INSTANT FEEDBACK & AI COACH FOR CONVERSATIONS
- Quantitative Progress Tracking - Monitor your improvement with data-driven insights.
- Pronunciation & Word Stress Guidance from our AI English Coach - Receive real-time corrections to sound more natural.

ACCENT TRAINING
- English learning accent choices: American, British, Australian, and more.
- Pick your preferred gender to help you feel confident while interacting with others from different cultures.

ENGLISH COMMUNICATION BENEFITS
- Enhanced Global Collaboration: Bridge language gaps and foster seamless teamwork with international colleagues or friends.
- Career Potential: Boost your career by impressing clients and colleagues with polished English communication
- Expand Your Network: Build meaningful relationships and confidently explore global opportunities.
- Beyond Pronunciation: Learn grammar, vocabulary, and communication techniques to succeed academically, personally, or professionally.
---

TRUSTED BY ENGLISH LEARNERS AND INDUSTRY EXPERTS
- Honorable Mention in the AI and Data category of Fast Company's 2020 World Changing Ideas Awards
- Top 100 Influencers in State of EdTech Report by EdTech Digest 2020
- Mentioned by TechCrunch, Forbes, Mashable, VentureBeat, Yahoo, Salma Hayek, and more
---

Reach out to us:
Whether it’s for feedback, questions, suggestions, or personal experiences, our inboxes are always open to hearing from you. Please write us an email at support@elsanow.io.

title: ChatGPT
description:
Introducing ChatGPT for Android: OpenAI’s latest advancements at your fingertips.

This official app is free, syncs your history across devices, and brings you the latest from OpenAI, including the new image generator.

With ChatGPT in your pocket, you’ll find:

· Image generation–Generate original images from a description, or transform existing ones with a few simple words. 
· Advanced Voice Mode–Tap the soundwave icon to have a real-time convo on the go. Settle a dinner table debate, or practice a new language. 
· Photo upload—Snap or upload a picture to transcribe a handwritten recipe or get info about a landmark. 
· Creative inspiration—Find custom birthday gift ideas or create a personalized greeting card.
· Tailored advice—Talk through a tough situation, ask for a detailed travel itinerary, or get help crafting the perfect response. 
· Personalized learning—Explain electricity to a dinosaur-loving kid or easily brush up yourself on a historic event.
· Professional input—Brainstorm marketing copy or map out a business plan.
· Instant answers—Get recipe suggestions when you only have a few ingredients.

Join hundreds of millions of users and try the app captivating the world. Download ChatGPT today.

title: IELTS Practice Test
description:
Are you aiming for a high IELTS band score? IELTS Practice Test is your all-in-one solution for comprehensive exam preparation. Whether you're targeting band 7 or higher, our app provides the tools and resources you need to succeed.

Key Features:
* Realistic Practice Tests: Simulate the actual IELTS exam with full-length practice tests for Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking.
* Extensive Vocabulary Builder: Expand your vocabulary with targeted word lists and interactive exercises. Improve your lexical resource for higher scores.
* Speaking Practice: Prepare for the IELTS Speaking test with a vast library of speaking cue cards, practice questions and sample answers. Learn to improve your fluency, pronunciation, and coherence with examiner guides on high-scoring vocabulary.
* Writing Task Guides & Sample Essays: Master both Academic and General Training Writing tasks with expert guides and sample essays. Learn effective strategies for task achievement, coherence, and cohesion.
* Listening & Reading Strategies: Develop effective techniques for tackling Listening and Reading sections. Improve your speed and accuracy with skimming, scanning, and paraphrasing strategies.
* Expert Tips & Strategies: Access proven strategies and tips from experienced IELTS instructors. Learn how to maximize your score in each section.
* Key Language Skills: Master essential grammar rules, common idioms, and phrasal verbs for higher scores in all sections.
* Language Tools: Enhance your learning with a multi-language dictionary, thesaurus, and pronunciation guides that include example sentences to deepen your understanding and enhance your vocabulary.
* Offline Access: Practice anytime, anywhere, even without an internet connection.
* Regular Updates: Our content is constantly updated to reflect the latest IELTS exam format and requirements.

Why Choose IELTS Practice Test?
* Comprehensive Coverage: Our app covers all four modules of the IELTS exam, ensuring you're fully prepared for either the Academic or General Training test.
* User-Friendly Interface: Navigate easily and access all features with our intuitive design.
* Proven Methods: Our strategies and techniques are based on proven methods used by successful IELTS candidates.
* Boost Your Confidence: Gain the confidence you need to perform your best on exam day.

Start preparing for your IELTS exam today with our app and take the first step towards achieving your goals!

title: Jinjja, your Korean booster.
description:
Hi, I'm Hanum, the maker of Jinjja.
I made Jinjja with the belief that language has its own way of being learned.
Hangul is easy, but Korean is hard, right?
This app is for those who want to move beyond beginner level.
If you can read Hangul now and find other apps too easy, join us at Jinjja!


Why Jinjja?

1. Not AI-generated expressions 
Learn from 2,000+ expressions that Koreans actually use. Every expression was created by a Korean (me).

2. Learn through context
Not just memorization—naturally pick up when and with what nuance to use expressions in real conversations.

3. Science-backed review system
Smart reviews based on the forgetting curve turn what you learn into long-term memory.


3 Learning Modes
Language is vocabulary, speaking, and listening!

1. Real Talk
Learn the context of real Korean conversations.
From formal speech to casual talk and jokes between friends—master expressions for every situation.

2. Vocab
Swipe once to sort words you know from words you don't.
Combined Anki + skimming technique lets you acquire vocabulary in no time.

3. Listening
Listen and learn real expressions with native pronunciation.
Just listen, it'll click.


I'm building Jinjja with love and passion. More features are coming in 2026.
I recommend Jinjja if you:

- Are intermediate in Korean but still feel awkward talking with Koreans
- Understand dramas but go blank when you try to speak
- Finished Korean basics but struggle with natural expressions
- Want to understand K-dramas or K-pop lyrics without subtitles
- Want to chat more naturally with Korean friends or colleagues
- Want to speak like a local when traveling in Korea
- Want to learn real, living Korean—not textbook Korean

Break free from textbook Korean. The language actually used in Korea. The expressions Koreans really use.
Start with Jinjja.

title: Todaii: Learn Japanese N5-N1
description:
Learn Japanese in context - READING, LISTENING, SPEAKING and JLPT

With more than 10 fresh news articles daily, you can practice at your own level, from N5 beginner to N1 advanced. Improve your reading skills, expand your vocabulary, and understand Japanese the way natives use it. Why choose Todaii Japanese to learn Japanese? 📚 Reading practice - Learn Japanese through real content - Improve Japanese reading skills with content selected from levels N5 to N1 - Topics include Japanese culture, daily life, technology, entertainment, and more. - Integrated 1-touch lookup right in the reading, helping you deeply understand the semantics of words and sentences when needed. - Practice with Quiz to help consolidate skills and memorize lesson content - Practice reading and pronunciation of each word, each sentence 💡A.I. Pronunciation Scoring - Improve your pronunciation, speak Japanese confidently - Recognize and analyze your pronunciation of each word using A.I. technology - Compare with native pronunciation to detect mistakes - Provide accurate scores after each practice to track progress 🎓 Practice real-life conversations - Learn to speak Japanese naturally - 72 conversations, helping you quickly learn basic communication in Japanese used daily. - Learn Japanese grammar with each conversation. - Designed for learners who want to learn to speak Japanese with confidence. 🔍Japanese Dictionary - Easy lookup and learn Japanese vocabulary - Smart, fast, and accurate dictionary similar to top Japanese dictionary apps - Look up vocabulary, idioms, sentence structures, and grammar breakdowns. - All features are designed to help you learn Japanese vocabulary and grammar naturally. 🎓 JLPT N5-N1 mock test - Learn Japanese for exam success - Full mock tests to help you prepare for the JLPT exam in July and December. - Detailed explanations of answers help you understand and improve your weaknesses. - 356 JLPT N5-N1 reading practice exercises 🎧 Listening practice - Learn Japanese by listening to native video - Practice listening skills through hot videos and podcasts, with transcripts to help you understand each sentence. - Audio with reading exercises to practice listening skills with high-quality voices - Easily adjust playback speed, suitable for each learner's level - Attractive videos and podcasts, help you practice listening skills, supplement vocabulary and grammar in real contexts. - Detailed transcripts included, easy to follow lesson content. 📔Vocabulary - Learn and remember Japanese words faster Vocabulary curated and summarized from real reading passages. Easy-to-use Flashcards to memorize new words. Full JLPT N5-N1 vocabulary list for targeted learning. Application for: - People who want to learn Japanese from scratch or improve existing skills. - Self-learners who want to study Japanese effectively at home. - Learners preparing for the JLPT N5-N1 exams. - Anyone looking to enhance their Japanese reading, listening, and speaking abilities. Whether you're just starting or already have some experience, Todaii Japanese is your trusted app to learn Japanese in a fun, structured, and effective way Let Todaii Japanese be your companion on your journey to learn Japanese and connect deeply with the language and culture of Japan! 📩 For feedback or questions, contact us at: todai.easylife@gmail.com Your support helps us make Todaii Japanese better every day.
