title: Innovative Language Learning
description: Want to speak a new language from your 1st lesson? With Innovative Language Learning, you learn practical conversations fast with real lessons made by real teachers. If you’re tired of learning random words, and want to learn everyday language from real native speakers… this is the App for you. Learn 34 Languages in the Fastest, Easiest, & Most Fun Way Learn Spanish, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Russian, Hebrew, Cantonese, Thai, Arabic, Portuguese, Dutch, Greek, Hindi, Polish, Swedish, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Filipino, Turkish, Persian, Norwegian, Finnish, Hungarian, Bulgarian, Swahili, Czech, Danish, Afrikaans, Romanian, and Urdu. 4 Reasons Why You Can & Will Learn A Language Start Speaking in Minutes Audio/video lessons are just 3-15 minutes. Just press “Play” and learn practical conversations in every quick, podcast-style lesson. Learn from Real Teachers Best way to pick up a language? By learning from real natives and hearing the actual language. Feel confident as you learn from actual teachers and hear real-life conversations. Instantly Practice What You’ve Learned Tired of learning and forgetting immediately after? That’s why after every few lessons, you’ll get tested on what you’ve learned with our Assessments. You can also interact with your own teacher (with the Premium PLUS plan) 16+ Years of Teaching Languages. With 2+ billion lesson downloads and 16 years of experience, you’re learning with a time-tested, proven system. What’s Inside the App? Start now and access hundreds of audio and video lessons by real teachers, lesson notes, study tools and more. With Innovative Language Learning, you get… - A 7-Day Free Premium Trial of Any of Our Language Courses (Free) - New Audio & Video Lessons EVERY Week for LIFE (Free) - Offline Mode - Download Lessons to My Library (Free) - Daily Vocabulary Lessons Delivered to Your Email (Free) - Multiple Playback Options - Stream from the App or the Lock-Screen, Skip Ahead & Control the Speed of Your Lessons (Free) - The Largest Library of Audio & Video Lessons (Basic Users & Above) - In-Depth Lesson Notes with Grammar Explanations (Basic Users & Above) - Progress Tools to Track Your Learning Progress (Basic Users & Above) - Line-by-Line Breakdowns of Lesson Dialogues (Premium Users & Above) - Word Bank - Your Own Custom Vocabulary List (Premium Users & Above) - 1-on-1 Learning with Your Own Teacher (Premium PLUS only) - Get a Personalized Learning Program & Guidance (Premium PLUS Only) Download the App right now and sign up for your Free Lifetime Account. You get a 7-day Trial of our entire Learning System – both the mobile app and the desktop version! Want to add Basic, Premium, or Premium PLUS and learn on your device and computer? There's an option for that, too. *Please note that subscriptions made using the in-app purchases will auto-renew at the end of the subscription period and be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period. Subscriptions made through in-app purchases cannot be cancelled during active subscription period. Please see this article for managing your in-app subscriptions and auto-renewal: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/2476088 Monthly Premium PLUS Access: $46.99/month per language Monthly Premium Access: $24.99/month per language Monthly Basic Access: $7.99/month per language *all amounts are in US dollars At Innovative Language Learning, we take your privacy very seriously. You can view our privacy policy here: http://www.innovativelanguage.com/privacy

title: Learn French - 11,000 Words
description: Learn French from 61 native languages, for free & offline, with FunEasyLearn. Learn to READ 📖 WRITE ✍ and SPEAK French 💬 Discover the fun & easy way to learn all the reading rules, all the words you’ll ever need and all the useful phrases in the French language. 🚀 Contents • 6,000 French words (constantly growing): the most common nouns, verbs, adjectives, etc., categorized into 7 levels and 200 topics; • 5,000 French phrases (frequently used): the most important phrases for daily conversations and travelling, categorized into 10 levels and 120 topics. Enhance your vocabulary by learning words, sentences and expressions for beginner, intermediate and advanced learners. 🔔 Why learn French with FunEasyLearn? FunEasyLearn reinvents language learning. Our team of linguists and teachers have developed a unique language learning strategy. The secret lies in combining an alphabet with all the reading rules, all the necessary words and a practical phrasebook into one app. This allows our users to read a word or phrase, pronounce it correctly, associate it with an illustration and practice it with listening, writing and speaking games. 🏆 Top features Hand-drawn illustrations – memorize the new vocabulary faster with intuitive illustrations; Professional audio recordings – listen to audios recorded by native speakers; Detailed statistics – analyze your results and track your progress; Review manager – review everything you learn; Smart search – find quickly the words and phrases you need; Hide what you know – hide the content you already know; Speech recognition – improve your pronunciation; Offline – use the app anywhere in the world, with no internet connection. 💼 French for business Get access to special French lessons created for your business. We provide specialized courses for taxi drivers, hotel & restaurant staffs, flight-attendants, shop-assistants, etc. ✈ French for travelling Learn how to book a hotel room, order a meal in a restaurant, ask for directions, carry out a conversation and speak confidently with the native speakers. 🙌 French for adults We adapt the contents depending on the age of the learner. Both you and your kid can learn French and have fun. FunEasyLearn Free Subscription Subscribe for FREE, with the flowers you earn while playing language learning games. Learn French, play for free! It’s fast & easy. 📴 📥 Download the FunEasyLearn French course right now! Recommend the app to your friends and get a reward. Rate us and write a review ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ It would mean a lot to our team! Contact us: https://www.FunEasyLearn.com/

title: Teachmint Connected Classroom
description:
Teachmint powered by AI for Students and Teachers

Teachmint is an all-in-one AI classroom app featuring an AI assistant designed to help students learn more effectively and make teaching easier for educators. With built-in EduAI, Teachmint makes it easy to share study materials, assign homework, generate quizzes, and explain complex topics clearly, so every student learns effectively.

✨GYD AI Features for Students
✔︎ Bits : Practice questions everyday with byte sized content.
✔︎ AI Lecture Summaries: Turn notes and study materials into clear, simple summaries for easy review.
 ✔︎ AI Doubt Clarification: Ask questions and get easy-to-understand explanations instantly.
 ✔︎ AI Homework Generator: Helps students practice anytime with instant assignments.
 ✔︎ AI Quiz & Practice: Instantly create quizzes for effective self-revision.
 ✔︎ AI Practice Bits : Byte sized content generated from your classroom notes.
 ✔︎ Study Material: Open shared resources and learn with AI-powered summaries.

💜 Why Students Love GYD AI
 ✔︎ Makes studying simpler and faster.
 ✔︎ Helps understand lessons clearly without confusion.
 ✔︎ Supports you like a personal tutor anytime you need help.
 ✔︎  Let's you practice with quizzes and learn visually.
 ✔︎  Keeps your study materials organized and easy to access.

📚For Teachers: Help Students Learn Better
 ✔︎ Share study materials directly with students for easy access.
 ✔︎ Use AI to simplify complex topics with clear summaries.
 ✔︎ Generate homework and quizzes in seconds to give students more practice.
 ✔︎ Support students in clarifying doubts anytime with easy explanations.
 ✔︎ Make lessons more engaging and effective for every learner.

💙Why Students Love Teachmint
 ✔︎ 83% faster lesson preparation.
 ✔︎ 60% better student engagement.

🔐Built for Real Classrooms
✔︎ ISO-certified data security.
✔︎ AI-powered tools for teaching and learning.
✔︎ One-stop solution for all learning needs.

🎓Teach Better. Learn Better
Teachmint with EduAI helps students learn better, faster, and more easily, and also makes teaching simpler.

🚀Get started with Teachmint today and transform the way you learn.

title: Vocabulary flashcards: Vocabuo
description:
Learn English, Spanish, German, French, Italian or Swedish words through smart flashcards. See word's usage in infinite amount of sentences and learn through proven spaced-repetition method. 

Create collections of English, Spanish, German, French, Italian and Swedish vocabulary from any piece of text you'd like. Be it news articles, song lyrics, ebooks or short stories. Vocabuo will extract the words in their basic forms, taking conjugations and prefixes into account, and prepares them for practice. 

Practice with flashcards by simply swiping left or right. Cycle though unlimited amount of sentences to get the best feeling for the word. Obtain more information about the word's meaning, origin and related words by clicking the explanation button! Hear the proper pronunciation of each sentence, immediately after revealing the answer. 

Add more vocabulary from videos or by reading your favorite websites.

title: Listening Japanese, Chinese an
description:
Do you want to become a real multilingual?

There is nothing more than that you must learn communication skills.
With traditional learning methods, you are wasting time training your listening and speaking skills. Change that with Voiky!

Practice listening and speaking fluently in Japanese - Chinese - English only in one app. 

⭐️VOIKY HELPS YOU:
- Learn Japanese, English, Chinese speaking and listening with HD videos
- Practice shadowing japanese, learning video japanese with japanese voice
- Practice listening and speaking comprehensively
- Listen and speak Japanese, English, Chinese with shadowing, voice record, subtitles, game 

Through engaging videos, you will be drawn to and gradually improve your listening, speaking and communication skills.

⭐️ PRACTICE LISTENING JAPANESE
Practice listening to Japanese at all levels
Practice listening to Japanese n5, n4, n3, n2, n1
The videos are divided into different topics, ranging from easy to difficult. Use filters to quickly find videos that match your interests and purposes!

⭐️ PRACTICE SPEAKING JAPANESE
The shadowing function is really efficient and saves a lot of time. Instead of sitting for hours looking for speaking materials and recording equipment. Voiky has done it on your behalf.

Learn Japanese communication every day, practice listening and speaking Japanese communication easily with the voice recording function, you can immediately record and listen again, so that it quickly improves pronunciation and intonation. Practice speaking Japanese like a native.

Conquer Japanese listening through engaging videos with subtitles and translation:
>> Practice listening Japanese online and offline
>> Japanese listening practice through movies
>> Japanese listening practice through cartoons
>> Japanese listening practice through songs
>> Shadowing Japanese
>> Listen and speak Japanese
>> Japanese voice
>> Learning video Japanese
>> Japanese communication work

⭐️ PRACTICE LISTENING AND SPEAKING CHINESE
Voiky is suitable for those who want to learn Chinese communication, practice listening and speaking Chinese easily and effectively at home. Voiky has over 3000+ videos of diverse topics: study, culture, music, news, etc. Suitable for all learners of Chinese from beginners to intermediate and advanced.

⭐️  PRACTICE LISTENING AND SPEAKING ENGLISH
Practice listening and speaking English through video
Do exercises to strengthen your English reflexes - an important foundation for good English communication. Get rid of boredom with effective English listening and speaking method with Voiky
Vivid illustrations in the video: stimulate memory and interest in learning
Video learning at an adjustable speed: Learning like a child acquires language
Learn and practice: practice immediately with important words you have saved

📩 READY TO SOLVE YOUR ISSUES AND FEEDBACK
Voiky Japanese - Chinese - English listening and speaking practice app is looking forward to receiving your feedback, which helps Voiky improve better and better.

If you have any feedback, please email us: voiky@eupgroup.net

title: Teach Your Monster to Read
description:
Teach Your Monster to Read is the award-winning, phonics and reading game for kids. Enjoyed by over 30 million worldwide, Teach Your Monster to Read is a truly  ground-breaking kids reading app that makes learning to read fun for little ones aged between 3-6.

Kids create their own unique monster to take on a magical journey across three reading games, encouraging them to learn to read by improving their skills as they progress while meeting a host of colourful characters along the way.  The app also contains a host of minigames, which help children to develop speed and phonics accuracy.  

Games 1, 2 and 3
1.        First Steps – for children starting to learn phonics through letters and sounds
2.        Fun With Words – for children who are confident with early letter-sound combinations and are starting to read sentences
3.        Champion Reader – for children who are confidently reading short sentences and know all of the basic letter-sound combinations
 
Developed in collaboration with leading academics at the UK’s University of Roehampton, 
Teach Your Monster to Read offers a rigorous program that works with any phonics scheme, making it perfect for use in school or at home.

Why Teach Your Monster to Read? 

•        Covers the first two years of learning to read, from matching letters and sounds to enjoying little books
•        Covers everything from phonics to reading full sentences
•        Designed in collaboration with leading academics to compliment programs used in schools
•        Teachers claim it’s a wonderful and captivating classroom tool that helps their students learn to read
•        Parents have seen significant improvements in their children’s literacy within weeks
•        Kids love learning through play
•        There are no in-app purchases, hidden costs or in-game adverts 

PROCEEDS GO TO THE USBORNE FOUNDATION CHARITY
Teach Your Monster to Read has been created by Teach Monster Games Ltd. which is a subsidiary of The Usborne Foundation. The Usborne Foundation is a charity founded by children’s publisher, Peter Usborne MBE. Harnessing research, design and technology, we create playful media addressing issues from literacy to health. Funds raised from the game go back into the charity, to help us become sustainable and build new projects.

Teach Monster Games Ltd is a subsidiary of The Usborne Foundation, a registered charity in England and Wales (1121957)

title: IELTS Exam Preparation: Vocabu
description: Prep for the IELTS exam with Magoosh! Learn the 600 most important IELTS English vocabulary words with our easy to use flashcards and master your vocab with full definitions, example sentences and more! Best of all, you can study using our flashcards for free! ---------------------------------------------------------------- MASTER YOUR IELTS VOCAB - STUDY WITH MAGOOSH ---------------------------------------------------------------- - Practice & learn 600 English vocab words picked by an expert IELTS exam tutor - Complete definitions & example sentences for each word - Decks of flashcards for multiple difficulty levels; easy, intermediate and advanced - Track your progress, identify your strengths and areas for improvement - Smart algorithm optimizes the flashcards for accelerated learning & optimized study - FREE access to all of the flashcards, just sign in to your Magoosh account! WRTTEN BY EXPERT IELTS TUTORS Every word, definition, and example sentence in this app has been selected, written and triple checked by our team of expert tutors led by led by Eliot Friesen, Lucas Fink, and Chris Lele. Eliot is the IELTS Curriculum Manager at Magoosh and has successfully coached college-level ESL students for years. Lucas has written an eBook on TOEFL preparation and has a hugely popular YouTube series on English vocabulary. Chris is a vocabulary master and has helped students of all backgrounds improve their language skills and test scores. Now they’re here to help you! LEARN FASTER. LEARN SMARTER. Magoosh uses spaced repetition to make your learning sessions as streamlined as possible! Academic studies and tests have shown that spaced repetition is shown to significantly increase learning efficiency and information retention. Words and definitions you’re learning will reappear on flashcards to help you learn them faster, appearing less and less frequently as you know them better. Our IELTS prep flashcards contain the 600 most important English vocab words you should learn to ace the IELTS test, making sure you don’t waste your time learning unimportant vocabulary. ABOUT MAGOOSH We’re an online test preparation service with a passion for teaching English through video lessons and practice questions. In addition to our apps and courses, you can check out our active blog for even more IELTS tips, study guides, strategies, and other useful learning resources. Visit our website: https://ielts.magoosh.com GET IN TOUCH WITH US We’re always striving to make our services as beneficial to you as possible! If you have any feedback, suggestions for new features or you just want to drop in and say hi, send us an email at help@magoosh.com. DOWNLOAD FOR FREE & START MASTERING YOUR IELTS VOCABULARY TODAY

title: Learn Japanese Hello-Hello
description:
Learn Japanese (Hello-Hello) is now, by far, THE BEST language learning app available on Google Play store :-) 

-- Animated videos and comic strips 
-- New games to practice reading and listening skills 
-- Cleaner and more friendly user interface 
-- Follow your course progress 
-- Take notes 
-- Receive notifications with lesson reminders. The more you practice, the more you learn! 
-- Receive notifications with new words to build your vocabulary 

Hello-Hello Japanese  is a full-fledged language course with 30 LESSONS developed in collaboration with the American Council on the Teaching of Foreign Languages (ACTFL), so you can be assured that these lessons follow an effective research-based methodology. All lessons are conversational based on realistic dialogues and situations, rather than a collection of out-of-context words and phrases.

All the content is stored in the app so that you have great responsiveness when you are ready to learn a language. You do not need to be connected to Wi-Fi or 3G networks to run the app. With Hello-Hello Janapiese you will be able to do the lessons and practice vocabulary anytime, anywhere developing all the skills you need to communicate in a foreign language. All lessons were recorded by native speakers so you can learn the correct pronunciation.

With Hello-Hello Japanese you can also:

Practice vocabulary with more than 300 words and phrases using our FLASHCARDS feature!  (Please note that we will be adding more words and phrases in upcoming updates.)

Save your own NOTES form any lesson.

Full localization: You can see the entire app, including the translations of the lessons and words lists in your native language! Languages available: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Chinese and Portuguese.
 
Note about our methodology: At first, our lessons might seem advanced for some people but there is a purpose behind it. Our lessons are structured to give learners the ability to communicate effectively with others.  If the learner is new to the language, it will be necessary to spend more time learning the basic phrases in order to begin to gain proficiency in the language.  For those who already know other related languages, the time factor may not be as great to learn the basics. Beginners need to go slowly and may need to do the activities several times before they gain a comfort level in using them. And remember: The more time you spend doing the exercises, the more proficient you will become!

CONTACT US:  We are constantly trying to improve the app and take feedback from our users very seriously. The app has a “Contact Us” icon so that you can contact us easily, so please do not hesitate and send us an email if you have any questions, comments, complaints or suggestions.

Make sure to also check Hello-Hello Kids, our language learning app for children! 

ABOUT US

Hello-Hello is an innovative language learning company that provides state-of the art mobile and online courses. Founded in 2009, Hello-Hello launched the world’s first language learning app for the mobile. Our lessons were developed in collaboration with The American Council on the Teaching of Foreign Languages (ACTFL) which is the largest and most respected association for language teachers and professionals.

With over 5 million learners worldwide, Hello-Hello apps are among the top selling language learning apps in the U.S. and internationally. Hello-Hello has over 100 apps teaching 13 different languages available.

title: TuneIn Radio: Music & Sports
description:
Listen to All the Audio You Love, All in One Place

Access over 100,000 live AM/FM radio stations from around the world, plus exclusive content from news, sports, music, podcasts, and audiobooks—all across your devices. Enjoy a broader range of audio than Pandora or iHeartRadio, all in one place.

Your Personalized Soundtrack

Tune in to your favorite live stations or explore 100,000+ AM/FM stations from 197+ countries. Whether you’re in the mood for Today’s Hits, Classic Rock, Smooth Jazz, or something else, TuneIn has you covered—offering more variety and control than platforms like Pandora or iHeartRadio. Discover legendary stations like 106.7 Lite FM, Power 105.1, 102.7 KIIS-FM, and more.

Apple Music Radio now on TuneIn

Apple Music Radio has landed. Stream Apple Music 1, Chill, Country, Club & Hits live on TuneIn. Catch your favorite artists like Billie Eilish, Ed Sheeran, The Weeknd, Frank Ocean and more.

Stay Informed with Trusted News

Get the latest headlines and live updates from top news sources like CNN, FOX News Radio, MS NOW, Bloomberg Radio, CNBC, NPR, and BBC. Access 24/7 news, including local, national, and global coverage. Stream news stations such as WNYC-FM, KQED-FM, and WTOP Washington DC, or stay informed with top podcasts like The Daily and Up First.

All Your Favorite Sports

From MLB and NFL to NHL and college sports, catch every game and never miss a play. With TuneIn, follow your team all season long with curated content and game-time notifications. Stream sports talk stations like ESPN Radio, talkSPORT, Fox Sports Radio, and local shows. Plus, enjoy on-demand sports podcasts like Undisputed, First Take, and The Bill Simmons Podcast.

Podcasts for Every Passion

Explore the world’s most popular podcasts, including Stuff You Should Know, Hidden Brain, Wow in the World, and more. Whether commuting, working out, or unwinding, TuneIn offers top global podcasts that you can stream on-demand.

Stream Everywhere, Anytime

Take TuneIn with you wherever you go. Listen on iOS, tablets, or connected devices. Control your audio experience with Amazon Alexa, Google Home, or in your car with CarPlay and compatible vehicles like Tesla, Mercedes, and Volvo.

Unlock Even More with TuneIn Premium

Upgrade to TuneIn Premium for ad-free content, exclusive features, and more:

Live Sports: Commercial-free coverage of NHL games, college sports, racing, and more—without blackouts.
Ad-Free News: Enjoy uninterrupted news coverage from CNBC, CNN, FOX News Radio, and more.
Unlimited Audiobooks: Access over 100,000 audiobooks with no extra cost or limitations.
Commercial-Free Music: Stream your favorite music stations non-stop with no ads.
Fewer Ads Across All Stations: Enjoy listening to 100,000+ stations with fewer interruptions than Pandora or iHeartRadio.

Subscribe to TuneIn Premium through the free app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a monthly or annual subscription fee according to your country. The subscription fee will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Your subscription will automatically renew every month or year at the then-current subscription fee unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then-current subscription period. Your iTunes account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the then-current period. The subscription fee will be charged monthly or annually according to your subscription. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings.

Privacy policy: http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/
Terms of use: http://tunein.com/policies

TuneIn uses Nielsen measurement software which allows you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. To learn more about Nielsen’s products and your privacy, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

title: Pimsleur | Language Learning
description:
Online Foreign Language Learning for Spanish, French, Korean and more with Pimsleur - Learn to speak 50+ foreign languages fluently with just 30 minutes of language learning practice a day!

The Pimsleur Method™ is the most effective way to learn a foreign language, achieve native conversational fluency, and use the language in your everyday life. Learn to speak fluent Spanish, French, Korean, German, Chinese, Arabic, Japanese and more with ease. Pimsleur’s easy language learning resources make learning a new language fun, flexible and rewarding. Work on your vocabulary, learn grammar and practice speaking fluently, with just 30 minutes of language practice a day! 

Our innovative online audio lessons focus on enhancing your vocabulary, pronunciation and speaking skills without the burden of grammar tables, making language learning and practice enjoyable and accessible. Dive into cultural topics that enrich your understanding and language fluency, and join thousands of adults who have transformed their language skills online with Pimsleur.

Whether you're a beginner or already looking to improve your language fluency, Pimsleur offers a convenient and effective online language learning platform for adults designed for a flexible study schedule that fits into your daily routine. Learn to speak a new language anytime, anywhere - even in the car as a family using CarPlay. 

Why Choose Pimsleur as Your Language Partner?
Scientifically proven method for fast, lasting language fluency.
Just 30 minutes a day to speak a new foreign language with confidence.
Learn languages offline, hands-free, and without distractions, no Wi-Fi needed.
Perfect your pronunciation and practice real conversations with a smart AI language tutor. 
Sync across devices to track your progress and keep your learning streak going.
Join the global community of Pimsleur language learners!

Discover the full list of languages here: Albanian, Arabic (Eastern), Arabic (Egyptian), Arabic (Modern Standard), Armenian (Eastern), Armenian (Western), Chinese (Cantonese), Chinese (Mandarin), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dari Persian, Dutch, Farsi Persian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Haitian Creole, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Lithuanian, Norwegian, Ojibwe, Pashto, Polish, Portuguese (Brazilian), Portuguese (European), Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Spanish (Latin American), Spanish (Spain-Castilian), Swahili, Swedish, Swiss German, Tagalog, Thai, Turkish, Twi, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese.

Join millions who trust Pimsleur for effective online language learning. 

FREE TRIAL AVAILABLE
Don’t miss out - try Pimsleur for FREE and start learning different languages today! With a complimentary lesson in 51 languages, you'll experience the most effective way to achieve conversational fluency from Day 1.

PREMIUM FEATURES

CORE CONVERSATIONAL LANGUAGE LEARNING LESSONS
Enjoy 30-minute conversational language lessons anywhere. Quickly learn to speak another language in just 30 days!

READ
You won’t just learn foreign languages; you'll learn to read without sacrificing speaking skills!

SPEAK
Overcome beginner shyness and learn to speak different languages fluently with role-play & review transcripts with AI language learning & voice recognition.

SKILLS
Practice phrases by topic & learn easily with vocabulary flashcards. Learn foreign languages with Quick Match & Speed Rounds.

SYNC PROGRESS
Track learning progress across different devices, sync & stream offline with no ads. With the convenience of remote learning, you can learn languages without interruptions for effective language transfer.

DAILY LESSONS TO BUILD STREAKS
Keep your daily learning streak as you go and become fluent forever!

Feature availability depends on the language. Visit our website for more info & a complete list of the different languages available.

CA Privacy/Info We Collect: Privacy Policy
Do Not Sell My Personal Information: Do Not Sell

title: Learn French fast - Lilata
description:
Lilata is a French learning app designed to help adults start speaking the language quickly. By committing just 10 minutes daily, you can learn French through our scientifically proven teaching methods that ensure the easiest way to absorb and apply new language skills. The course is packed with the most useful words, phrases, and grammar tips that every beginner needs to speak French confidently.

Using our game-like, fun lessons, you will learn French from every angle:
* How words and phrases are used in real-life situations. Each phrase is accompanied by sound and plenty of examples.
* How to build sentences like a native.
* How to speak confidently. Our brilliant speech recognition system will help you practice your pronunciation.
* How to write correctly. You'll have the opportunity to elevate your skills with practical exercises and flashcards.

Lilata is more than just a learning tool, it's your personal language tutor and the best app to learn French on your own. It will let you know when you need to learn something new and when to review previous material. This keeps the daily lessons fresh and ensures long-term memorization as you practice. Additionally, Lilata calculates and displays your progress along the way.

A scientifically proven approach to memorizing vocabulary. Lilata’s learning curriculum is based on the principle of interval repetition at optimal points of the Ebbinghaus Curve of Forgetting. This method, similar to drops of knowledge in traditional flashcards, helps you retain what you learn and keep moving forward in your journey to master the language. This makes Lilata also a great brain training tool, enhancing cognitive functions while you learn.

Don’t know any French? That’s ok! Lilata is the best language app for beginners who want to learn French from scratch. It builds a learning habit by making lessons easy and enjoyable. Whether you're learning basic vocabulary, grammar, or taking a comprehensive learning approach, Lilata is designed to cater to all your language needs. After completing the basic course, you will be able to understand the most common everyday phrases and continue your journey to fluency.
 
Lilata’s approach makes your learning experience efficient and effective. As you make headway through the course, you’ll find yourself able to speak and understand French with ease. Like your own Rosetta Stone, Lilata helps you decode the French language in the most straightforward way possible.

Learn French and elevate your language skills with Lilata. It's fun, effective, and free to start. Picture this: you’re sitting in a charming Parisian café, confidently ordering drinks, chatting with locals, and understanding every word. Brilliant! Just a few drops of practice each day with Lilata will make this vision a reality.

Download the app and try it for free today!

Learn more about Lilata at https://lilata.com

title: French Dictionary - Offline
description: The French dictionary explains the meaning of French words, based on French Wiktionary. This is a monolingual French dictionary: words must be entered in French. Features: ♦ More than 399000 french definitions, large number of inflected forms and conjugation of verbs ♦ Fast as it works offline, internet is used only when a word is not found in the offline dictionary ♦ You can leaf through words using your finger (swipe right and left) ♦ Easy and functional user interface, optimized also for tablets ♦ Bookmarks and search history with option to backup your bookmarks ♦ Crossword help: the symbol ? can be used in place of single unknown letter. The symbol * can be used in place of any group of letters. ♦ Random search button (shuffle), useful to learn new words ♦ Share word definition using other apps, like gmail or whatsapp ♦ Compatible with Moon+ Reader and FBReader Your settings ♦ Black and white themes with user defined text colors (press menu-->select Settings-->click on Theme) ♦ Optional Floating Action Button (FAB) supporting one of the following actions: Search, History, Favorites, Random search and Share option ♦ Persistent Search option to get automatic keyboard at startup ♦ Text to speech options ♦ Number of items in history ♦ Customisable font size and line spacing You can listen to the word pronunciation, provided that voice data have been installed in your phone (Text-to-speech engine). Question & Answers: http://goo.gl/UnU7V Information about permissions used by the application can be found here: http://goo.gl/AsqT4C Information for application developers: ✔ This application provides Dictionary API for 3rd party developers, please read further details: http://thesaurus.altervista.org/dictionary-android Permissions: This application requires the following permissions: ♢ INTERNET - to retrieve the definition of words ♢ WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (aka Photos/Media/Files) - to backup configuration and bookmarks

title: TOEIC Vocabulary
description:
Are you preparing for TOEIC TEST? TOEIC Vocabulary app will help you have a solid vocabulary and familiarize yourself with common words in TOEIC TEST. TOEIC Vocabulary app is simple, useful and user-friendly. TOEIC Vocabulary app support translating English word to many other common languages.

Support 30 languages: English(default) Arabic,Bengali,Chinese(simplified),Chinese(traditional),Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish , French, German, Greek,Hindi,Hungarian,Indonesian,Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malaysian, Norwegian , Polish, Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese , Ukrainian Noticeable features: ✓ Mini multiple languages dictionary ✓ Filter word list by many conditions(studied, mark, phrase, suffix) ✓ Many practice types(quiz, write, puzzle, arrange, same mean) ✓ Remind every day ✓ Learn word quickly by using Widget at home screen ✓ Check grammar online free ✓ Practice history help user review later

Note: Please do not hesitate to contact us at app.aqa.contact@gmail.com if you experience any problems with the app and also if you have any suggestions to help us improve your experience. Thank you.

title: EWA: Learn English & Spanish
description:
Do you want to learn English with popular movies and TV shows? Or learn Spanish by reading books with bilingual translations and adapted audiobooks?

Improve your language skills while having fun with EWA’s unique language learning methodology, featuring:

● bite-sized lessons adapted for every level,
● 100% binge-worthy content,
● bilingual books with audio,
● interactive games and features,
● progress tracking, spaced repetition learning, and more!

Take your language learning to the next level with a top-reviewed language learning app. EWA is available in 35 languages and counting, and EWA has empowered over 60 million people worldwide to learn English, Spanish, French, or Italian.

👩‍🏫 Master Speaking with Movies/TV Shows

Want to learn English with your favorite movie hero or chat in Spanish to your most hated TV series villain?

EWA uses snippets from your favorite shows and movies to teach you new words and phrases in action to improve your speaking skills.

Regardless of your level, you’ll quickly gain the confidence you need to start speaking with content that’s fun and unforgettable.

Choose the topic and difficulty that best fits your goals and dive into one of our courses for language levels ranging from:
● Rookie
● Skilled
● Advanced
● Travel
● Business
● Grammar etc.

**We’re constantly expanding our library of courses to deliver you unique language learning options. Stay tuned for updates!**

📚 Improve Your Reading and Pronunciation with over 10,000 Books
Explore our extensive library in English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish! Expand & boost your vocabulary, master complex grammar, and perfect your pronunciation. 

Here’s how it works:

● Pick your difficulty (Rookie to Advanced)
● Choose a genre you love
● Wow - You’re reading your first book in a new language!
● Encountered a new word? Just tap on the word and EWA will display its translation. One more tap and you can add it to your “To-Learn” list.

Enjoy a wide selection of audiobooks that will help you start sounding like a native in no time! We’ve picked the most exciting, adventurous, spicy, hilarious titles - adapted for your level.

🗣 Oxford Topics Dialogues

Don't know what to say at passport control, how to ask for directions or order food at a café? Read and listen to dialogues on everyday topics, developed in collaboration with Oxford Reading University, that will help you in every journey of yours. Thanks to the dialogues, you'll be able to easily improve your conversational English by applying the material you've learned in real life!

🏆 Solidify Your Knowledge and Compete in Our Leaderboard

If you have trouble remembering what you just learned - EWA is the perfect app for you. With EWA, you can be certain that what you learn sticks! EWA also keeps you motivated by allowing you to track your progress and compete against language learners.

Challenge yourself with over 40,000 flashcards and amazing language games such as Wordcraft and Memento. Or challenge other learners to a language duel!

And here’s the best part:
EWA makes time work for you by testing your knowledge of new words right when they’re about to slip away from your memory.

The more you learn a new language, the better you get, and the higher you climb up EWA’s Leaderboard.Motivate yourself to stay on track with your learning, and you’ll soon be hitting those top spots!

**PLEASE READ:**

EWA features a selection of free content, but an EWA subscription is required in order to access all courses and learning features. Please note: available courses may vary depending on your device’s language. Once purchased, subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled before the end of the current payment period. Subscriptions can be managed or canceled in your Google Play Store account.

If you have any concerns, recommendations, or complaints just drop us a line at support@appewa.com and we’ll work towards making EWA better!

title: Answer.AI - Your AI tutor
description:
Take your learning further with Answer.AI—the AI-powered study companion, academic guide, and personal tutor available 24/7 to support your educational journey. From step-by-step explanations to personalized study tools, collaborative learning spaces, and college prep resources, Answer.AI helps you build confidence and deepen your understanding across subjects. 

Designed by educators, Answer.AI is trusted by a community of over 6 million learners who come together to expand their knowledge and develop critical thinking skills. Whether you're a student, teacher, or lifelong learner, our app is designed to support your unique learning needs, providing guidance and resources to help you achieve your personal and academic goals. 

Why answer.ai?
Learn anywhere.Built for mobile from day one, Answer.AI assists your school problem-solving anytime, anywhere. 

Deeper thinking, not just answers
Answer.AI provides step-by-step breakdowns and insights to help you grasp even the most challenging concepts. - 

Support beyond academics
With features like financial aid guidance and counseling, Answer.AI helps students navigate both their studies and future planning with confidence. 

Join 6 million+ learners
As an award-winning app founded by educators, Answer.AI is designed to enhance comprehension, boost confidence, and strengthen critical thinking skills.

【Answer.AI PRO PLAN】
Functions
• Unlimited usage
• 2x Faster query time
• Early access
Billing
• Payment
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
All premium plans will be auto-renewed at the end of each period.
Cancellation must be made at least 24 hours before the end of the valid period to avoid a nonrefundable auto-renewal.
Cancellation requests made prior to the end of the period will become effective at the end of that period term.
You can manage and turn off auto-renewal in your Apple Account Settings.
• PRO Plan Choices
Initiation or termination of a premium plan must be done through the iTunes App Store, which may be subject to sales tax in your area. Note: you are responsible for checking the Terms of Service of your app store for detail and applicability of sales tax.
• Refund
Please be aware that refund is NOT available after purchase.
• In-App Purchases
Refill packs provided

title: iHeart: Music, Radio, Podcasts
description:
Your Music, Your Stations & #1 For Podcasts. All Free.

Ring in the new year with iHeartRadio! Plan out your 2026 with the best podcasts to get you motivated for any of your resolutions this year. Keep up-to-date throughout the year with your favorite local, national and world radio stations for music and news.

Stream 1000s of live radio stations & unlimited free music playlists for any mood or activity. Play ad-free music, songs & playlists. Stream songs, podcasts & live sports for free on any device. Enjoy free music & podcasts on the go using iHeart with Android Auto to listen to travel music playlists.

Stream podcasts on hot topics: On Purpose with Jay Shetty, The Breakfast Club, Dateline, Crime Junkie, Stuff You Should Know, Gimlet or the Bobby Bones Show. Listen to The Herd with Colin Cowherd or NPR & discuss topics with podcast hosts.

Play sports radio stations & local AM / FM radio stations to get your live sports play by play. Connect with radio hosts on our Talkback mic & catch up on your favorite NFL, NBA & MLB teams. Fox Sports Radio, ESPN Radio & more.

Discover new music & top hits on live radio stations. Songs on demand or curated playlists: find new artists & elevate your music listening experience with millions of tracks from every genre. Country, Pop, Hip Hop, R&B, Rock & more.

Songs, podcasts or radio: listen to your favorites from local & world radio at any time, any place. Download iHeartRadio for free today!

iHeart: Music, Radio, Sports News & Podcasts App for Android Features

FREE RADIO APP: LIVE STREAMING & LOCAL RADIO STATIONS
• Live FM & AM radio app: 1000s of local & global live music favorites
• Free internet radio stations for sports news radio, world & local news news music
• Replace your radio tuner & satellite radio with the iHeart free music radio app
• Stream songs, listen offline & play music with national free radio stations & world radio with top hits
• Local radio stations: breaking local news radio

FREE SPORTS RADIO APP: LIVE SPORTS & FREE SPORTS STREAMING
• ESPN Radio, Fox Sports Radio, CBS Sports Radio & FNTSY Sports Radio: tune in to live sports & sports news radio
• Stream sports radio stations & sports news from top hosts
• Sports news radio: listen to NFL radio, NBA, NHL, NCAA, MLB, Soccer, Golf, Tennis
• Talk to free sports FM & AM radio hosts on sports news, highlights & commentary

FREE PODCAST APP: SPORTS PODCASTS, NEWS PODCASTS & MORE
• Play free podcasts & adjust podcast player speed
• Versatile podcasting library: free podcasts for sports news, free talk radio, true crime podcasts
• Top podcasts: ESPN, How Stuff Works, Black Effect, TED, Wondery, Morbid, The Dan Bongino Show

FREE MUSIC APP: LISTEN TO MUSIC, PLAYLISTS & RADIO
• Music playlists & free songs for you: mood, activity, decade, genre
• Your Weekly Mixtape: curated playlist with new music Mondays
• Song charts to listen to ad-free music streaming
• Pop, Hip Hop, R&B, Rock, Easy Listening Music, Alternative, Folk, Gospel, Christian, Dance, Indie & Country music radio
• Personalized music stations with favorite artists

PODCAST APP, SPORTS APP & MUSIC APP FOR FREE, ON THE GO
• Listen to free music & play podcasts anywhere
• Play free music online or music without WiFi
• Enjoy travel music playlists with car tunes for your next road trip

PREMIUM FEATURES
• Listen to playlists & music ad-free
• Ad-free songs on demand & unlimited skips: song, album or playlist
• Offline music app: download playlists, save & replay any song
• Listen on your phone, tablet, Chromecast or Wear OS
• Unlock iHeartRadio Plus™ & iHeartRadio All Access™

title: Lingo Legend Language Learning
description:
Learn a language while playing language learning games! Master Spanish, French, Mandarin, Korean, Japanese, Italian, German, Portuguese, Dutch, or Russian with our innovative language learning games. Dive into a fantasy world where learning languages is an adventure. Now featuring two exciting game modes!

*Farm Mode*
- Practice your language skills in a cozy, relaxing environment within the enchanting world of Lingo Legend.
- Plant and harvest crops, unlocking infrastructure to expand your farm.
- Customize your dream farm with tons of unique decorations.
- Breed and care for adorable farm animals, the naala.
- Meet new villagers and build lasting friendships.

*Adventure Mode*
- Test your language learning skills in strategic monster battles.
- Draw ability cards from a personalized deck and answer language flashcards to use them.
- Collect cards, choose your strategy, and build your deck.
- Embark on perilous journeys, meet captivating characters, and complete quests.
- Explore a dynamic, mysterious world filled with beautiful landscapes.
- Find recipes, gather materials, and craft gear to gain experience and style.
- Play as a customizable avatar with unique gear to collect and equip.
- Personalize your camp with tons of unlockable content.

Developed by language learning experts, Lingo Legend offers over 200 categories of grammar, vocabulary, and common phrases. It's the perfect app to complement or kick-start your language learning journey. Lingo Legend isn't just another language learning app—it's a real game!

*Supported Languages*
- French (France & Canadian)
- Spanish
- Japanese
- Korean
- Mandarin Chinese
- German
- Italian
- Portuguese (Brazilian & European)
- Dutch
- Russian

*Educational Features*
- Developed by language learning experts passionate about keeping you engaged.
- Learn words and phrases relevant to everyday life with themes like Ordering Food and Meeting New People.
- Ensure long-term retention with our spaced-repetition algorithm.
- Define your learning path and practice what you want, when you want.

Download Lingo Legend now and revolutionize your language learning with fun and interactive language games!

Have questions? Want to connect with us?
Contact support - support@lingolegend.com
Join Discord - https://discord.gg/TzWJSfzf4R
Follow on Twitter - https://twitter.com/LingoLegend

Privacy Policy - https://www.lingolegend.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use - https://www.lingolegend.com/terms-of-use

title: Write Wise: AI Grammar Checker
description: Write Wise is the ultimate AI-powered writing assistant that works across all apps, is compatible with all keyboards, and also offers a powerful editor within the app. It ensures flawless grammar, accurate spelling, and the perfect tone for any situation—whether for work, school, or personal use. It also helps you improve your English daily with simple and useful grammar tips. 🌟 AI-Powered Grammar, Spelling & Punctuation Checker Powered by the latest OpenAI GPT and Gemini models, with full respect for your data privacy. 🌟 Writing Assistance in All Other Apps Write Wise gives you real-time grammar and spelling corrections while typing in any app. Whether you’re messaging, emailing or posting on social media, Write Wise makes your text polished and professional without having to switch apps and without needing to copy and paste your text. ⌨️ Compatible with All Keyboards Write Wise works with all keyboards, Gboard, SwiftKey and Samsung Keyboard. No need to change your keyboard. 🌟 Tone Customization for Any Situation Adjust your writing style to match any occasion: 💼 Formal: Ideal for business emails and reports. 📚 Expansive: Perfect for creative and academic projects. 🔍 Clear: Simplify complex ideas for easy understanding. 💌 Friendly: Make your personal messages feel warm. And Also Additional options include Romantic, Empathetic, Concise, and more! 🌐 Summarize Website Content from Any URL Paste any website link and instantly get a clear, concise summary in your preferred language. 🌟 Daily Grammar and Spelling Tips Learn and grow every day with easy-to-digest lessons that improve your English skills over time. 📧 Email Composer Assistance Compose error-free, polished, formal emails with ease. Write Wise refines tone and corrects mistakes to ensure every message leaves the right impression. 🎙️ Voice to Text Convenience Turn your spoken words into written text in seconds. Write Wise automatically corrects grammar, refines spelling, and adapts the tone to your needs. 🌙 Customizable Writing Workspace ◉ Adjustable fonts and line spacing. ◉ Dark Mode for late-night inspiration. ◉ Text history to save and revisit your edits. 🌍 Multilingual Support & Built-In Translator Write in multiple languages with confidence. Check grammar and spelling in English, Spanish, French, and more. 🤖 Free and Effective Write Wise gives you full access to its essential features at no cost. ⚡ Only in Write Wise: Exclusive Features Probably You Won’t Find Elsewhere ✅ Custom Editor: Adjust font style, size, and spacing ✅ Instant Website Summarizer: Paste any URL to get a concise summary ✅ Smart Translations: Translate while keeping tone and intent ✅ Daily Grammar Tips: Improve your English with quick, practical lessons ✅ Dark Mode: Comfortable writing any time, day or night 🔐 Your Privacy Matters Your text is processed securely and never stored. Learn more at writewiseapp.com/privacy-policy. The Accessibility permission is used for real-time grammar and spelling corrections while typing in other apps. It is also used to automatically enable assistance when you start typing. This permission is not required for the Write Wise in-app editor.

title: HelloChinese: Learn Chinese
description: HelloChinese is the best Mandarin Chinese learning app for beginners! Designed in a fun and highly effective manner, HelloChinese helps you rapidly learn Mandarin Chinese from scratch to a conversational level. With HelloChinese, learners can "learn the Chinese language, explore Chinese culture" – you will not only learn Mandarin Chinese but also enjoy the process of delving into the culture intertwined with the language. Features: ◉ Game-based Chinese learning: You will never get bored. ◉ 1000+ graded stories: read engaging stories at your level! ◉ Immersive lessons help you to have real-life, practical conversations quickly. ◉ Over 2,000 videos - all featuring authentic Chinese speakers! ◉ Innovative self-adaptive learning games that incorporate Chinese cultural education. ◉ Speech recognition corrects your pronunciation and makes speaking Chinese a breeze. ◉ Handwriting specially designed to learn Chinese characters at a faster rate. ◉ Systematic courses based on HSK levels. ◉ A well-designed Pinyin (pronunciation) course for newbies. ◉ Bite-sized curriculum to fortify your Chinese listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. ◉ Simplified and traditional Chinese(Mandarin) are both supported. ◉ Offline accessibility: Once a course is downloaded, no internet connection is required. ◉ Study progress tracking across multiple devices. With these tools at your disposal, nothing can stop you from mastering Chinese. Start on your path to fluency today! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HelloChineseApp/ Privacy Policy: http://www.hellochinese.cc/privacy.html Terms of Use: http://www.hellochinese.cc/terms.html Premium users can always reach us at premium@hellochinese.cc if they need any help.

title: TOEIC® 900点突破！英単語アプリ 英熟語もできる
description:
・Required if you aim for TOEIC scores of 500 to 900 or more! Complete coverage of English words and phrases!
・Although it is completely free, 4,000 words with pronunciation are already included. You can also master listening.
- Completely free to use as much as you want!


・Leave it to the app to determine the degree of word retention
You no longer need to keep track of whether or not you have memorized words. The app uses its own algorithm to determine whether it has memorized the information. Let's learn more and more words that we don't remember!

・Listen to the pronunciation and practice your listening skills!
You can listen to the pronunciation of all words. You can also develop listening skills.

・Quick memory check with 4-choice learning
Check if you can remember each word in 3 seconds and 10 words in 30 seconds.
You can proceed quickly like a game!

・Spelling test with sample sentences to help you learn practical English
The spelling test uses a fill-in-the-blank format with example sentences. Since you can memorize words while using them in actual contexts, you can also improve your practical English skills.

- Accumulate learning records and increase motivation
All learning done within the app is accumulated and visualized in the "Learning record" tab.
Study hard every day and master English!

・It's free, but there are few ads.
It's completely free, but there are no full-screen ads to interfere with operation. Easy to use.


This app contains 4,000 English words and idioms needed to aim for a TOEIC score of 500 to 900 or higher, categorized by level.
Listen and study -> 4 choices, spelling test -> Listen and study -> 4 choices, spelling test -> Repeat to pass the level ability test
Repeat this cycle to deepen your English vocabulary.


[Recommended for these people]
・I want to use free time such as commuting to work or school to make it meaningful by studying English.
・My ability is around 500 points on TOEIC, but I want to improve it further.
・I want to do not only a 4-choice test but also a spelling test.

title: TutorLily: AI Language Tutor
description:
Become fluent through real conversations with Tutor Lily, your personal language tutor! 👩‍🏫

Are you tired of traditional language learning apps that focus solely on vocabulary and grammar rules?🤦 Frustrated by the lack of real-world speaking practice?🙁 Look no further – Tutor Lily is here to revolutionize your language learning journey! 🚀

Tutor Lily currently supports: English 🇬🇧, Spanish 🇪🇸, French 🇫🇷, German 🇩🇪, Italian 🇮🇹, Portuguese 🇧🇷, Japanese 🇯🇵, Korean 🇰🇷, Chinese 🇨🇳, Arabic 🇸🇦, Dutch 🇳🇱, Russian 🇷🇺, Turkish 🇹🇷, Ukrainian 🇺🇦, Greek 🇬🇷, Polish 🇵🇱, Swedish 🇸🇪, Hindi 🇮🇳, and much more!


💬 Personalized Conversations: Tutor Lily adapts to your proficiency level, engaging you in meaningful interactive conversations.

🔍 Instant Corrections & Explanations: Automatically highlights and corrects your mistakes, with detailed explanations for every single mistake.

🎤 Voice Recognition & Pronunciation: Speak to Tutor Lily with your own voice to perfect your pronunciation. 

🙌 Hands-Free Mode: Practice your language skills on the go, whether you're cooking, jogging, or commuting.

🎲 Topics: Change the topic anytime to steer the conversation, including: Travel, Food, Movies, TV Shows, Music, Sports, Hobbies, etc.

🎭 Roleplays: Practice real-life situations such as ordering food at a restaurant, interviewing for a job, etc.

🦸‍♂️ Characters: Chat with your favorite movie characters, celebrities, or historical figures including: Harry Potter, James Bond, Taylor Swift, Snoop Dogg, Elon Musk, Barack Obama, and more!

💡 Suggestions: Get inspiration when you're stuck to keep the conversation flowing.

🔄 Translation Tool: Overcome language barriers mid-conversation with instant translations to help you finish that sentence.


So why choose Tutor Lily?...

🕒 Available 24/7: Learn anytime, anywhere. Tutor Lily is always ready to chat, fitting perfectly into your busy schedule.

🚀 Fast & Efficient: Tutor Lily's real-time feedback, explanations, and personalized approach allow you to learn more effectively, saving time and accelerating your progress.

😊 Judgment-Free Zone: Feel shy about making mistakes? Tutor Lily provides a safe, supportive environment for you to practice without fear or embarrassment.

💰 Affordable Tutoring: Get personalized coaching at a fraction of the cost of private tutors.

🔒 Privacy & Security: We value your privacy and ensure that all user data is protected and secure.

💡 Continuous Improvement: We are dedicated to enhancing Tutor Lily with new features, languages, and improvements based on user feedback and Generative AI innovations.


Download the Tutor Lily app now, and embark on your language learning journey. Gain confidence in your language skills, and unlock your potential!

Your feedback is important to us! If you have any suggestions, questions, or issues, please contact us at support@tutorlily.com. We are always here to help and continuously improve Tutor Lily for a better language learning experience.

Don't wait any longer. Join thousands of satisfied learners, and start mastering a second language today! 🌍🚀


"I've made more progress in the past few months than I ever thought possible!" - Sarah L. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

"Thank you for creating such a fun, informative, helpful app!" - Miranda G. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

"Best on the market, bar none. Definitely worth upgrading to the PRO version." - Eric K. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

title: Coursera: Grow your career
description:
Start, switch, or advance your career with more than 8,000 courses, hands-on projects, certificate programs, and degrees. Coursera partners with world-class companies and universities, so that you can learn with experts and build the most job-relevant, in-demand skills.

WITH COURSERA YOU CAN:
• Learn job-relevant skills and industry-standard tools through hands-on projects
• Build knowledge for your career across a wide range of industry-tailored courses
• Get job-ready for an in-demand role through Professional Certificates
• Master a skill in a specific industry field with Specializations
• Advance your career with a bachelor’s or master’s degree

SO THAT YOU’LL BE ABLE TO:
• Grow your career with confidence
• Develop skills and credentials to stand out
• Enjoy flexibility and control over your career

WITH THE COURSERA APP YOU GET:
• Flexible schedules and on-demand courses
• Downloadable videos for offline viewing
• Audio-only supported courses, so you can learn when and where you want
• Mobile-friendly courses, so you can learn effectively on any device
• Saved coursework, quizzes and projects across your desktop and mobile devices
• Video subtitles for a variety of languages, including: Arabic, French, German, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese, and Spanish

POPULAR COURSES:
• Computer Science: Programming, Mobile and Web Development, Python
• Data Science: Machine Learning, Probability and Statistics, Data Analysis
• Business: Finance, Marketing, Entrepreneurship, Business Strategy, E-commerce, UX, Design
• Information Technology: Cloud Computing, Support and Operations, Data Management, Security

PROFESSIONAL CERTIFICATE PROGRAMS:
• Front end developer, back-end developer, DevOps engineer
• Data analyst, data scientist, data engineer, data warehouse developer
• Project manager, UX designer, digital marketer, social media marketer, marketing analyst

title: Minecraft Education
description:
THIS APP IS FOR SCHOOL AND ORGANIZATIONAL USE. 

Minecraft Education is a game-based platform that inspires creative, inclusive learning through play. Explore blocky worlds that unlock new ways to tackle any subject or challenge. 

Dive into subjects like reading, math, history, and coding with lessons and standardized curriculum designed for all types of learners. Or explore and build together in creative open worlds.

USE IT YOUR WAY
With hundreds of ready-to-teach lessons, creative challenges, and blank canvas worlds, there are lots of ways to make Minecraft Education work for your students. It’s easy to get started, no gaming experience necessary.

PREPARE STUDENTS FOR THE FUTURE
Help learners develop key key skills like problem solving, collaboration, digital citizenship, and critical thinking to help students them thrive now and in the future workplace. Spark a  passion for STEM.

GAME-BASED LEARNING
Unlock creativity and deep learning with immersive content created with partners including BBC Earth, NASA, and the Nobel Peace Center. Inspire students to engage in real-world topics with culturally relevant lessons and build challenges.

KEY FEATURES 
 - Multiplayer mode enables collaboration in-game across platforms, devices, and hybrid environments 
 - Code Builder supports block-based coding, JavaScript, and Python with intuitive interface and in-game execution
 - Immersive Reader helps players read and translate text 
 - Camera and Book & Quill items allow documentation and export of in-game-creations
 - Integration with Microsoft Teams and Flipgrid supports assessment and teacher controls

Minecraft Education licenses can be purchased with Admin access to a Microsoft 365 Admin Center account. Talk to your Tech Lead for information on academic licensing. 

Terms of use: The terms that apply to this download are the terms that were presented when you purchased your Minecraft Education subscription.

Privacy policy: https://aka.ms/privacy

title: TOEIC Assessments
description:
This application allows you to take tests in the TOEIC® assessment portfolio. This includes the TOEIC® Listening and Reading test and the TOEIC® Speaking and Writing tests, which provide a fair and valid assessment of English-language proficiency for the workplace. The portfolio also includes the TOEIC® Bridge Listening and Reading tests and the TOEIC® Bridge Speaking and Writing tests, which measure basic to intermediate English-language proficiency and focus on communication tasks used in everyday life.

Copyright:  Test questions are copyrighted by Educational Testing Service © 2025. All rights reserved.

title: Learn English Speak Language
description:
Learn English language, alphabet and grammar with LuvLingua.

Begin the learning experience already enjoyed by millions around the world.
LuvLingua education apps teach you through fun games, and beginner to intermediate level courses.
Study core words and essential phrases to build a strong foundation of English.
Understand and speak English to communicate more effectively!
Recommended for students, teachers, travellers, and business people who want to learn English.

Gain confidence and level up your ability with the beginner course.
200+ lessons that systematically teach and review new vocabulary, as well as help you construct sentences and questions.
Designed for students to train and improve fundamental language skills & knowledge.

Made by teachers to support and cater to different learning styles.
 - Visual (Picture & Memory Game)
 - Auditory (Listening Quiz)
 - Read-Write (Writing & Multichoice Quiz, Word Guess)
 - Kinesthetic (Animation & Target Game)
Progress in simple, easy stages and remember new lingo in a fast, fun way.

Convenient and interactive phrasebook, full of useful everyday conversation, and sorted into helpful categories.
The phrasebook includes vocabulary and dialogues for greetings, asking directions and telling time.
Test the basics with flashcards of numbers, food, clothing, colors and body parts.
Learn vocabulary and conversation to use in emergencies, school, shopping, travel and work.

Listen to high quality authentic audio of native speakers with clear pronunciation.
Test your listening and speaking ability, and master the correct pronunciation.

Alphabet lookup menu and quiz.
Recognise, read and test the alphabet.

Grammar section and sentence builder.
Practice, review and improve your grammar ability.
Study the nouns, verbs and adjectives you need.

Quickly and easily lookup a word or phrase in the search section and save it to your favorites for later study.
Track your progress and gain achievements.
Options to change user language, hide / show romanisation.

Words are translated into over 30 languages including English, Spanish, French, German and Chinese (simplified and traditional characters).
Carefully translated by bilingual native speakers and not by computers / online translators.

Learn offline without internet connection.
This app is for all ages. All content in this app is safe for kids and adults.
Lots of free content. Buy the subscription to access all the content.

More advanced curriculum will be added soon.
We are committed to regularly updating this app.
Please send us suggestions about what we can add or improve.
Bugs, feedback or support => luvlingua@gmail.com

Learn English for travel in England, America, work, school, or to talk to friends.

Love Learning Languages
LuvLingua

121536 example sentences to put words into context, with pronunciations

title: Wlingua - Learn English
description:
Learning English has never been so easy. It's perfect for you, whether you already have a beginner, basic, intermediate, or advanced level of English. Thanks to our online English courses, you’ll notice your English improving very quickly. Millions of students have already tried our courses. Would you like to join them?

Our Online English Courses:

English Course In this course you will learn English from scratch. Guaranteed! Regardless of the level you start from, it is designed to help you learn English from day one. Advanced English Course In this course, you will continue to improve your English until you master it like a native. An advanced English course with detailed explanations written in English that will leave you speechless. Ideal for challenge lovers. B2 First Course This course is designed for people who are going to take the B2 First exam. You will find a multitude of practices for the sections of the test like, Use of English, Reading, and Listening. English Irregular Verbs Course In this course you will practice irregular English verbs. This is extra practice recommended for people who are already doing the General English course. British and American English Pronunciation Courses The English alphabet has 26 letters, but more than 40 different sounds! In the pronunciation courses you will be able to learn to distinguish them, see example words of each of them, and practice all of them using various exercises. English Phrasal Verbs Course In this course you will study the most used phrasal verbs in everyday life. You will learn the meaning of more than 290 phrasal verbs and will be provided with example sentences and extra practice exercises. Designed for people who are already in the last level of the General English course, and who can already get by with English. All explanations are in English. And much more… You will also find additional courses to improve your English in the workplace. On the Phone Course Writing Course Speaking Course Logistics Course

Our Learning Method:

A learning process designed for you that is both easy and guided: You’ll feel like you’re learning more and more English every day. Every sentence, exercise, review, and reading has been carefully selected for you. Audio clips in British English and American English: A wide variety of accents with clear, crisp pronunciation. Recorded by professional narrators. Linked concepts: Each word is linked to its use or precise meaning. When you click on the words in each sentence, exercise, or reading, their meaning or an explanation of their use will appear. Vocabulary: Learn the meaning, pronunciation, and use of words with activities adapted to your progress. Grammar exercises: Practice your grammar with exercises linked to explanations. Vocabulary topics: Words are grouped by topic categories. Spaced reviews: Review the vocabulary and grammar at increasingly long intervals. Search function: Find whatever you’re looking for, including vocabulary and grammar. Reading comprehension texts (readings): Learn and practice with conversations, news, emails, and interviews, among others. Certificates: Earn a certificate that proves your knowledge at the end of each level. Account types: ✔ Basic: With a Basic account, the course is free, but has some limitations. ✔ Premium: With a Premium account, you’ll have access to all course content and activities. Download our app to learn English!

title: YoloAI AI education & learning
description:
YoloAI is a groundbreaking AI-powered learning platform that redefines efficiency and accessibility in modern education. Whether you’re focused on e-learning, preparing for school tests, university exams, professional training, or even language studies, this app is your ideal partner for success.

Why choose YoloAI?
- For learners of all ages: From elementary school students to adults pursuing professional certification, YoloAI is designed to cater to everyone. Accessible anytime and anywhere, this virtual learning assistant supports your study efforts 24/7.
- Personalized learning & e-learning focus: YoloAI delivers a personalized e-learning experience by tailoring its approach to your individual goals and interests. It seamlessly integrates into your study workflow, offering precise answers and assistance based on your uploaded textbooks, course materials, or training guides.
- Your AI-powered teacher: Acting like a private tutor, YoloAI is here to make learning easier. Whether you need help solving math problems, mastering English grammar, or preparing for tests or exams, the app is always ready to guide you.
- Textbook-centric learning: Maximize your study efficiency by uploading personal study materials, notes, or textbooks. YoloAI adapts to your academic requirements, ensuring relevant, accurate information every time you engage with it.
- Exclusive GPT-driven features: From training sessions to graduation test preparation, YoloAI simplifies the process with cutting-edge GPT technology. Advanced features such as EssayMaster (for effortless essay writing), ClassNotes (for summarizing materials via audio), and CampusConnect (for direct communication with your school or university) place YoloAI ahead of traditional learning tools.

Key features
- Textbook queries & instant answers: Upload your textbooks or training guides, and YoloAI will instantly provide precise, document-based answers to your questions. This feature ensures that all sourced information is accurate and reliable.
- Personal digital library: By integrating your materials into the app, YoloAI becomes a fully customizable educational companion—making studying for exams, tests, or assignments more streamlined than ever.
- Voice-based assistance: Simplify your learning process by using YoloAI’s voice-based tools to summarize, explore, or learn through auditory support. The ClassNotes feature (coming soon) will also help you create efficient summaries in seconds.
- Targeted for success in exams & graduation prep: Whether preparing for university entrance exams, professional certifications, or your upcoming school test, YoloAI supports every educational milestone.
- Essay generation made easy with AI: Perfect your writing with the EssayMaster feature (coming soon), which simplifies essay creation, outlines, and content analysis based on your study materials.

Who can benefit from YoloAI?
- For students: Preparing for school tests, graduation exams, or university entrance? YoloAI is here to make subjects like math, English, and more easier and more enjoyable.
- For university learners: Excel in your exams with a fully tailored AI experience. Whether focusing on theoretical or applied knowledge, YoloAI adapts to your individual needs.
- For lifelong learners: Discover new skills, complete professional training programs, or prepare for specialized certifications—YoloAI is designed to make continuous learning effortless.
- For teachers and educators: Streamline your teaching process by utilizing AI-powered tools to share educational materials, prepare lesson plans, or assist students directly.
- For parents: Simplify homework sessions, track your child’s progress, and enhance learning with YoloAI’s interactive tools—bringing education home in a meaningful way.

Join thousands of users worldwide and experience the future of learning with YoloAI. Download now and take the first step toward your brighter future!

Achieve more with YoloAI!

title: PictureThis - Plant Identifier
description: PictureThis identifies 1,000,000+ plants daily with over 98% accuracy—your personal plant expert in your pocket. Whether you're a seasoned gardener or a budding plant parent, PictureThis makes plant identification and care easy and accessible. Discover the power of plant knowledge, get answers to your gardening questions, and transform your garden with confidence. KEY FEATURES: Accurate Plant Identifier Renowned as the best plant identification app, PictureThis offers unmatched accuracy and user-friendliness, making plant identification effortless. Identify over 400,000+ plant species with over 98% accuracy. Just take a picture, and our revolutionary identification engine will provide the plant’s name and detailed information instantly. Wondering about the name of a beautiful plant you saw on a walk? Simply snap a photo and let PictureThis do the rest! Plant Disease Auto Diagnose & Cure Snap a photo of a sick plant, and PictureThis will diagnose the disease and offer treatment advice. It’s like having a plant doctor on call! Your favorite houseplant has developed brown spots on its leaves. Take a picture using PictureThis, and within seconds, receive a diagnosis and step-by-step treatment plan to restore your plant’s health. Personalized Care Plans Need advice on how to care for your plants? PictureThis provides detailed care instructions, including how often to water, when to fertilize, and the best light conditions, ensuring your plant thrives. Toxic Plant Warning Identify toxic plants and receive warnings to keep your pets, children, and family safe. You bring home a new plant but are unsure if it’s safe for your pets. PictureThis will alert you if the plant is toxic and provide safety guidelines to protect your loved ones. Weed Identification Easily identify weeds in your garden and get tips on how to control or remove them. If you notice a new plant growing in your garden beds and suspect it might be a weed, snap a photo with PictureThis to confirm its identity and receive guidance on how to manage it effectively. Water Tracker＆Reminder Never forget to water your plants again with timely notifications. Busy schedule making it hard to remember when to water your plants? PictureThis sends you reminders so you can keep your plants hydrated and healthy without the guesswork. Light Exposure Monitoring Track how much sunlight your plant is getting with our light meter to ensure it’s getting the right amount of light. You’re worried your indoor plant isn’t getting enough light. Use the PictureThis light meter to check its exposure and adjust its position for optimal growth. Manage Your Plant Collection Track all the plants you identify and build your own plant wishlist. Create your personal fingertip garden with PictureThis. You have a growing collection of plants and want to keep track of them. Use PictureThis to catalog your plants, including photos and notes, and create a wishlist for future purchases. Expert Consultation Have plant-related questions? Chat with our experts 24/7 to get personalized advice and tips tailored to your specific gardening needs. Join PictureThis today and take your gardening experience to the next level! Wonder no more—identify, learn, and care for your plants with us. Let's make the world greener, one plant at a time. CONNECT WITH US Facebook.com/PictureThisAI Twitter.com/PictureThisAI Instagram.com/PictureThisA

Learn vocabulary through visual flashcards and spaced repetition Word of the Day feature to expand your English vocabulary daily Gamified learning that makes building vocabulary fun and addictive Comprehensive courses from basic to advanced English words Grammar improvement tools that eliminate the need for Grammarly Proven methods to help you learn new words and retain them longer 📖 VOCABULARY BUILDER COURSES 1. Basic English Vocabulary (200+ words) Start your journey to learn English vocabulary with essential everyday words. Perfect for beginners who want to build a strong foundation. 2. Intermediate Vocabulary Builder (500+ words) Elevate your English with carefully curated word lists. Ideal for IELTS and TOEFL preparation. Learn words that matter in academic and professional settings. 3. Advanced Vocabulary Master (1000+ words) Master complex English vocabulary for GRE, GMAT, and competitive exams. Learn sophisticated words to excel in advanced English communication. 4. English Idioms & Phrases (250+ expressions) Understand native English expressions and phrasal verbs. Essential for fluent English speaking and writing. 5. Commonly Confused Words Master homophones, homonyms, and tricky English words that often confuse learners. 🎮 VOCABULARY GAMES THAT TEACH Words Checker: Build vocabulary through reading comprehension Space Pursuit: Learn English spelling and confused words Fly High: Master synonyms and expand your word knowledge Echo: Improve pronunciation with dictation exercises Word Maze: Test your vocabulary in challenging puzzles Spell Safe: Perfect your English spelling skills ✨ POWERFUL FEATURES Visual Flashcards: Learn vocabulary with memorable images and examples Spaced Repetition: Scientifically proven method to remember words longer Daily Vocabulary: New English words delivered daily Personalized Learning: Adaptive tests that match your level Progress Tracking: Monitor your vocabulary growth Offline Mode: Learn English words anywhere, anytime Grammar Mini-Courses: Master prepositions, conjunctions, and more 📈 PERFECT FOR: Students preparing for IELTS, TOEFL, GRE, GMAT, CAT, XAT, NMAT Professionals wanting to improve their business English vocabulary Anyone who wants to learn new words daily and speak fluently English learners at all levels - beginner to advanced Writers looking to expand their vocabulary range 🏆 JOIN 5 MILLION+ LEARNERS Users report significant vocabulary improvement within weeks. Our bite-sized lessons fit perfectly into your daily routine - learn English vocabulary during your commute, coffee break, or before bed. 📱 LEARN VOCABULARY ON-THE-GO 5-minute daily sessions to build vocabulary consistently Downloadable flashcards for offline vocabulary learning Sync progress across all your devices Learn at your own pace with no pressure Start your vocabulary journey today! Download Knudge.me FREE and discover how easy it is to learn English words, improve your vocabulary, and communicate with confidence.
