title: Complete English grammar Book
description:
The Complete English Grammar, Speaking, and Conversation App is the perfect tool for improving English grammar, speaking, and conversation skills. Designed for beginners and intermediate learners, this app helps you enhance grammar, vocabulary, and fluency with a step-by-step approach. It covers everything from basic grammar rules to advanced topics, making you confident in speaking and writing English.

Grammar Topics & Concepts
This app helps you understand and apply essential grammar rules with topics like:

Parts of Speech: Learn about nouns, verbs, adjectives, adverbs, and more.

Phrases & Clauses: Understand their types and usage in sentences.

Singular & Plural Verbs: Learn the correct verb usage in sentences.

Tenses: Master all 12 English tenses with examples and explanations.

Degrees of Comparison: Learn comparative & superlative forms.

Active & Passive Voice: Improve writing and speaking skills.

Articles, Prepositions & Sentence Patterns: Master the use of a, an, the, in, on, at, etc.

Question Tags: Form question tags to make conversations more natural.

Infinitive & Gerund: Learn their correct usage.

Direct & Indirect Speech: Understand reported speech.

Phrasal Verbs: Learn common phrasal verbs like give up, take off.

Punctuation Marks: Use commas, periods, question marks, and more correctly.

Vocabulary & Speaking Topics
Expand your vocabulary and fluency with topics like:

Phrases & Idioms: Sound more like a native speaker.

Homophones & Contractions: Understand words that sound the same and contractions like don’t = do not.

Feeling Words: Express emotions effectively.

Synonyms & Antonyms: Learn words with similar or opposite meanings.

Telling About Yourself: Practice introducing yourself and talking about interests.

Agreeing & Disagreeing: Learn phrases for expressing agreement and disagreement.

Telling Time: Learn different ways to express time.

Saying Goodbye: Learn various ways to say goodbye.

Reading & Writing Skills
Improve your reading and writing with activities like:

Cloze Test: Fill in blanks to test grammar and vocabulary.

Reading Comprehension: Read passages and answer questions.

Vocabulary-Building Articles: Improve vocabulary and comprehension.

News Articles: Learn new words and stay updated on global events.

Writing Skills: Practice writing news articles, resumes, cover letters, and essays.

Additional Learning Features
Make learning fun with:
Conversations: Learn real-life conversation skills.
Short Stories: Improve reading and vocabulary.
Word Search, Proverbs, Riddles & Quotes: Enjoy learning in an interactive way.
Interview Questions: Practice for job interviews.
Letter Templates: Learn to write formal and informal letters.

Verbs & Tenses Mastery
A key feature of this app is mastering verbs and tenses. Learn how to use past, present, and future tenses, including present perfect and future perfect continuous, to improve fluency and writing.

Grammar Exercises & Quizzes
Reinforce learning with interactive grammar exercises and quizzes covering sentence structure, vocabulary, and tenses. Track progress and improve step by step.

Why Choose English Grammar Book App?
The Complete English Grammar, Speaking, and Conversation App is an all-in-one solution for learning grammar, vocabulary, and speaking skills. Whether you want to practice verb tenses, nouns, adverbs, phrases, or fluency, this app helps you gain confidence and accuracy in English.

Start your learning journey today! Download now and master English step by step!

title: Speak: Language Learning
description:
Get ready to take your language skills to the next level with Speak, the ultimate language learning app focusing on improving your speaking abilities. Powered by cutting-edge AI technology, Speak ensures that you gain fluency by engaging in real-life conversations and receiving instant feedback. Whether you are learning Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese or Korean, Speak's AI-powered lessons will have you learning a new language fast.

With Speak, you'll feel like you have a personal language tutor right in your pocket. Our app provides immersive speaking practice sessions that simulate real-life scenarios, allowing you to become confident in your conversational Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese and Korean skills. The advanced AI function analyzes your speech, providing valuable assessment on pronunciation, intonation, and fluency. Say goodbye to those language barriers as you receive real-time feedback, enabling you to make necessary adjustments and improve your speaking skills on the spot.

Our comprehensive language learning curriculum is available for Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese and Korean learners, ensuring that you become fluent. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Speak caters to your individual needs and helps you progress at your own pace. You'll love the personalized progress tracking, which helps you identify areas that need improvement, allowing you to focus your efforts effectively.

Speak's method is simple:
STEP 1: Do a real language learning lesson!
Learn real-life, essential phrases with your dedicated local teacher.

STEP 2: Practice speaking the language!
Repeat the learned phrases until you can speak without thinking twice!

STEP 3: AI Tutor provides personalized language feedback!
With the latest AI technology, you can practice anywhere and anytime! Get real-time feedback on pronunciations, grammar, and much more.

STEP 4: Real conversations in your chosen language!
Now put what you've learned into real-life situations and speak with confidence!

No more boring textbooks or one-sided conversations! With Speak, you'll experience interactive and engaging language practice that feels like a real-life conversation. Break free from traditional language learning and download Speak now! Gain fluency, receive real-time feedback, and become a confident speaker in Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese or Korean.

There are plenty of other language apps out there, but Speak's key difference comes down to getting you speaking Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese or Korean out loud on day 1.

SPEAK MEMBERSHIP

Speak offers both monthly and annual auto-renewing subscriptions. Become a Speak Member to gain unlimited access to all courses, singles, review material, and other content within Speak.

The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your Google Play Account settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can go to your Google Play Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your Google Play Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed.

Terms of Service: https://speak.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://speak.com/privacy

title: Wordela - Vocabulary Builder
description:
Elevate your vocabulary skills with Wordela! Dive into a world of words, enrich your vocabulary, and express yourself with confidence. Whether you're a student, professional, or language enthusiast, Wordela is your gateway to mastering the art of words.

Key Features:

📚 Vocabulary Builder: Expand your vocabulary effortlessly by learning new words and their meanings with extensive word library. Wordela provides definitions, synonyms, and example sentences for every word, making learning a breeze.

🌟 Daily Challenges: Challenge yourself daily with the curated word challenges. Sharpen your linguistic prowess and earn rewards as you progress through increasingly challenging levels.

🚀 Progress Tracking: Monitor your language learning journey with detailed progress tracking. Set personal goals, and watch as you climb the ranks of word mastery.

📱 Cross-Platform Play: Seamlessly switch between your smartphone and tablet. Your progress and achievements are synchronized across devices.
Wordela is not just an app; it's a linguistic adventure! Whether you're a language enthusiast, a student looking to improve your vocabulary, or simply someone who loves a good word challenge, Wordela is your go-to app. Start your journey to word mastery today!

Don't miss out on the wordplay revolution. Download Wordela now and transform the way you interact with words!

Scientific English level test and practice schedule

title: IELTS Complete Preparation
description:
"IELTS Complete Preparation and Exam" is an application to help you improve your IELTS skills.
With IELTS Tips in IELTS Complete Preparation and Exam app, you will find the tips that show you some ways to get high score, how to make an IELT Test.

With IELTS Reading, it provides information, knowledge and some Reading Test for IELTS with answers.

With IELTS Writing, it provides knowledge, sample IELTS Writing Test and information of IELTS Writing for your IELTS Exam. On each topic, ideas are categorized so that learner can practice and summarize easily.

Base on the suggested ideas, learners will be able to develop their own essay
Store the developed essay for reference purpose
With IELTS Speaking:

Prepare with confidence for your upcoming IELTS Academic or General Training test. The IELTS Prep App gives you instant, unlimited access to all the right tools you need to prepare for your test – anytime, anywhere.

TOP FEATURES :-
1. Comprehensive overview of the IELTS tests
• Practice your Listening, Reading, Writing and Speaking skills with our expert tools

2. Free practice tests
• Prepare for the types of questions you’ll find in the test

3. Grammar exercises
• Improve your understanding of tenses and other key English grammar, track your progress with quizzes

It's Also includes :-

1) IELTS Speaking test advice for IELTS exam.
2) Many IELTS sample speaking with solution.
3) This app has Audio speaking test also.
4) It shows plenty of techniques for improving band score.
With IELTS Listening:
* There are 3 levels in IELTS Listening. Each level has 34 lessons. Basing on capability, listener should choose corresponding level.
* Display transcript and exercise while opening audio.
* IELTS Listening can run on two modes: online and offline.
* Support downloading audio and listen at offline mode.
* IELTS Listening has irregular verbs table. It will support listener while doing exercise or simply check irregular verb.
Hope that you love this app and give it 5 stars in rating.
If you have any suggestion, please feel free to leave us review or contact us.
Thanks!

title: Learn French with Le Monde
description:
Frantastique provides daily personalized French lessons. Test Frantastique for free and get a level assessment and a personalized pedagogical report! It’s the easiest, friendliest way to learn French: 

. More than 2,000,000 people use our method
. Long-term results 
. A personalized approach 
. Modern and business French 
. Adapted for post-beginners (from 15 years old)

Personalized French Content: Frantastique lessons are based on your needs, your requests, and your level. You’ll come across professional scenarios, a variety of accents, exercises and plenty of humor. 10 to 15 minutes daily is all it takes! 

Motivation, Humor and French Culture: Discover the diversity and richness of French culture around the world with the help of Victor Hugo and friends. Every day, you'll come across different accents, songs, and films in addition to original stories and texts. 

Tailored Corrections: After clicking the 'send' button, you will receive a correction with your daily score, explanations of your answers, scripts of dialogues or videos, the vocabulary you have requested and more. 

Progress: Each Frantastique lesson is built dynamically to focus on points of difficulty and your own requests, to ensure you've committed information to your long-term memory. Your French will improve effortlessly, daily and over the long term! 


You can try Frantastique for 7 days free of charge. This test is limited to the first seven days of the program, and is absolutely free and non-binding. Under no circumstances will you be registered for the full, paying version of our lessons without your explicit consent. We guarantee the confidentiality of your personal details. 

Frantastique is designed, edited and developed in its entirety by A9 SAS Gymglish.

title: Stellarium Mobile - Star Map
description: Stellarium Mobile - Star Map is a planetarium app that shows exactly what you see when you look up at the stars. Identify stars, constellations, planets, comets, satellites (such as the ISS), and other deep sky objects in real time in the sky above you in just a few seconds, just by pointing the phone at the sky! This astronomy application has an easy to use and minimalist user interface, that makes it one of the best astronomical applications for adults and children who want to explore the night sky. Stellarium Mobile features: ★ View an accurate night sky simulation of stars and planets for any date, time and location. ★ Dive in a collection of many stars, nebulas, galaxies, star clusters and other deep sky objects. ★ Zoom on realistic Milky Way and Deep Sky Objects images. ★ Discover how people living in other regions of the planet see the stars by selecting the shapes and illustrations of the constellations for many sky cultures. ★ Track artificial satellites, including the International Space Station. ★ Simulate landscape and atmosphere with realistic sunrise, sunset and atmosphere refraction. ★ Discover 3D rendering of the major solar system planets and their satellites. ★ Observe the sky in night mode (red) to preserve your eyes adaptation to darkness. Stellarium Mobile contains in-app purchases allowing to upgrade to Stellarium Plus. With this upgrade, the app will display objects as faint as magnitude 22 (versus magnitude 8 in the base version) and enable advanced observing features. Stellarium Plus features (unlocked with in-app purchase): ★ Reach the limit of knowledge by diving in a massive collection of stars, nebulas, galaxies, star clusters and other deep sky objects:   • All known stars: Gaia DR2 catalog of over 1.69 billion stars   • All known planets, natural satellites and comets, and many other minor solar system objects (10k asteroids)   • Most known deep sky objects: a combined catalog of over 2 million nebulas and galaxies ★ Zoom almost without limits on high resolution images of deep sky objects or planetary surfaces. ★ Observe in the field, even without internet connection, with a "reduced" set of data: 2 million stars, 2 million Deep Sky Objects, 10k asteroids. ★ Control your telescope through Bluetooth or WIFI: drive any GOTO telescope compatible with NexStar, SynScan or LX200 protocols. ★ Prepare your observing sessions using the advanced observation tools, to predict a celestial object observability and transit times. Stellarium Mobile - Star Map is made by the original creator of Stellarium, the well known open source planetarium and one of the best astronomy applications on Desktop PC.

title: IELTS® Reading Tests
description:
IELTS® Reading Test

IELTS Reading Test app makes it easy to improve IELTS Reading Band score for its users who aiming for a high score in IELTS Reading. With IELTS Reading Test app, you can study for FREE with our questions, practice tests, vocabulary, and score reports with detailed analytics. Both Academic tests and General tests are covered.

IELTS Reading Test application has following features:

● Interactive Tests ● Analyzed Answers ● Academic Tests ● General Tests ● Band Scores ● Vocabulary ● Section 1, 2, 3 Questions and Answers ★

Grammar & Vocabulary Tests (New features)

A self-study reference to practice, evaluate and improve your Grammar & Vocabulary. ● 2 levels (Intermediate & Advanced) ● 26 Grammar Topics with 150 Lessons ● 1800 Grammar Questions ● 850 Synonym & Antonym Tests ● 600 Meaning Tests ● 600 Missing Word Tests ● Clear Explanation for each Answer 🔴 Understand the Reading test You will need to read quickly and efficiently, and manage your time. You will be asked to read three different passages and respond to related questions in your IELTS Reading test. 🔴 Purpose of the test The IELTS Reading test is designed to assess a wide range of reading skills, including how well you ● read for the general sense of a passage ● read for the main ideas ● read for detail ● understand inferences and implied meaning ● recognise a writer’s opinions, attitudes and purpose ● follow the development of an argument 🔴 Timing The IELTS Reading test takes 60 minutes. 🔴 Three sections You will be given three different passages to read, each with accompanying questions. You can expect to read 2,150 - 2,750 words in total during your test. 🔴 IELTS Academic Reading test There are three sections and each contains one long text. These are taken from books, journals, magazines and newspapers. They have been written for a non-specialist audience and are on academic topics of general interest. They range from the descriptive and factual to the discursive and analytical. 🔴 IELTS General Training Reading test There are three sections and the texts used in each section are taken from notices, advertisements, company handbooks, official documents, books, magazines and newspapers. Section 1 contains two or three short factual texts, one of which may be made up of 6 - 8 short texts related by topic. Section 2 contains two short factual texts focusing on work-related issues. Section 3 contains one longer, more complex text on a topic of general interest. 🔴 Questions There are 40 questions. A variety of question types is used. You may be asked to ● fill gaps in a passage of written text or in a table ● match headings to written text to diagrams or charts ● complete sentences ● give short answers to open questions ● answer multiple choice questions 🔴 Marking Each correct answer receives one mark. Scores out of 40 are converted to the IELTS 9-band scale. Scores are reported in whole and half bands. Study anywhere and anytime and get the desired band score in the IELTS reading test! Download now and start your preparation for IELTS today! Our team wishes you success in the preparation and taking IELTS exam! Trademark Disclaimer: "IELTS is a registered trademark of University of Cambridge ESOL, the British Council, and IDP Education Australia. This app is not affiliated, approved or endorsed by the University of Cambridge ESOL, the British Council, and IDP Education Australia."

title: Bright – English for beginners
description:
Learn English easily!

Welcome to Bright: a smart and simple application for learning English.

Bright uses the best method of spaced repetition and a special memory training technique Fast Brain. Thanks to the interactive teaching methods, users memorize 90% of the information for good.

We have prepared 45 sets of English words and phrases with different levels of difficulty: from beginner to pro. Exercises are voiced by native speakers.

Memorize at least 250 core words every month and speak and translate without the dictionary. Just 10 minutes a day anytime, anywhere.

With Bright, you’ll increase your vocabulary and quickly master listening comprehension. You’ll remember the correct spelling and make your pronunciation better.

The application adjusts to you. Your results and detailed learning statistics will enhance assessment of your knowledge and give you motivation to move on.

Learn real-life English together with Bright. Download the app and get access to the free trial period.

title: LOLA SPEAK: English Practice
description:
Practice speaking English in real life situations! Be the hero in our interactive videos and move the story forward by speaking English. Improve your pronunciation with AI.

—

How does Lola Speak help me learn English?

Many English learners already know a lot of grammar and vocabulary, but are afraid to actually speak English. Why? Many are embarrassed to make mistakes or mess up English pronunciation.

Lola Speak provides a safe environment to practice real life conversations with the help of AI. You can repeat as many times as you like. You can practice communicating in a life-like setting, but without the pressure and stress. You can build confidence to communicate in English. 

—

How will I know if I am speaking correctly?

Our AI provides instant feedback on your pronunciation. 

Also, you can listen to your own audio and recordings by native speakers to learn to sound more like a native.

—

Is this going to be fun?

From plot driven stories (Welcome to Hollywood) to series helping you navigate specific situations (Job Interview) you will be immersed in American English and culture. We think you won't want to stop - all while speaking English to move the stories forward!

—

How often is the content updated?

We expect to release new series monthly covering different topics & English speaker levels from basic to advanced.


Read the terms and privacy policy here:

title: IELTSAce - Instant IELTS speak
description:
***PRICING: Note that this is a paid app. The app let's you try 5 IELTS questions for free and then charges a one time fee of $5 for access to all topics for 1 year.***

IELTSAce helps you prepare for the IELTS speaking section. The app contains 50 full length IELTS exam speaking questions and answers. You can listen to each question and record your answer. Once you record your answer, the app immediately estimates your IELTS speaking score.

The IELTS score provided by the app is also available at sentence level. You can click on individual sentences to practice just that sentence. Furthermore, the app automatically identifies the words you do not pronounce properly and shows them under the weak words section.

IELTSAce also includes a vocabulary section that helps you memorize the top ~1000 words you need to master for the IELTS exam.

Last but not the least, IELTSAce gives you feedback on your speaking rate and the number of pauses you take. Also, the app tracks your best, average and worst IELTS speaking score so you can keep track of your progress.

title: TalkMe: Speak & Learn English
description:
Meet TalkMe – your all-in-one AI language learning assistant, designed to help you master new languages and speak boldly, anytime and anywhere!

"I always wanted to practice speaking, but didn't know where to start."
"I was always afraid to talk with native speakers or make mistakes."

With TalkMe, you'll immerse yourself in real-life scenarios and practice conversations with ultra-realistic AI tutors – no pressure, no embarrassment, just pure language growth!

◆ Why Choose TalkMe?

- Trusted by over 1 million learners worldwide
- Endorsed by Google Startups
- Featured as Product Hunt's #1 daily pick
- Boasts an impressive global rating of 4.9 stars

◆ Key Features:

- Ultra-Realistic AI Tutors:
Choose from a wide range of lifelike virtual tutors, each with authentic accents, unique backgrounds, and personal stories. Enjoy conversations that feel just like talking to real people!

- Learn 7 Languages Using 60+ Native Languages:
Practice English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, Chinese, and more – with German and additional languages coming soon!

- Speak With Confidence:
You're not talking to a real person, so you can make mistakes, learn, and improve without fear or awkwardness. Leave your errors with TalkMe and bring your best to the real world!

- Personalized Learning:
Get fully customized lessons and scenarios based on your goals, interests, and skill level – available anytime, anywhere.

- Instant Feedback:
Get real-time corrections and personalized tips during conversations to sharpen your vocabulary, pronunciation, and fluency.

- Advanced Pronunciation Correction:
Powered by our proprietary AI, TalkMe provides phoneme-level feedback to help you sound like a native speaker.

◆ How TalkMe Works:

- Personalized Study Plans:
Let TalkMe design a learning journey just for you, with conversation courses built around real situations and everyday topics.

- Fun, Interactive Lessons:
Preview key vocabulary and phrases through gamified exercises like fill-in-the-blanks, shadowing, and script dialogues before each lesson.

- Real Conversation Practice:
Speak up and reinforce your grammar and expressions with instant tutor feedback. Explore new words and phrases, practice pronunciation, and dive deeper into grammar and sentence structure.

- Smart Review:
Effortlessly review tricky words, sentences, and mistakes after lessons to lock in your progress.

- From Input to Output:
Unlike traditional language learning apps, TalkMe helps you truly master language speaking skills – not just memorization.

◆ Is TalkMe Right for Me?

Absolutely! Whether you're prepping for business English, small talk, travel, or tests (TOEFL, IELTS, TOEIC, JLPT, TOPIK, HSK), TalkMe adapts to your needs.

- Personalized Levels:
From beginner to advanced, create lessons that suit you best.
- Adjustable Conversation Difficulty:
Tweak the tutor's language complexity to match your level for effective learning.
- Beginner-Friendly Tools:
Features like slower speech, translations, and hints help you get started easily.
- Diverse Topics:
Practice everything from small talk and travel phrases to workplace communication and more.

◆Subscription Terms:

Choose from monthly, quarterly, or annual plans. Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Access continues until the end of the paid term; unused portions are non-refundable.

Choose from three of our subscription plans:

1. Monthly Plan (1 month )
2. Quarterly Plan (3 months）
3. Yearly Plan (12 months)

For questions or feedback, contact us: support@talkme.ai
Terms of Use: https://www.talkme.ai/terms.html
Privacy Notice: https://www.talkme.ai/privacy.html

title: TOEFL Vocabulary Flashcards
description:
Don't just stare at wordlists—master the 600 most important TOEFL vocabulary words with the highly-rated free flashcards for your Android phone or tablet. Practice every day to improve your vocab knowledge.

- 600+ vocab words picked by an expert TOEFL tutor
- Definitions and example sentences for every word
- Decks for every difficulty level
- Track your progress as you study
- Smart algorithm focuses your practice for efficient learning

This app gives you free access to all of Magoosh’s TOEFL flashcards. Sign in with a Magoosh account (or create a new one) to save your progress to the web. You can continue your practice online at https://toefl.magoosh.com/flashcards/vocabulary

Written by TOEFL experts
------------------------
The entire TOEFL wordlist is selected and defined with usage examples by Magoosh’s expert TOEFL tutors, led by Chris Lele and Lucas Fink. Chris has been teaching the TOEFL for more than 10 years, runs a popular vocabulary series on YouTube and he’s also written an eBook on vocabulary. He is unbeatable in Scrabble, or any other word game for that matter. Lucas studied creative writing at Bard College and has been teaching English grammar and standardized tests since 2008.

Review that really sticks
-------------------------
Academic research has found that memories are formed by repeated exposure to new information, so Magoosh’s flashcard app uses a spaced repetition system. Words you are learning will reappear frequently (occurring less frequently the better you know them) and words you already know won’t be repeated. The TOEFL word list is also culled to only 600 so that you don't waste time learning unimportant words.

About Magoosh
-------------
We're an online test prep company with a focus on teaching the TOEFL through videos and personalized customer support.

In addition to our online course, we blog about TOEFL strategies and test-taking tips at https://magoosh.com/toefl

More TOEFL study tools
----------------------
When you’re ready to practice for the full TOEFL exam, Magoosh’s website has a complete online video course covering everything on the test. Visit https://toefl.magoosh.com for more information.

(Magoosh also has apps for studying for the GMAT and GRE. Search the store for "magoosh gmat" or "magoosh gre" to find them)

Have any questions? Please ask!
-------------------------------
Student satisfaction is incredibly important to us. If you have any questions or comments, please send us an email at help@magoosh.com and we’ll get back to you as quickly as we can.

“I didn’t have much time to prepare, and Magoosh made it possible for me to succeed on the test in a short period of time. I looked at Kaplan, Barron’s, and Princeton Review products, and I can confidently say that Magoosh was definitely the best.”

“The team is really great and actually cares about your score as much as they would care about their own. Simply the best.”

Don’t wait until the last minute to start studying, start memorizing TOEFL words today!

title: Infinite French
description:
🎮 EASY VOCABULARY MASTERY THROUGH GAMING
Learn hundreds of beginner-friendly French words through immersive space-themed gameplay! Experience fun flashcard learning that makes memorization effortless.

🧠 INNOVATIVE MULTI-SENSORY APPROACH

title: LanGeek | English Vocabulary
description:
LanGeek is an all-in-one language learning app designed to help users enhance their English skills through interactive lessons and personalized learning. Suitable for learners at all levels, the app offers a structured approach to mastering vocabulary, expressions, grammar, pronunciation, and reading. With comprehensive tools and resources, it provides everything you need to achieve fluency.

1. Vocabulary 📖
The Vocabulary section covers a wide range of content to support language growth:
📊 CEFR vocabulary, from A1 to C2 levels
🗂️ Topical vocabulary organized by topic
📝 The most common English words
🔤 Function-based vocabulary categorized by grammatical function
🎓 Vocabulary lists for English proficiency tests (IELTS, TOEFL, SAT, ACT, and more)
📚 Vocabulary from popular ESL textbooks (e.g., English File, Headway, Top Notch)

2. Expressions 💬
Here, you can explore:
🧠 Idioms
🗣️ Proverbs
🔄 Phrasal verbs
🔗 Collocations

3. Grammar ✍️
The Grammar section provides a complete guide to English grammar, with over 300 lessons across beginner, intermediate, and advanced levels, covering key topics like nouns, verbs, tenses, and clauses.

4. Pronunciation 🔊
This section helps you master English pronunciation by:
🔡 Introducing the 26 letters of the English alphabet and their sounds
🎶 Teaching the IPA phonetic alphabet
🎧 Providing audio examples for each sound

5. Reading 📚
The Reading section offers hundreds of passages at beginner, intermediate, and advanced levels, allowing you to apply what you've learned in real contexts.

6. Features to Help You Learn ✨
🃏 Flashcards and spelling practice for every vocabulary lesson
🧠 An advanced Leitner system to boost retention
🗂️ Create and share your own wordlists
🖼️ Thousands of images for visual learning
✏️ Example sentences for each word
🌟 And much more!

title: LearnEnglish Grammar
description: ** Our premium grammar app LearnEnglish Grammar is now 100% FREE! Download now and start practising grammar with different topics from beginner to advanced levels. ** LearnEnglish Grammar is a free grammar practice app designed to help improve English grammar accuracy. The app offers 1000s of questions to help practise and reinforce your English grammar skills. FOUR LEVELS FROM BEGINNER TO ADVANCED The app is suitable for learners of all levels and offers grammar activities at Beginner (CEFR level A1), Elementary, Intermediate and Advanced (CEFR level C2). Start at your level, and as your grammar accuracy improves, progress to the next. NOW FREE! - OVER 1000 PRACTICE QUESTIONS AVAILABLE Each level contains over 600 grammar activities, split into about 25 grammar topics such as Simple past, Past continuous, Question tags, Prepositions, Conditionals and Future perfect. The grammar questions use 10 unique activity types such as fill-in-the-blanks, multiple choice and matching. PRACTICE AND TEST Work through practice questions at your own pace in the Practice section or challenge your knowledge in the Test section and see how well you know the grammar topics at your level. LANGUAGES The app is fully available in English, Japanese, Spanish and traditional and simplified Chinese. Help files are additionally available in Arabic, Chinese, English, Italian, Japanese and Spanish. TOP GRAMMAR PRACTICE APP English learners from all over the world love our app. LearnEnglish Grammar has ranked #1 in the iTunes Education category in 44 countries and ranks in the top ten in over 111 countries. Visit www.britishcouncil.org/english to find out more information. ABOUT THE BRITISH COUNCIL’S ENGLISH LEARNING APPS The British Council creates top English learning apps for learners of all ages. You can download our apps to practise grammar, vocabulary and listening. Get more great English learning apps from the British Council at: http://learnenglish.britishcouncil.org/apps

title: 10 Minute English
description:
English is easy! All you need is 10 minutes a day.
This is enough to improve your speaking, listening, and even writing skills quickly.
 
With the 10-Minute English app, you are going to get better at speaking and understanding the language by expanding your vocabulary—over 500 new words in a month, each month.
 
Say «Beats me» instead of «I don’t know» and «Can’t complain» instead of «I’m fine», and you will sound perfect to all native English speakers out there.
 
Why 10-Minute English?
 
*It’s scientifically proven*
 
The method of spaced repetition enables you to remember words and expressions far better than usual lessons. Even in a year, you will be able to recall 90% of everything you have learned.
 
10-Minute English employs a learning technique recognized by the best world’s universities. Breaking down big topics into smaller parts allows you to learn the most valuable information in less time, be it common English collocations, idioms, or grammar rules.
 
Our word-building exercises activate your visual memory and improve your language skills. Get one step ahead of everyone who studies English.
 
*It gets you speaking right away*
 
The first 500 most popular words and phrases will serve as a powerful boost for your English. You will learn to describe your life, socialize and speak in the workplace more confidently.
 
*You learn fast*
 
In 3 months, you will cover a language program designed for a one-year college course.
 
Choose the most compelling ones from 40 up-to-date topics: Travelling and Life in a big city, Business and Job interview, Slang, Hobbies, and many more. Learn the top 100 verbs and adverbs to see the improvement immediately.
 
Your aspiration means everything. It doesn’t matter that you don’t have much time to spend on your English studies. Start off with only 10 minutes a day, and this will work wonders for your skills.
 
Begin now, and you’re going to be surprised how good at English you really are.

Access to the 10-Minute English application is offered on a subscription basis. To use the app’s services, you will need to subscribe to any of the available plans.
If you choose to subscribe, the payment will be charged to your Google Play Store account at confirmation of purchase.
You can manage your subscription anytime and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Google Play Store Account Settings.
Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a 10-Minute English subscription.
 
Terms of use: https://www.mobilecleverapps.com/terms
Privacy policy: https://www.mobilecleverapps.com/privacy

title: AI Grammar Checker for English
description: AI Grammar Checker for English - Check your grammar and spelling errors at any time. Whether writing academic English papers, proofreading workplace emails, hashing out business, or social writing, AI Grammar Checker could help you by correcting grammatical errors in real-time and make sure your message is clear and mistake-free. Main Features: English Grammar Auto-correct Whether misspelled words, inaccurate phrases, wrong verb tenses, subject-predicate inconsistencies, or punctuation, AI Grammar Checker can efficiently and accurately correct different kinds of spelling and grammatical errors for you. Massive Real Error Correction Data AI Grammar Checker is based on thousands of error correction data from real people on HelloTalk. Corrections are more genuine and accurate, as if there were a native speaker online at any time to help you check your English grammar. Every modification is in line with the way native speakers talk, which could make your English more authentic! OCR Text Scanner AI Grammar has a built-in OCR camera function, which can accurately identify text in a picture, without having to manually input it, and automatically correct any grammar mistakes. Detailed Analysis Provided AI Grammar Checker will record each grammatical error and compare the original content with the corrected content to help you better understand the grammatical errors you often make. Thoughtful error correction tips to help you notice your grammar weaknesses and avoid repeating mistakes. What’s more, if you want to see the analysis from other grammar websites or Google search, you can search directly inside the application. Perfect Your Writing and Listening AI Grammar Checker also supports text reading. The proofread content matches authentic pronunciation, which allows you to cultivate a better feel for the language while remembering the correct English grammar. Word Translation You can get the translation and pronunciation of words with just one click. At present, word translation supports translation in 109 languages including Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and so on. With automatic grammar correction, there won't be any obstacles to you improving your English. Here are some real reviews on Google Play: @Maggie Yung: It's a good app, helps me to improve my English writing. @deepa Subramanian: Awesome. It's so easy and will help us become more confident in what we write. It is very useful for formal chats and writing formal letters. Utilize AI Grammar Checker to improve your writing, so that grammar is no longer an obstacle when expressing yourself in English! title: IELTS® Test Pro
description:
IELTS® Test Pro – Your Ultimate IELTS® Preparation App with AI Scoring

IELTS® Test Pro is a powerful and comprehensive test preparation tool tailored for IELTS® learners, which is designed to help you practice smarter and achieve your goals in all four IELTS® modules: Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking.

With integrated AI-powered Scoring technology, our app provides instant and accurate feedback on your Writing responses—helping you understand your band score estimation, identify your strengths, and receive suggestions for improvement, just like having a personal IELTS® tutor in your pocket.

What’s Inside:
 IELTS Reading Practice Tests
 IELTS Listening Practice Tests
 IELTS Speaking Practice Tests
 IELTS Writing Practice Tests
 IELTS Grammar Exercises
 IELTS Vocabulary Builder

Key Features:
 Access over 3000+ high-quality IELTS® practice questions designed by experts to enhance your vocabulary, grammar, and comprehension skills.
 Get detailed performance analytics to track your progress and pinpoint areas that need attention.
 Improve faster with instant AI Band Score Estimation and feedback for Writing tasks.
 Speech-to-text Speaking Practice to refine your pronunciation
 Download content for offline study—practice anywhere, anytime.

This ensures you're not just practicing, but practicing effectively—improving in the areas that matter most for a higher IELTS® score.

 Start your IELTS® journey today and gain the confidence and skills you need to study, work, or live in an English-speaking environment.

Trademark Disclaimer: IELTS® is a registered trademark of Cambridge Assessment English, British Council, and IDP: IELTS Australia. This app is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or approved by any of these organizations.

title: Essential Vocabulary
description:
We have implemented the most advanced learning algorithm along with an optimized and advanced version of Leitner box so you can learn and memorize the most essential English words in a short time and with much less efforts compared to other learning methods.

By using this app you can expand your vocabulary significantly in a short period of time and never worry about reading and understanding English texts again.

About 90% of all general English dialogues and texts are covered by these essential words. So by learning and memorizing them you can master the English comprehension in no time.

Main Features:
• Each word comes with it's definition , an example, human pronunciation, synonyms and antonyms and a high quality picture to help you learn better.

• Learn how to use a word in sentences by reading each lesson's provided story which include all of the words in that lesson.

• Along with Supermemo algorithm - the most advanced spaced repetition algorithm - which has an efficiency 5 times better than traditional algorithms such as Leitner.

• With a lot of useful features that will make your learning better and more attractive .

• You can create you own flashcards to learn anything you want with the help of app's advance learning algorithm.

We have put a lot of efforts in order to create a beautiful and simple user interface yet with a lot of advanced features so that you never get exhausted during your learning time.

title: Rewrite: Grammar Check
description:
Introducing Rewrite - Your Free Grammar Check & Sentence Corrector App! Are you tired of embarrassing grammar mistakes in your writing? Rewrite is here to rescue you! Our grammar checker and sentence corrector will elevate your writing skills to new heights, all for free! 

Download Rewrite for a seamless and free grammar check, where our sentence corrector transforms your writing into a masterpiece, all without costing you a dime.

📝 Free Grammar Check: Rewrite offers a powerful, free grammar app with a cutting-edge sentence corrector, ensuring your writing is impeccable. Don't let grammar errors hold you back; Rewrite has your back.

📖 Rewrite Your Way to Perfection: Our app is not just a grammar checker; it's a complete sentence diagrammer and punctuation checker, all in one place. Say hello to correct grammar and punctuation in every sentence you write.

🌐 Multilingual Magic: Whether you're a polyglot or writing in a foreign language, our grammar checker supports over 100 languages, including Spanish (corrector ortográfico). Write confidently in any language.

Why Choose Rewrite?
🧐 Easy & Secure Integration: Seamlessly review your text within the app, whether it's emails, LinkedIn messages, tweets, or Facebook posts. Boost your English compositions without changing your keyboard!

🔒 Privacy-Focused: Your data is safe with us. Rewrite never collects or stores your personal information, ensuring your privacy while you perfect your writing.

📚 Advanced Grammar Checks: Take your writing to the next level with advanced corrections. Rewrite delves into sentence structure, determiners, commas, and more.

📕 Vocabulary Enhancement: Avoid repetitive or vague wording with our vocabulary enhancement suggestions. Enrich your text with alternative words and expressions.

📝 Rewrite is your go-to free grammar app with an integrated sentence diagrammer and punctuation checker, ensuring your writing maintains correct grammar and impeccable punctuation throughout.

Ready to elevate your writing skills? Contact our Support team with any questions or feedback at grammarcheckapp@gmail.com.

Download Rewrite now for free and transform your writing. Boost your English writing skills with just one app! Don't let grammar mistakes hold you back; Rewrite and write confidently. Try it today!

title: Speak English with Loora AI
description:
Loora is your personal AI English coach. 
It is always available for you to practice "as real as it gets" English conversations.
Loora makes speaking English easy with conversation based sessions, available 24-hours a day, every day.
The lessons are personalized with real-time feedback on grammar, pronunciation, and fluency. 

============================

Benefits of learning with Loora:
* Available 24/7, Loora never sleeps.
* Loora works on your schedule. Chat for just 5-minutes a day or an all-out midnight monolog.
* Non-judgmental and friendly environment is always guaranteed, because the biggest mistake you could ever make, is being afraid to make one.
* Real-time translation and speech recognition, to enhance your learning experience. Get immediate feedback on your pronunciation and grammar.
* Track your learning trends to top your daily English fluency score. Perfect your pronunciation and accent by beating your weekly goals.
* Personalized conversations at your speaking level, relevant topics that focus on your life.

============================

About the team:
We believe everyone deserves the opportunity to speak English fluently and today it is possible with the help of AI.
That's why we have gathered a team of leading conversational AI researchers and language-learning enthusiasts,  to worked together on creating Loora. Their goal was to bring you the most dynamic AI English-Coach.

title: Babbel - Learn Languages
description: Millions of people learn languages with Babbel — the app built by language learning experts. Our short, interactive lessons rethink old-school language education to get you speaking a new language with confidence. LEARN SPANISH OR 13 OTHER LANGUAGES IN 15 MIN/DAY We're not just a Spanish learning app! Want to learn French, learn Italian or speak German like a local? You can learn: Spanish 🇪🇸🇲🇽 | French 🇫🇷 | Italian 🇮🇹 | German 🇩🇪 | Portuguese 🇧🇷 | Russian 🇷🇺 | Polish 🇵🇱 | Turkish 🇹🇷 | Norwegian 🇳🇴 | Danish 🇩🇰 | Swedish 🇸🇪 | Dutch 🇳🇱 | Indonesian 🇮🇩 | English 🇬🇧🇺🇸 Babbel is great for beginners but even experienced language learners have proven to advance their conversation skills!* ====== BABBEL WORKS! ★ Effectiveness backed by researchers at Yale University: 100% of study participants improved their oral proficiency in 3 months* *Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Available at http://bit.ly/BabbelYale. ★ After 10 hours with Babbel, Michigan State University researchers found: 96% of learners saw better test scores on grammar and vocabulary** **Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Available: http://bit.ly/BabbelMSU. ★ PCMagazine says the Babbel language app “exceeds expectations” ====== Babbel is the best language-learning app. Our language learning experts build every course tailored to your native language. So whether you want to learn Spanish, learn Italian or learn French — or even German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, Indonesian or English — you’ll learn quickly and effectively. BITE-SIZE, INTERACTIVE LESSONS - Easily fit language learning into your busy schedule with lessons that take only 10-15 minutes to complete (some Spanish lessons are even shorter). LANGUAGES FOR ANY SITUATION - Find language lessons for travel, work, everyday life and much, much more LISTEN, SPEAK, READ, WRITE - Practice all the elements of language learning and start speaking real-life conversations IMPROVE YOUR PRONUNCIATION - Babbel’s speech recognition technology helps you sound like a native speaker REMEMBER WHAT YOU LEARN - Use the review feature so the previous lessons stick, and understand grammar (including Spanish conjugation) LEARN LANGUAGES IN CONTEXT - Enhance your language learning with tips & tricks that guide you throughout lessons OVER 6,000 LANGUAGE COURSES - Learn Spanish and 13 other languages with in-depth content, including more than 60,000 language lessons With Babbel, you’ll be on your way to mastering the ultimate goal of language learning — having real-life conversations with confidence. Whether you need a Spanish learning app or a French learning app, you’ve always wanted to learn Italian, you’re looking to dive into German language learning or improve your English, Babbel is the choice of millions of people looking to enhance their language education. Make learning a habit. Go beyond language 101 and you'll learn a language you can use to talk in real-life situations. ===== Subscriptions: You’ll need a subscription to use Babbel fully. Your subscription will be renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. DOWNLOAD BABBEL AND TRY FOR FREE – Your first lesson is on us. Babbel is completely ad-free. Privacy policy: https://about.babbel.com/en/privacy/ Terms of use: https://about.babbel.com/en/terms/ Not a native speaker but want to talk just like one? Download Babbel and improve your German language learning, learn English or discover how to speak Spanish. Take your language education to new levels — whether you want to learn French, Italian, Mexican Spanish, German or any of the 14 languages we offer! Contact us: Questions, comments or feedback about language learning with Babbel? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com.

title: Learn English - 5,000 Phrases
description: Play, Learn and Speak – discover common phrases for daily English conversation! ✔ 5,000 useful phrases for conversation. ✔ Learn English in your tongue (60 languages available). ✔ Best FREE app for learning fast. Speak English Fluently in Real Conversations With Learn English application, you can now explore over 5,000 English phrases for short daily conversations while having absolutely pure fun! Whether you’re a tourist having a vacation in an English speaking country or someone who just wants to speak a foreign language, this application will help you learn English phrases in a fast, easy and enjoyable way. Why Our FREE App is Different ✔ No internet connection required – play where you want and when you want (offline). ✔ 5,000 common phrases – audio pronunciations and phonetic transcriptions to show you how native speaker from United Kingdom actually pronounce them. ✔ 11 fun games – a innovative approach to practice your listening, writing and speaking skills. ✔ 4 levels for learning: beginner, intermediate, advanced and expert. ✔ 20 topics divided into 145 subtopics – so you’ll know what and when to say each phrase. Topics for English conversation: Greetings, Conversations with friends, Basic sentences, Travel, Transportation, Hotel, Restaurant, Food, Shopping, Work, Business etc. More Features to Improve Your English Speaking Vocabulary ✔ Search and bookmark your most common expressions from the phrasebook. ✔ Earn points as your English skills progress. ✔ “Random Categories” feature to randomly select the topic, subtopic and game. ✔ 60 languages –so you could understand and speak each phrase easily regardless of which country you’re from. About FunEasyLearn: Fun Easy Learn has developed many applications to help people around the world learn foreign languages for free. description:
One IELTS: Your Ultimate IELTS exam preparation app for IELTS speaking, Reading, writing and listening section.

Prepare for your IELTS exam with One IELTS, the most effective way to improve your IELTS band score. Whether you’re preparing for IELTS Academic or General Training, this app has all the tools you need to succeed.


Key Features of One IELTS:

• Comprehensive IELTS Practice:
One IELTS provides 15,000+ practice questions and 1,000+ mock tests for all four IELTS sections: Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking. With these extensive materials, you can practice and master each part of the exam.

• Real Exam Simulations:
Take real IELTS mock tests based on Cambridge IELTS editions. These timed tests simulate actual exam conditions, helping you manage your time and improve your performance. Practice with IELTS listening, IELTS reading, and IELTS writing tests that reflect the real exam format.

• Fast AI Scoring:
Get AI-powered feedback on your Writing and Speaking tasks instantly. The IELTS score calculator provides accurate and fast results, showing where you need improvement. Track your IELTS band score to see your progress over time.

• Track Your Progress:
One IELTS allows you to monitor your preparation and track improvements. The app generates detailed progress reports and scores, helping you stay focused and reach your target IELTS score. Whether you're working on IELTS speaking practice or IELTS writing, you'll always know where you stand.

• IELTS Speaking Practice:
Improve your speaking skills with over 1,000 speaking cue cards, mock tests, and sample answers. The app prepares you for all three parts of the IELTS speaking test, offering tips, strategies, and advice to improve your fluency and score.

• IELTS Listening & Reading Practice:
One IELTS includes curated IELTS listening practice tests, Cambridge IELTS listening practice, and IELTS reading practice with real exam samples. These tests improve your comprehension and test-taking strategies, ensuring you are fully prepared for the IELTS exam.

• IELTS Writing Task 1 and Task 2:
One IELTS helps you improve your performance in both IELTS Writing Task 1 and Task 2. Get model answers, expert tips, and clear strategies to tackle both tasks successfully. Prepare for the most challenging writing tasks with ease.

• Simple, Intuitive Design:
The app features a clean, easy-to-use design that lets you focus on what matters most—preparing for the exam. Smart reminders and personalized notifications will help you stay on track with your IELTS preparation.

• Free and Premium Options:
One IELTS offers both free and premium versions. The premium access unlocks additional features, including more practice tests, feedback, and advanced scoring analytics. Choose the plan that suits your needs and maximize your preparation.


Why Choose One IELTS?

This is one of the best app for your IELTS prep. With real exam practice, detailed feedback, and progress tracking, you'll improve your IELTS score faster. One IELTS is the best IELTS preparation app free, offering all the tools you need to improve your IELTS score without breaking the bank.

Download and start preparing for your IELTS exam test today with free access to a wide range of tests and practice materials to reach your Band 9 goal!


Disclaimer:
This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by the British Council, IDP IELTS, and Cambridge University Press & Assessment. It is a third-party IELTS preparation tool developed to help you improve your score.

title: English Grammar and Vocabulary
description:
«English Grammar and Vocabulary» app has a new approach to English language learning. It offers users a lot of units which help them expand their grammar and vocabulary knowledge.

What do we mean by a unit? We choose an interesting topic to discuss and fill it with different activities. It can be a text, of course in English, with active words. Or it can be a list of words that will then appear in different tasks. We also find catching videos and fill them with useful information.

Another type of units is dedicated to a certain Grammar topic. We choose the most difficult and confusing grammar themes. At first we give a detailed explanation with lots of examples and then we offer users to improve new skills via exercises.

One of the most important ideas of our app is that each unit has a theory part and a part with practice. Such an approach lets users get the new material easier. And therefore — they learn English faster.

This application is an efficient way to learn English. It provides lots of tests and exercises in each unit. You can choose whether you want to learn grammar or new vocabulary today.

What’s important — you won’t find a big boring English course book inside. You will find a real transformer — make up your own book, learn certain topics which are interesting for you. And change English learning skills as you like: grammar, reading and vocabulary training.

At the same time this app will be a good assistant for you during your offline curriculum. But unlike large English course books, this app doesn’t require a lot of space in your bag. Everything you need for studying is in your pocket: learn something new and do exercises right after.

You will find very helpful features like active English word lists that include meanings, transcriptions, pictures and examples. All units have special marks that show a level. There are units for beginners, intermediates and advanced learners.

We have tried to choose the most popular topics that will be interesting to the majority of English learners. Space travels, universe problems, social media, job and many more.

We also choose the most necessary Grammar topics — those ones that confuse learners during their studies. But we don’t give long-read theoretical grammar articles. We divide big topics into smaller ones. Again, this helps students learn new grammar material faster.

That is why learning with «English Grammar and Vocabulary» app is an interesting, funny and efficient way to study English.

«English Grammar and Vocabulary» is a new rapidly developing app. Each week learners get new useful and engaging units with tests and exercises. Also, we embed tools and features that make the app’s functionality clear and easy to use.

Another important concept is that the app is absolutely free. No hidden payments inside.

title: English Mastery TOEIC®, IELTS
description:
Elevate your TOEIC® score with our free TOEIC® practice app, designed to help you master English vocabulary, grammar, and test-taking skills. Whether you’re aiming to conquer the TOEIC® or simply improve your English, this app is your ultimate tool for success.

With over 5000 questions, our app provides comprehensive coverage of all TOEIC test sections:

 • Photographs: Identify the best description of an image.
 • Question-Response: Select the best response to a spoken question.
 • Short Conversations & Talks: Answer questions based on real-life conversations.
 • Incomplete Sentences & Texts: Choose the correct word or phrase to complete sentences and texts.
 • Reading Comprehension: Sharpen your skills with a variety of text-based questions.

Key Features:

 • Extensive practice: 8 categories, 32 mini-tests, and 16 full-length simulation tests that mirror real TOEIC exams.
 • Flexible options: Choose between full 200-question simulations or shorter versions (60 or 100 questions).
 • Track your progress: Identify your strengths and areas for improvement with detailed feedback.
 • Practice anytime, anywhere: Offline mode lets you study without internet access.
 • Multi-platform support: Sync across devices and study on the go.
 • Score tracking & performance review: Monitor your results to stay on top of your learning journey.

Additional Learning Tools:

 • 600 essential TOEIC words: Build your vocabulary with the most important words for the TOEIC test.
 • Flashcards & fun games: Make learning engaging with vocabulary flashcards and games like word matching and multiple-choice quizzes.
 • Master 3000 key English words: Expand your general English vocabulary to enhance all aspects of your language skills.

Updated to the latest TOEIC 2025 format, this app adapts to your needs with customizable reading speeds and flexible practice options. Whether you’re preparing for the test or improving your English, this app provides all the tools you need to excel.

Download now and take the next step toward your TOEIC success!

TOEIC® is a registered trademark of ETS. This product is not endorsed or approved by ETS.

title: French Verbs - Conjugation
description:
If you learn French this application is made for you. You can check more than 63 800 verb conjugation forms with this application. Moreover, you can practice all of those conjugated  forms as well. 
 
Verbs are one of the most important parts of any language and knowing of verbs conjugation is vital to speak freely without problems. There are about 8000 unique verbs in French language. If we add reflexive ones we can enumerate about 12 000. Fortunately, the major part of them are 1st group verbs and their conjugation usually does not make any problem. There are also rules for the 2nd group of French verbs. But the most "problematic" group is the 3rd one. There are some similarities in conjugation of the third group of French verbs, but, in general, the rule is quite simple: no rules! Everything should be learned by heart. Moreover, when you study French language you know that the verbs of 3rd group are most frequently used. So if you want to speak French without any problems, you need to know the conjugation rules of French grammar and you have to practice really a lot.

We took 660 most frequent verbs used in French and made conjugation of all of them in 22 different tenses, each tense usually has 6 conjugated forms. Totally we got an immense quantity of forms, more than 63 800.   

Need to learn such a vast amount of forms to master French language? Our application-trainer will help you.

Two types of learning are available. The first one is to set the conjugated forms correctly. Second one is to spell the conjugated form. Have a conjugation practice! 

With this app a biggest web conjugation dictionary will always be with you.  
You can check conjugation every time and everywhere. 
Study conjugation using built-in learning mode. 
See your results.
Learn French language faster.

Download this app and it will give you a lot of help.

title: Learn AI & Chat GPT: Gen AI X
description:
Unlock the power of AI, generative AI (gen AI), and ChatGPT with Learn Generative AI! This comprehensive learning app helps you master the world of AI, gen AI, and ChatGPT through fun, interactive lessons and real projects. Whether you're a beginner curious to learn AI basics or a professional aiming to sharpen your gen AI skills, our app offers an engaging curriculum designed for all levels.

What You’ll Learn?

✅ AI & Generative AI Fundamentals – Understand how AI, LLMs, and automation work
✅ Master ChatGPT & AI Tools – Explore ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Perplexity, Copilot, DALL-E, Midjourney & more
✅ Create AI-Generated Images – Use image generative tools like Midjourney & DALL-E to generate images & AI art
✅ Build AI Agents & Automation – Apply AI in real-world projects, including ChatGPT-powered chatbots & AI automation
✅ Learn AI for Coding & Productivity – Use AI to streamline programming, automate workflows & enhance creativity
✅ Track Progress & Get Certified – Assess your skills, take quizzes, and earn certifications in AI & Generative AI

Key Features:

- Bite-sized & Interactive AI Lessons: Understand AI and gen AI step-by-step with easy-to-follow lessons. Complex topics like machine learning and gen AI (e.g. how ChatGPT works) are broken into simple, bite-sized chunks that make learning AI fun and engaging.

- Practical Real-World AI Projects: Apply what you learn with hands-on gen AI projects. Work on creative AI applications that solve real-world problems: build ChatGPT-powered chatbots and AI agents for automation, and generate images and art with DALL-E and Midjourney.

- AI Tool Mastery (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, etc.): Become proficient with a suite of popular gen AI tools. Learn ChatGPT prompt techniques, experiment with Gemini's latest features, explore Claude's capabilities, dive into Perplexity for knowledge discovery, and leverage Copilot for coding assistance. For visual creators, learn how to create stunning AI images with image generative tools like DALL-E and Midjourney. Our app keeps you up-to-date with the latest gen AI platforms and tools.

- Certifications & Assessments: Validate your skills and track your progress. Take quizzes and assessments to test your knowledge after each module, covering everything from ChatGPT basics to advanced gen AI concepts.

- Stay Updated with Cutting-Edge AI – Keep up with the latest AI advancements & emerging AI tools

Who is this App For?

✅ Beginners & AI Enthusiasts – Start from scratch & learn AI step-by-step with no coding experience needed
✅ Developers & Tech Professionals – Use AI tools for coding, workflow automation & AI-driven applications
✅ Designers & Content Creators – Create stunning AI images & AI-generated content with Midjourney & DALL-E
✅ Entrepreneurs & Business Professionals – Automate processes & integrate AI into business strategies

Why Learn Generative AI?

AI and Generative AI are transforming industries, and mastering AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Midjourney gives you a competitive edge. Whether you're looking to boost your career, explore creative AI projects, or enhance productivity, this app is your ultimate AI learning companion.

Don't miss out on the AI revolution — embrace creative AI, ChatGPT, and automation in your projects and workflow. Whatever your goals, mastering gen AI and ChatGPT will give you an edge. Download Learn Generative AI now to start your journey and become an AI and gen AI master! Master ChatGPT, explore gen AI, and unlock endless possibilities with this ultimate AI & gen AI learning companion.

title: VoCat - My Own Vocabulary
description:
You can create your own vocabulary with no limit to the number of words, and use the app even without data :)
The cute cat Nero is a bonus.


Easily create your own vocabulary
• Just enter a word and Google Translator automatically completes the meaning, part of speech, and synonyms.
• It is very convenient to use, so you can easily add words.
• You can easily find the results of Naver Dictionary and Google Translate with one click of a button.
• You can create a vocabulary in Excel or Google Sheets and easily add it to the app in CSV format.


Record with images
• You can select a photo from the album and record it with words.
• You can record by taking pictures with the camera directly.


Share it easily
• You can share the vocabulary as CSV.
• Share the vocabulary with your friends to study together.


Back up safely
• You can back up your entire data as a file.
• Back up your entire data to Google Drive with the click of a button to keep it safe.


Use the vocabulary prepared in the bookstore
• English
  • SAT words
• Japanese
  • JLPT
• Chinese
  • HSK
• Medicine


See what you've studied on the calendar
• You can see the words added that day on the calendar.
• Quiz history is also displayed on the calendar, so you can review it.


Learn by taking quizzes
• At the end of the quiz, you can retest by collecting only the wrong words.
• Swipe Cards (FlashCard)
• Multiple Choice
• Dictation
• Blinker


Get word alerts
• It is important to see the words often!
• You can receive word notifications at any time you want.


Plan your study schedule
• You can make a schedule by specifying how many words in the vocabulary to study per day.
• According to the learning schedule, you can select only the words you want to learn today and take the quiz.


Listen to the words
• Words will be read using the built in speech engine (TTS, Text To Speech).
• You can listen to words like listening to music.

• Afrikaans

title: ai LaMo: Learn AI & Chat GPT
description:
🔍 Discover AI & Mastery with ai LaMo: Your AI & Machine Learning Universe! 🔍

Dive deep into the realm of artificial intelligence with ai LaMo. In an age where machine learning, deep learning, and neural networks are reshaping our world, stay ahead of the curve and become an AI master. Our platform is the ultimate bridge between renowned institutions like McKinsey, BCG, Bain, and the everyday individual eager to harness the power of AI.

🚀 EMBRACE LEARNING WITH EASE 🚀

ai LaMo, with its intuitive interface, is built for everyone—whether you're a newbie curious about natural language processing (NLP) or a seasoned tech enthusiast diving into intelligent automation. Our content, designed in partnership with experts from renowned platforms like Udemy business, Coursera, edX, and TED Talks, ensures an all-rounded AI education.

💡 INNOVATION THROUGH AI EXPERIMENTS 💡

Experience AI firsthand. Venture into AI experiments, from predictive analytics to chatbot training, giving you a taste of real-world applications. This functional approach focuses on achievable outcomes, such as leveraging ChatGPT for automated customer service.

🌍 DEEPEN YOUR UNDERSTANDING 🌍

With ai LaMo, computer vision, AI algorithms, and advanced analytics become more than just buzzwords. Dive deep into these areas, understand their applications, and become proficient with the Tensorflow framework and other AI tools.

🎓 CERTIFICATION & COMMUNITY 🎓

Hone your skills in AI tutorials and earn recognized AI certifications. Join the AI community on ai LaMo, sharing insights, case studies, and collaborating on projects. With our Leaderboard, you can even make learning a competitive yet fun experience!

🌟 CONTINUOUS GROWTH & EXPANSION 🌟

We're continually evolving. Get insights into robotics, AI platforms, and the future of intelligent automation. Our platform is always updated, ensuring you're equipped with the latest in AI. Plus, our regular challenges keep your skills sharp and relevant.

🔗 STAY CONNECTED 🔗

Our ai LaMo Newsfeed keeps you updated with the latest AI trends. Be it a groundbreaking AI case study or updates from the AI tools universe, you'll never miss out. Our partnerships with platforms like Fishbowl, Datacamp, and Code Academy ensure a continuous influx of fresh, quality content.

🎉 AI FOR ALL 🎉

The AI revolution is here, and it's inclusive! From prompt engineering enthusiasts to professionals exploring machine intelligence, ai LaMo has something for everyone. Dive into specialized modules, explore AI tutorials, and become part of a transformative wave.

🤖 A GLIMPSE INTO TOMORROW 🤖

Navigate the future today with ai LaMo's forward-thinking modules. As we approach an era where AI integration is pivotal, understanding its profound impact on industries, from healthcare to finance, is crucial. Learn about the groundbreaking innovations on the horizon, be it quantum computing or adaptive AI, and how they stand to reshape our reality.

💼 CAREER-FOCUSED LEARNING 💼

In a competitive job market, ai LaMo's comprehensive courses can give you the edge. With AI's rapid growth, sectors like prompt engineering and data analytics are in demand now more than ever. By liaising with top firms like McKinsey and BCG, we ensure that our curriculum is not only comprehensive but also aligned with what top recruiters are looking for. Transform your career trajectory by acquiring certifications and skills that make you stand out.

Privacy Policy: https://www.ailamo.com/privacy-policy

title: Learn English with books
description:
LEARN ENGLISH FOR BEGINNERS
Do you want to learn English with books, popular movies and TV shows? Or learn English by reading stories every day?
Improve your English language skills while having fun with ENGO’s unique language learning methodology featuring:
● bite-sized lessons adapted for every level,
● 100% binge-worthy content,
● bilingual books,
● interactive games and features,
● progress tracking, spaced repetition and more!

📘 Learn English with Books & Stories
Experience the joy of learning English through literature! Dive into our vast library of adapted English books suitable for all levels (A1, A2, B1, B2). All the stories are written in a simplified language, offering a reading experience that's tailored to your proficiency level.

🎞️ Learn English with TV Series
Ever dreamt of understanding your favorite English TV series without subtitles? ENGO English brings this dream to reality! Immerse yourself in popular TV series and learn English for beginners in the most enjoyable way. ENGO takes language learning to a whole new level with double subtitles, one in English and another in your native language.

🔤 Learn English Words
Enrich your vocabulary every day with ENGO ! With our app, you'll have access to a plethora of new words, complete with definitions, synonyms, and examples. Enjoy interactive flashcards and a spaced repetition method that aids in memorizing and retaining new words effectively.

🔈 Improve Your English Pronunciation
Polish your pronunciation with our voice recognition feature! Practice saying new words, get instant feedback, and improve your speaking skills, making you sound more like a native speaker.

📚 English Adapted Books for Beginners
If you're just starting out, ENGO is the perfect app for you! Our wide selection of adapted books for beginners will ease your transition into the English language, making learning English an enjoyable journey rather than a daunting task.

✏️ English Grammar Lessons and Tests
Sharpen your English grammar skills with ENGO . Our app includes comprehensive grammar lessons, followed by tests and exams to consolidate your learning and monitor your progress.

Whether you want to learn English offline, master English speaking, or simply expand your vocabulary, ENGO is your perfect companion. With a user-friendly interface and a wide array of resources, ENGO is more than just an English learning app; it's a community dedicated to helping you achieve your English learning goals.

So why wait? Start flowing with ENGO today, and experience a revolution in English learning.

Note: We're continually improving and adding new features based on your feedback. Stay tuned for exciting updates!

title: Starfall
description:
Starfall® fun activities, games, and songs includes reading, math, music, and more – read, learn, and play preschool to fifth grade. Includes free and subscriber content.

Starfall provides an Enhanced Accessible Index for children with visual, hearing, or mobility impairments. For more information, please contact Customer Service at (+1) 303-417-6414.

Join Zac the Rat® and his friends on an exciting learning journey, starting with the ABCs and 123s and advancing up to grade 5 grammar and mathematics. Starfall's playful open format intuitively guides children through sequential learning objectives for reading, math, art, music, and social subjects like kindness and caring.

*Highlights*

*Reading (phonics, fluency, grammar) -- ABCs, Learn to Read, I’m Reading, Talking Library, Punctuation, Parts of Speech
*Math -- Numbers, Addition and Subtraction, Multiplication and Division, Geometry and Measurement, Fractions
*More -- Holiday Activities, Nursery Rhymes, Sing-Alongs, Interactive Calendar 

*Why Starfall*

*Research based, teacher tested, child approved. Starfall's systematic approach was created by experienced educators using time-tested instructional methods.
*Try it for free. All of the basics for learning how to read are available to everyone.
*No advertisements. Whether a free user or subscriber, you won’t see any ads.
*Pass it forward! Subscribers gain access to hundreds of additional activities and support the free sections for others to enjoy.

*What people are saying about Starfall*

Listed on PC Magazine’s “15 best Online Learning Services for Kids,” Think Five’s “Top 5 Most Used Apps by Elementary Teachers,” and as one Parent's Magazine's "70 Best Apps for Families."  

"Kids can learn about letter recognition, phonics, and reading. Skill acquisition is appropriately gradual... Starfall does an excellent job of offering clear and intriguing early literacy lessons." —Common Sense Media

“I truly believe that Starfall set the foundation for my future.”
–Sarah, undergraduate at Stanford University

*Subscription information*

If you choose to purchase a Starfall subscription, a $5.99 (USD) payment will be applied to your Google Play account upon confirmation of purchase and monthly after that. Your subscription will automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. This subscription is valid only for home use on devices signed in to your Google Play account. Google Play does not support Family Library or family payment methods for in-app subscription purchases.

*Additional Info*

This app requires an internet connection and is intended for Pre-K, Kindergarten, and Grades 1-5. It also supports English language development, special education, and homeschool environments.

Privacy Policy: https://teach.starfall.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://teach.starfall.com/terms
About Starfall: https://teach.starfall.com/about
Starfall Education Foundation is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.

title: English Grammar: Learn & Test
description:
English Grammar - Learn, Practice & Test

English Grammar app makes it easy to improve your English grammar and get ready for an English grammar test or just improve your writing and speaking quickly. With English Grammar app, you can study for FREE with 300 grammar lessons and 20000 tests (10000 with explanation). Best of all, you can access these features anywhere and anytime when you download our app. 300 grammar lessons and 20000 grammar questions will gradually improve your skills. When you complete your English test you see which aspects of English grammar you are good at and which of them require more practice. Prepare for IELTS, TOEFL, SAT, MCAT, LSAT, GMAT and GRE.

★ 10000 Tests with Explanation ★

(New feature)

★ Confused Words

(New feature) This section contains a lot of commonly confused words. They either look alike, sound alike or, worst of all, look and sound alike but have completely different meanings. Other words look and sound different but are similar in meaning, and it’s hard to determine which is the correct one in a given context. ● 800+ Confused Words ● Confused Words with explanation and example sentences

★ Common English Mistakes

(New feature) This section includes common mistakes in English grammar rules and their usage so that you can spot the error in English grammar easily. ● 650+ common mistakes ● 22 categories ● Common English Mistakes with correct and incorrect sentences

🔴 English Grammar application has following features:

● 300 grammar lessons ● 20000 grammar tests ● 10000 tests with explanation ● Search through grammar lessons ● User Friendly ● Works Offline ● Optimized for Mobile & Tablets 🔴 Main topics covered in English Grammar app: ● Adjective ● Adverb ● Articles ● Conditional sentences ● Gerund and Infinitive ● Irregular Verbs ● Modals and Modal Auxiliaries ● Nouns ● Participles ● Passive Voice ● Phrasal verbs ● Prepositions ● Pronouns ● Punctuation ● Quantifiers ● Questions ● Reported Speech ● Sentences ● Verbs ● Tenses ● Comparison of Tenses ● Other Grammar Study anywhere and anytime! The app works well both online and offline. Download now and start learn more about the English language! Our team wishes you success in learning English grammar!

📄 This app uses icons from multiple sources: - Some icons are custom-designed or from open-license sources - Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
