title: edX online learning
description: Meet the online learning platform that prepares you for every career moment. Register for free to discover: - Options for every budget, from free courses to professional certificates to full degrees. - World-class content partners like MIT, Harvard, Amazon, and Google. - Upskilling opportunities in critical disciplines like AI, supply chain, and sustainability. It’s never too late or too early to join edX. Our courses and programs meet you where you are in your professional trajectory. You can: - Switch industries. Launch, change, or advance your tech career with immersive boot camps. - Strengthen your résumé. Deepen your expertise and showcase your skills with professional certificate programs. - Level up as a leader. Learn to lead initiatives and teams with executive education programs. - Earn a degree. Unlock new career opportunities with master’s, doctorate, and undergraduate degree programs. Make your next career move on your schedule. With edX’s free mobile app, you can: - Stream online courses in AI, cybersecurity, data science, and more. - Download course materials and transcripts for uninterrupted access. - Test your knowledge with quizzes, assignments, and exams. - Discover and enroll in new courses and programs as your skills evolve. title: Tandem: Language exchange
description: Practice a language with native speakers and take it to the next level. Whether you’re aiming to learn a new language or improve fluency in one you already know, having engaging conversations with an exchange partner makes all the difference. You can even learn a language with international friends while expanding your skills and cultural understanding. Whatever your language goal is—language learning for travel, business, or personal growth—you can reach it while meeting new people and making friends around the globe. It’s easy: just choose a language you want to learn, find a Tandem member with similar interests, and you’re ready to go! Once you’re connected, the real fun begins! Learn from each other, practice speaking, and find fluency faster through conversation practice! Text, call, or even video chat—communication with your language exchange partner is as flexible as you need it to be. It’s the perfect way to meet people and improve your language skills at the same time. With Tandem, you can learn languages through 1-to-1 chats or with Parties, the ultimate group learning audio space. There are millions of Tandem members waiting for you, so find your people and start speaking their language today! Choose from over 300 languages: - Spanish 🇪🇸🇲🇽 - English 🇬🇧🇺🇸 - Japanese 🇯🇵 - Korean 🇰🇷 - German 🇩🇪, - Italian 🇮🇹 - Portuguese 🇵🇹🇧🇷 - Simplified and Traditional Chinese 🇨🇳🇹🇼 - 12 different sign languages, including American Sign Language. DOWNLOAD TANDEM AND LEARN A LANGUAGE NOW! Tandem unites people across borders through language learning. Whether you’re looking to make international friends, talk to strangers, or connect with others who are passionate about languages, Tandem has it all. BETTER VOCAB Skip the tricky grammar tests and random phrases. Tandem allows you to focus on meaningful conversation practice, centered around topics you care about. PERFECT PRONUNCIATION Want to sound like a native speaker? One way to help is to practice a language with your exchange partner until you’ve mastered every word and phrase. SOUND LIKE A LOCAL Practice a language with voice notes, audio, and video chats until you sound like a native speaker. No matter If you’re looking for tips on pronunciation or want to speak more casually in your fluency. MAKE INTERNATIONAL FRIENDS Tandem connects you with international friends who share your passion for language learning. You’ll not only practice speaking, but also gain insights into various cultures. IMMERSIVE GROUP LEARNING Experience group learning like never before with Tandem’s interactive Parties! Use them to practice a language by listening in on group conversations or take the lead and start your own language Party. GRAMMAR TIPS & TRICKS Use translation features and text corrections to master grammar from the first try, whether you are perfecting everyday speech or understanding formal speech. App Access Permissions: Optional permissions: - Location information: Required to use the Nearby feature to see members near you, the Travel feature to show members around the world and to add an approximate location to your profile. - Microphone: Required for sending audio messages, making audio and video calls, and joining Language Parties. - Camera: Required for taking photos to upload to your profile or post in a Language Club, take and send a photo in a chat, video calling, and scanning QR codes. - Notifications: Used to send you notifications about acceptance into the community, new messages, new followers and their posts, new references and marketing communication. - Nearby devices: Bluetooth access is required to connect audio devices during a call or Language Party. You can still use Tandem without granting optional permissions, except features where their nature requires the respective permission, like a video call requiring camera permission. Got a question? Contact us on support@tandem.net

title: DuoCards - Vocabulary Builder
description:
Master vocabulary and learn languages fast with DuoCards – the #1 duocards app for Spanish flash cards, English words, AI-powered vocab builder, and more!

🔹 DuoCards Language Flashcards  
Swipe, sort and study with our spaced-repetition algorithm. Build your vocabulary with duo cards app precision: English vocabulary, Spanish vocabulary, French flashcards, German words, Korean vocab, Japanese kanji, Russian language, Italian vocabulary, Portuguese phrases, and 50+ languages.

🔹 Vocabulary Builder & AI Tutor  
Use our vocabulary AI builder to discover new words, phrases, and sentences. Whether you’re improving English learning, mastering Spanish vocabulary, or expanding your French vocab, this AI tutor adapts to your level. A free vocabulary builder app and vocab builder for learners of all levels.

🔹 Tinycards & Memorise fun  
DuoCards app brings you flashcards fun with extra power: built-in translator, offline mode, and shareable decks.

title: Spelling & Phonics: Kids Games
description:
Spelling made simple, phonics made fun! Discover the fun way to learn Spelling and Phonics sounds - no ads, no subscriptions, just learning!
Looking for fun and interactive spelling games for kids? Spelling & Phonics: Kids Games is the perfect phonics learning game designed for kindergarten, toddlers, and preschoolers. These educational learn to spell games allow your little one to develop basic spelling, phonics, and reading skills in a fun and engaging way.

This spelling game engages kids with a variety of interactive learning activities that teach CVC words, letter recognition, and word-building skills. Whether your child is beginning to learn vowels and consonants or is ready to explore a CVC words list, this game makes learning english exciting and effective for kids.

✨ Interactive Spelling Games & CVC (Consonant-Vowel-Consonant) word Activities:
✏️ Spelling Mode: Learn to spell the words by dragging letters and matching them with pictures!
📒 Fill in the Blanks: Complete the word by selecting the missing letters.
📝 Blank Spelling: Spell words independently without hints for a challenge.
📚 CVC Words for Kindergarten: Arrange letters to spell CVC words and strengthen your reading skills.
🔤 Word Builder: Drag letters to create words and improve your spelling practice & rhyming word skills.
🖍️ Vowel Fun: Complete words by adding the missing vowels.
🎈 Balloon Pop: Pop the balloons with the correct letters to complete the word.
🃏 Memory Match: Practice word matching to reinforce and solidify learning.

Make spelling fun with a fishing-themed spelling game mode for kids! Catch the right letter fish to form words while enjoying an exciting, colorful adventure.

With bright visuals, engaging animations, and an easy-to-use interface, ABC Spelling turns learning into an exciting journey that kids love!

✅ Enhance your child's english through playful learning!

Give your child the best start with Spelling & Phonics: Kids Games, the ultimate spelling game for kids! title: Pico AI: Daily Micro Learning
description:
Meet Pico AI—your go-to app for bite-sized learning! 


In just 15 minutes a day, gain valuable knowledge across math, literature, history, logic, art, finance, philosophy, and biology. Pico AI helps you learn smarter, not harder with concise, expert-crafted lessons designed for busy minds.


WHY CHOOSE PICO AI?

Learn in Just 15 Minutes a Day
No need to set aside hours—each lesson is short and to the point, making learning easy and effortless.

Stop Doom Scrolling
Instead of endlessly browsing social media, turn your spare moments into meaningful knowledge sessions that enhance your thinking and boost your confidence.

Perfect for Your Daily Routine
Use Pico AI while sipping your morning coffee, commuting, or winding down before bed. Learning has never been this flexible and convenient.

Expand Your Knowledge Effortlessly
Explore a variety of subjects without getting overwhelmed. Each lesson is expert-designed to provide valuable insights in minutes.

Become a More Interesting & Informed Person
Want to impress your friends with fascinating facts and ideas? Pico AI helps you retain and apply knowledge in everyday life, making you more confident and well-rounded.

Turn self-development into laid-back and easy leisure with bite-sized lessons!

WHAT CAN YOU LEARN?
- Mathematics & Logic – Improve problem-solving skills with real-world applications.
- Literature & Philosophy – Explore timeless works and deep ideas that shape the world.
- History & Art – Understand cultures, movements, and iconic masterpieces.
- Finance – Gain essential money management and financial literacy skills.
- Biology – Discover how life works, from cells to ecosystems.

Whether you're looking to sharpen your mind, learn new concepts, or simply satisfy your curiosity, Pico AI makes knowledge accessible, engaging, and easy to absorb.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
1. Download the app and start exploring various subjects.
2. Dedicate just 15 minutes a day to expand your knowledge.
3. Track your progress and stay motivated to keep learning.
4. Become a more informed, confident, and curious person every day!

WHO IS PICO AI FOR?
- Lifelong learners who love exploring new ideas.
- Busy professionals looking for quick and effective learning.
- Students who want extra knowledge beyond school.
- Anyone who enjoys learning in an easy, digestible way!

title: Elevate - Brain Training Games
description: Sharpen your mind in 2026 with Elevate. Elevate is an award-winning brain trainer that uses fun games and brain teasers to improve vocabulary, speaking abilities, processing speed, memory skills, mental math, and more for adults and students. Each person gets a personalized learning program that adjusts over time to maximize results. The more you play Elevate, the more you'll improve practical cognitive skills with engaging brain teasers that boost productivity, earning power, and self-confidence. Over 90% of users notice improvements in vocabulary, memory, math skills, and overall mental sharpness by regularly engaging with our games and exercises. Elevate is designed to test and enhance cognitive abilities, making it a great educational tool. No matter your age, background, or profession, you can benefit from our app through daily practice. Elevate offers a 7-day free trial and a free version. Sign up, then tap the X in the top left corner to use the free version. IN THE NEWS “Elevate comes out ahead” in the battle of the brain training apps. - CNET Elevate is a “cognitive pick-me-up” with games that are “good for mental breaks throughout the workday.” - Washington Post FEATURES 40+ Brain Training Games: Improve cognitive skills like vocabulary, focus, memory, processing, math, grammar, precision, and comprehension with 40+ brain training games and puzzles for adults and students. Performance Tracking: Measure your performance in language and problem-solving against yourself and others. Weekly reports highlight your key accomplishments and learning opportunities. Personalized Workouts: Customize the focus of your daily workouts to train and practice the mind skills you need most. Select from diverse tests, games, and puzzles to stay sharp, increase focus, and build cognitive skills. Adaptive Progression: Engage in math and word games that evolve in difficulty as you progress, ensuring a fun and challenging experience that tests and hones your concentration, language, and logical problem-solving abilities. Workout Achievements: Start a workout streak with our brain trainer app and stay motivated with 150+ achievements to win while you train your mind. WHY ELEVATE Expand your vocabulary with brain teasers. Learn how to use thousands of new words through fun games and puzzles for adults and students. Express yourself more effectively by honing your grammar skills and learning to write with clarity and persuasiveness. Improve your spelling, punctuation, and grammar. Avoid common writing pitfalls with regular practice. Become a better reader and learner. Easily understand language, improve concentration, and logically flow through everyday materials faster. Solve everyday math problems quickly and easily. Improve your problem-solving abilities for comparing prices, splitting bills, and calculating discounts. Boost your focus and memory skills. Get shopping lists out of your pocket and into your mind. Never forget to buy the milk you need or the chocolate you've been craving. Speak confidently with strong grammar. Advance your speech with new vocabulary words. Become more articulate and develop clear expression and tone. Feel mentally sharper as an adult. Continue to learn with Elevate's proven language and logical problem-solving training program. Elevate's brain games, puzzles, and teasers are created with educational experts based on proven educational learning techniques. Our brain trainer’s mental workout algorithms draw from cognitive research in attention, memory studies, and logical reasoning, providing exercises that test and enhance focus and memory skills through deliberate practice. 93% of people who use Elevate frequently feel mentally sharper and more confident in key skills, proving the educational value of our program. For more details, see our Terms of Service (https://www.elevateapp.com/terms) and Privacy Policy (https://www.elevateapp.com/privacy).

title: Learn English Vocabulary,Words
description:
Learn English Vocabulary Recite 10000 Words is an app based on AI and the theory of Ebbinghaus✌️ forgetting curve, focus on helping you learn and memorize English words EASILY and QUICKLY🚀;
Learn English Vocabulary provide multi ways to help you remember words, such as picture, Mind Map, AI-generated articles, quotes by famous people, example sentence, roots and affixes, synonym, word group etc,  and it will intelligently arrange you to review words in time to achieve good long-term memory☺️. 

🔥 Learn English Vocabulary Recite 10000 Words contains many word library📚, such as Oxford, Collins, IELTS, TOEFL, GRE, etc, the most one has 15000+ words, each word contains definitions, illustrations, pronunciations and example sentences to help you master new words quickly. You can choose suitable word library for learning. After each learning, it provide a variety of interesting and smart tests.

🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Learn English Vocabulary Recite 10000 Words' features:   
- Learn and review according to the Ebbinghaus✌️ brain forgetting curve
- Learn English words with the help of AI,  AI-generated articles and words Mind Map
- Learn English Vocabulary Recite 10000 Words provide 3 learning modes: 
     -- Ebbinghaus Mode(recite words 4 times a day)
     -- Moderate Mode(recite words 2 times a day) 
     -- Simple Mode(recite words 1 time a day)
- Provide learning plan based on the word library and the number of words you plan to learn per day
- AI Learn English Vocabulary Recite 10000 Words analyze your learning progress to adjust you learning plan intelligently🔥, so that you can remember words easily and quickly🚀
- You can select multi words and let AI generated articles to help you learn effectively
- Strengthen the memory of words through smart tests
- Remember vocabulary through related illustrations picture
- Classify words to total list, unfamiliar list, and mastered lists, mark the words you proficient as "mastered" to reduce the words amount of learning
- AI Learn English Vocabulary Recite 10000 Words provide definitions for each word, 20+ language support
- English-English definitions from the dictionary
- Example sentences are provided for each word
- Listen to standard English audio🔊, provide British and American phonetic symbols and pronunciation
- You can search🔍 English words like in an English dictionary
- You can create your own learning list in Learn English Build Vocabulary
- You can select a word library that suits you
- You can set how many words to learn every day in Learn English Words
- Set the starting learning time of each day
- Provide multiple font sizes
- Learn more, you get more gold coins to exchange lovely virtual classmates, and at the same time, you boost your learning experience level

❤️ We hope AI Learn English Vocabulary Recite 10000 Words can help you learn English words easily and quickly.  
Your comments and rating are welcomed to make Learn English Vocabulary Recite 10000 Words better and better. Thanks a lot

title: Quizlet: More than Flashcards
description:
Quizlet gives you study tools that teach you — not just tell you the answer — so you can walk into every test with confidence.

Your personalized feed recommends exactly what to study next, powered by your courses, your school and what students like you are studying now. Jump in faster with Study Bites: bite‑sized suggestions, progress updates and content tailored to your learning goals.

Turn your notes into study materials
* Turn class notes into practice tests, study guides and flashcards so you can review your material in the way that works best for you
 * Create flashcards from scratch or let AI generate a deck from your study materials

Flashcards that fit your routine
* Discover millions of flashcard sets created by students and teachers
* Sort cards into Know and Still learning to track progress
* Save decks for offline access and study anywhere

Practice that adapts to you
* Turn any flashcard set into practice questions to reinforce knowledge
* Study with multiple choice, true/false and written questions
* Quizlet adapts based on what you know and what needs more work
* Seamlessly pick up where you left off across all your devices

Exam‑ready tests
* Simulate test day with a personalized practice test generated from any flashcard set
* Customize the number of questions and formats to challenge yourself in different ways
* Get instant scoring and feedback to spot gaps and build confidence

Homework help when you need it
* Expert‑authored, step‑by‑step solutions to tough homework problems
* Check your work in challenging subjects like Calculus, Chemistry and Electrical Engineering
* Use AI‑powered support to unpack each step or explore alternative approaches

Study together
* Collaborate with classmates by matching strengths and weaknesses
* Share decks, get help on tough topics and master material faster

Quizlet is the all-in-one study tool for language learning, vocabulary and test prep.

Quizlet Plus subscriptions will be charged to your Google account. Your monthly or annual subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in your Account Settings after purchase. Some features may not be available in your country or region.

Terms of Service: https://quizlet.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://quizlet.com/privacy

title: Aedict3 Japanese Dictionary
description:
The only Japanese dictionary worth paying for. An off-line english japanese dictionary which uses Jim Breen's JMDict (upgraded EDict)/KanjiDic2/WWWJDIC data along with data from the Tatoeba project. Does not require japanese keyboard. Internet access is used only to download the dictionary - the application itself works offline.

WARNING: Does not work correctly on some Galaxy Tabs 3, namely, the 10.1 Tab 3: users of 7" and 8" Tab tablets have reported that Aedict works correctly for them. Please do not buy this app if you own the Galaxy Tab 3 10.1 device.

Features:
- allows kanji searching by parts/radicals, SKIP code search and by kanji drawing
- omnibar allows search by kana, romaji and/or english, german, french, Russian, Dutch, Portugalese, Spanish, Hungarian, Slovene, Swedish. Deinflects verbs automatically.
- powerful Japanese search: support for mixing kana and kanji (e.g. search for 見ため will also find 見た目), automatic vowel prolonging, e.g. しゅじん will also find しゅうじん.
- shows proper pitch accents for every word
- optionally shows romaji instead of hiragana/katakana.
- supports Hepburn, Nihon-Shiki and Kunrei-Shiki romanization systems
- JLPT/Joyo Quizes, with a simple SRS/Leitner support
- You can store entries in a notepad and practice the notepad contents with notepad quiz.
- Shows stroke order kanji diagrams (courtesy of KanjiVG), allows jlpt/Joyo Quiz kanji draw practice
- Samsung multi-window support, Japanese Names Dictionary support, shows verb conjugations
- Dropbox, OwnCloud and Aedict Online https://aedict-online.eu integration
- Japanese font for proper character display
- Kotowaza sentences dictionary taken from http://kotowaza.org/
- Export to AnkiDroid
- Add custom tags and colors to any dictionary entry

UPDATE NOTE: When updating Aedict, please also update all dictionaries, to gain access to the new features.

Aedict 3 needs to download the dictionaries which is cca 200mb download - please make sure that you are connected to the WIFI to avoid additional charges. Aedict 3 cannot use dictionaries used by Aedict 2.

Aedict 3 is based on Aedict 2.9 but introduces new Android 4 GUI. Aedict 3 works on Android 2.1 and greater.

For more questions please visit http://aedict.eu/faq.html

title: Mango Languages Learning
description:
Ready to have real conversations? Mango Languages prioritizes real language, real culture, and real progress. Our comprehensive learning platform offers conversational language lessons in 70+ languages, teaching vocabulary, pronunciation, grammar, and culture simultaneously.

From preparing for vacation or working abroad, to personal development and academic growth, our language courses are designed to take you wherever you wish to go.

HOW DOES MANGO WORK?

Learn languages from native speakers with courses that feature thousands of real recordings.
Enhance comprehension with interactive listening and reading activities and bolster your learning with personalized daily reviews.
Refine speaking skills with phonetic spellings, natural and slow pronunciations, and our pronunciation comparison tool.
Sync progress across all platforms and NO ADS, so you can learn anywhere, at any time, with no distractions.

WHY CHOOSE MANGO?

Practical, Authentic Content: The outcome of using Mango is the ability to speak and communicate in real conversations.

Linguist-Approved Language Courses: Each course is designed by expert linguists to provide high-quality instruction that produces real results.

Placement Tests: Not sure where to start? Use our placement tests in select languages to identify the best starting point.

Individualized Review: Our intelligent review system helps you retain knowledge through spaced repetition and adapts to your progress.

Practice with Flashcards: Supercharge your vocabulary with built-in flashcards or take it a step further and create your own lists!

On-The-Go Learning: Download lessons to your phone for offline access and take advantage of our hands-free audio feature!

HOW CAN I START?

When you sign up, you can find free access through a subscribing organization, like a public library, or you can subscribe with a 14-day free trial. Cancel at any time.

Serious about language learning? Our paid subscriptions include: 
Individual Plan: Access to all of our languages in one learning profile.
Family Plan: Access to all of our languages for you and up to five additional family members.

For questions or feedback, please contact support@mangolanguages.com

title: NKENNE: Learn African Language
description:
NKENNE is your gateway to Africa’s soul. A journey back to identity, culture, and belonging. Whether you're learning to connect with your roots or discovering the beauty of a new language, NKENNE empowers you to speak Africa with confidence and pride.

Join over 250,000 learners worldwide embracing the richness of 15 African languages, including Igbo, Yoruba, Swahili, Lingala, Wolof, Hausa, and more.

Why It Matters:
Language is more than words—it’s music, memory, and meaning. With every NKENNE lesson, you're not just learning—you’re unlocking stories, traditions, and the soul of a continent.

Your Journey, Your Way:
Start with engaging audio lessons crafted by global educators. Then take it deeper with NKENNE LiiVE—our 1-on-1 learning experience with native-speaking tutors. Compare learning at your pace through audio with learning in real time through live mentorship.

Here’s what awaits you:
• 15 African Languages — from the most spoken to the rarest, accessible anytime, anywhere.
• Audio + LiiVE Learning — shift from self-guided to personalized live sessions.
• TRiiBE Community — connect, celebrate, and converse with fellow learners.
• Culture-First Content — music, blogs, podcasts that bring African stories to life.

NKENNE means “mother’s own”—because language is personal. It’s who we are.

Download NKENNE and begin your journey of reconnection, one word at a time.

*Some features and offerings may vary by language. Learn more at https://www.nkenne.com

*Terms of Use: https://www.nkenne.com/terms-of-service

title: IELTS Sample Tests with AI
description:
Ace Your IELTS Exam with Our All-in-One IELTS Prep App!

Step closer to your career and academic goals with IELTS Sample Tests with the AI comprehensive IELTS Prep App designed to streamline your study process. Our app offers effective practice tools, tips, and support to help you achieve a higher IELTS band score in less time.

Key Features:

IELTS Listening Practice: Interactive exercises to sharpen your listening skills and improve focus.

IELTS Reading Practice: Techniques to enhance comprehension and reading speed with extensive practice materials.

IELTS Writing with AI Scoring: Improve your writing clarity and correctness. Receive instant AI feedback to gauge your performance and identify areas for improvement.

IELTS Speaking with AI Scoring: Refine your pronunciation and fluency. Practice speaking tasks with real-time AI feedback to boost your confidence.

IELTS Sample Tests: Simulate the actual IELTS exam experience with full-length practice tests to assess your readiness.

Why Choose Our IELTS Prep App?

- Comprehensive coverage of all IELTS skills for the test.
- AI-powered scoring for Writing and Speaking sections.
- User-friendly interface for an efficient study process.
- Access your preparation materials anytime, anywhere.
- Stay motivated with progress tracking and personalized feedback.
- Support resources to answer your queries and guide you throughout your preparation.

Disclaimer:

Please note that the AI feedback is a tool to provide an initial assessment. Actual IELTS scores may vary based on official grading criteria and evaluations by certified IELTS examiners.

If you have any questions please contact us at devxpert01@gmail.com

Please be advised: IELTS Sample Tests is not to be associated with the IELTS Program or IELTS British Council, the official administrators of the IELTS test. This tool is build by an indipendent group and is designed to help you maximize your CLB score.

title: French lessons - Frantastique
description:
Frantastique delivers short, personalized and fun French lessons. Our goal: your motivation, participation and progress. It’s the easiest, friendliest way to learn French.

Test Frantastique for free and get a level assessment and a personalized pedagogical report!

✓ More than 6,000,000 users around the world 
✓ Long-term results 
✓ A personalized approach 
✓ You can try Frantastique for 7 days free of charge
✓ Adapted for post-beginners (from 15 years old)

1. Each day you'll receive a lesson adapted to your needs, capabilities and goals.

2. Once it's completed, you'll immediately receive personalized corrections and explanations.

3. Your lessons are customized based on your strengths and weaknesses.

4. You'll get a personalized learning report when you finish the course.

Learn French with Frantastique
.... .... .... .... .... ..... 

A story. On a French-speaking planet, an Intergalactic agency staffed by humans and aliens defrosts Victor Hugo to act as a guide to Francophone culture and life. But first, Victor must bring mustard from Earth in order to avoid a bloody revolution.

Learning French isn't simply learning a list of words or a set of rules - language is also culture. For each one of our language courses, we offer a setting that includes diverse characters and personalities, various accents, professional and personal situations, all with a touch of humor.
Assess your level and get certified. Our free trial includes a complete level assessment (containing an outline of your current strengths and weaknesses). You'll get a personalized learning report when you finish the French course.

For web, tablet and mobile. With apps available for iOS and Android, enjoy your French lessons whenever and wherever you like.

Motivation. With its diversity of content, Frantastique motivates and encourages users to progress my making e-learning as fun as possible - the best way to learn French.

Memorization. To consolidate acquired French knowledge, our learning method takes into account our natural tendency to forget things over time. For long-term memorization, our system designs an optimized revision schedule for each student.

Explore a new culture. Each of our French lessons ends with a "dessert": an authentic clip of can't-miss francophone culture. Film, music, literature or television allow you to finish your workout in style.

...... ...... ...... ...... ...... 

Learn French with Frantastique now. Try the first 7 days of Frantastique free of charge. The trial is absolutely free and non-binding. Under no circumstances will you be registered for the full, paying version of our lessons without your explicit consent. We guarantee the confidentiality of your personal details. 

Our French lessons are created in-house by our international pedagogical team. The program is designed so that you can learn French efficiently in the long run. Frantastique is developed in its entirety by A9 SAS Gymglish.

title: Speak Pal - English Practice
description: It's pointless to study English if you can't speak it! Speak Pal is an English conversation club and talking app where it's easy to find a language partner and talk to strangers with the same interests as well as the same level of language. You can use this English learning app FOR FREE and WITHOUT ADS! Thousands of users worldwide have already improved their speaking skills by talking with each other. You learn to talk about yourself, your work or anything else that interests you and your partner. Start speaking English and find new friends today! WHAT ‘SPEAK PAL’ CAN DO FOR YOU 1. Improve your spoken English If you want to be good at language, theory alone is not enough. The best way to raise your level is to talk with other people. Speaking and conversation practice will strengthen your theory knowledge and simultaneously turn the otherwise passive eng vocabulary into an active one. 2. Gain confidence Say goodbye to your fear of talking in English or making mistakes. This application will connect you with friendly people who will support you even if you are at the very beginning of your learning journey. You don't need to worry about forgetting irregular verbs or not being able to remember the right word. With practice and speaking training comes greater confidence and the ability to express yourself no matter what language level you are at. 3. Learn about other cultures When you practice a language with real people, language exchange is not the only important thing. You will get to know other cultures and learn about the traditions and worldviews of people from around the world. Expand your horizons and meet new interesting people with the English speaking club! It doesn’t matter that you don’t have much time to spend on your English studies. Start off with only 15 minutes a day, and this will work wonders for your skills. You will talk a bit better after every conversation you have. And your vocabulary grows faster than ever! Get a daily English speaking practice, improve your language level and find new friends of interest! Contact us if you have any questions. Any at all! Email: support@speakpal.club Telegram: https://t.me/speakpal_support

title: Campus - AI Learning Companion
description:
Personalized learning for anything – crafted by learning experts, powered by AI.
Whether you’re cramming for finals, stuck on a homework problem, or exploring a random topic for fun, Campus helps you learn faster and retain more. Just type what you want to study or drop in notes, documents, or videos, and Campus turns it into step-by-step exercises built just for you.

Each lesson gets harder as you level up, helping you build real understanding instead of guessing your way through.

What makes Campus different:
- Practice for tests, get homework help, and explore new topics – all in one app.
- Upload your own materials and watch AI turn them into personalized study paths.
- Learn actively with quizzes, problems, and challenges that adapt as you improve.
- Stay motivated and track your mastery over time.

From school to career to curiosity, Campus gives you the power to learn anything—smarter, faster, and your way.


IN-APP SUBSCRIPTIONS: 
If you decide to subscribe to Campus to access unlimited courses, unlimited uploads and our most advanced reasoning models,:
- Payment will be applied to your Google account upon confirmation.
- Subscriptions will automatically renew unless cancelled within 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Turn off Auto renewals any time in your settings in the Play Store.
- Cancel any time by visiting the 'Manage Subscriptions' in your account.
- Offers and pricing are subject to change without notice.

title: Cake - Learn English & Korean
description: An incredible English & Korean learning app used by 100 million people worldwide. Master your English & Korean using free videos and audio content updated daily! We currently only support English for learning Korean. But don't worry! More languages will be added soon! You can learn real English expressions selected by English experts. Practice your speaking and revise what you learned with quizzes. Practice and repetition will make memorizing the expressions simple! Continuous learning with Cake will definitely help improve your English & Korean skills. It's fun. - Learn with your favorite celebrity, artist, and vlogger videos. - It's also full of exciting original content made by us. You can learn real native English. - Learn real English used in vlogs, movies, and TV shows. - Become familiar with different accents and pronunciations. - You can learn how to express one sentence in many different ways. Cake will help you improve your speaking. - Watch videos with subtitles, and repeat after each line. - Get your pronunciation checked by our AI. - Practice speaking like in a real conversation. Learn step-by-step. - Select a topic of your choice and study step-by-step with our 'class' feature. - Study using the 'classes' created by English experts. - You can practice speaking and listening like in real conversations. Repeat and revise. - Review what you learned using fun quizzes. - Save the sentences you like, and test yourself. Just 10 minutes a day. - Achieve your daily study goals, and feel accomplished. - The more accomplished you feel, the more motivated you'll feel to keep learning! Cake's exclusive features - Daily expression clips: New expressions are added daily, and are organized by topic. - Original lectures: English & Korean lectures created by Cake - Classes: Enables you to study step-by-step by combining lectures, videos, and quizzes into several courses. - Quizzes: Listening, key expressions, reviews, and many more revision quizzes. - Speak: Practice listening and speaking with audio learning. - Today's conversation: Practice listening and speaking with a unique conversation every day. - Save sentences and words: Practice and repeat sentences and words of your choice. Improve your learning with Cake Plus. Get unlimited hearts and enjoy the app with no ads. Access exclusive Cake Plus content, and save as many words and sentences as you want. Real English expressions selected by English experts! Use Cake daily and watch your English improve!

title: IELTS Test Preparation Guide
description:
IELTS or International English Language Testing System is designed to evaluate the level of English Language of an individual. IELTS tests are conducted by British Counsel. Results of IETLS are recognized all over the world. If you are a student or professional and seeking Visa of any English speaking Country you may need to get significant score of your IELTS exams in order to convince the visa processing officer that you have good command over English. 

There are 4 modules of IELTS tests, Speaking, Reading, Writing and Listening. Tests of all 4 modules are taken separately. The average score of all of your modules is your final score which is generally knows as Band. Total IELTS Bands are 9 out of which you are scored accordingly to your abilities. Generally 7 Bands are required to full fill requirements. 

In this IELTS Preparations Guide we have very carefully collected and prepared all the content for you to get good IELTS Band. We have thoroughly prepared and designed the content of the app to give user an easy way to pass their IELTS Exams. 

IELTS Preparation app have all the content one needs to prepare for their tests. Along with IELTS Exams preparation material we have also added mock IELTS Test and IELTS Quiz to evaluate our performance. Take IELTS Mock tests and evaluate what you have learned and how much more work you need to get 7+ IELTS Band. 

This IELTS Prep app British counsel is a very handy tool for all the users. Learn IELTS Vocabulary, IELTS Speaking Course, IELTS Reading Preparation and IELTS Writing sample tests are also available in the app. 

With IETLS Vocabulary you can learn new words which will help you to get good IELTS Band. Our app is separated into 4 categories, IELTS Listening, IELTS Speaking, IELTS Reading and IELTS Writing. In all those categories you will find all the content you need to prepare yourself for Exams. 

This Complete IELTS Course is very handy for students and professionals. IELTS Listening is then separated into Beginner, Intermediate and Advance levels. Along with Conversations and IELTS Practice Tests. 

IELTS Reading category has Essays, Short Stories, 5000 IELTS Vocabulary, Most Common Phrases, Most Common Words, Useful Expressions, English Proverbs, American Slangs, Irregular Verbs and IELTS Reading Quiz. 

Get our easy to use Complete IELTS Course and prepare yourself for upcoming IELTS Exams.

title: Chorcha: Practice & Learn
description:
Chorcha is a problem-solving and exam preparation app for School (Class 8, 9, 10), SSC, HSC (Science, Arts, Commerce & English Version), Admission, BCS, Bank Job and other competitive exams. Students can practice questions, take online tests, use AI support, and track their progress in one place.

Chorcha in numbers:
• 2M+ students
• 1M+ questions (MCQ & CQ)
• 10M+ minutes practiced
• 10M+ exams taken

Chorcha AI – Smart Learning Assistant

Chorcha AI helps students study more efficiently by generating custom question sets, creating mock tests, explaining MCQ and written problems, and assisting with chapter-wise or topic-wise practice. It supports School, SSC, HSC, Admission, BCS, and Job exam topics.

Free Model Tests

Chorcha provides special model tests before major exams. These include HSC & SSC Board Exams, BUET admission, Medical admission, DU admission, and many other university admission tests. Model tests are also offered for BCS preliminary, Bank Job exams, Primary preliminary, and other job exams. After completion, students can check results and view a leaderboard.

Unlimited Online Exams (Premium)

Premium users can take unlimited subject-wise, chapter-wise, and topic-wise online exams. Tests are available for Science, Humanities, Commerce, SSC, HSC, School, Admission, BCS, Bank Job, and additional competitive exams. Each exam generates new question sets from a large database.

Quick MCQ Practice

Quick MCQ Practice allows students to solve one question at a time in a fast and focused format. It is useful for Admission tests, HSC, SSC, School, BCS, Bank Job and other competitive exams. Students can earn badges and collect points that contribute to their weekly leaderboard ranking.

Weekly Leading Learners Leaderboard

The leaderboard helps students compare their progress across School, SSC, HSC, Admission and BCS categories. Rankings improve through regular practice, online exams, and consistent performance. Top users may receive special recognition.

Digital Question Bank & Test Papers

Chorcha includes a large archive of organized test papers and question banks.

School, SSC & HSC:
• Board questions from the previous 5–7 years
• Chapter-wise practice for Class 8, 9, 10, SSC & HSC

Admission Preparation:
• BUET
• DU A, DU B, DU C
• IBA
• RU, CU, JU (all units)
• GST
• Agriculture Cluster
• RUET, KUET, CUET
• Medical, Dental, AFMC, Nursing
• IUT, MIST, BUP
• SUST, IU, JNU and more

Job & BCS Preparation:
• BCS preliminary & written
• Bank Job questions
• Primary Teacher preliminary
• Other competitive job exams

Chorcha supports students from School level to advanced competitive exams by offering regular practice, detailed question sets, AI assistance, and progress tracking. It helps learners build confidence and prepare in a structured way.

Follow for Updates

Website: https://chorcha.net

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@chorcha_net

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chorcha_net

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chorcha.net

Privacy Policy: https://chorcha.net/privacy

title: Grammar Check by AI Writing
description: Enhance your writing skills with the assistance of Grammar Check by AI Writing, a comprehensive grammar, spelling, and paraphrasing tool, all built on AI. This app will aid you in all your writing tasks. Grammar Check by AI Writing is the ultimate writing assistant application, utilizing cutting-edge technology to elevate your writing proficiency. With our latest features, including a Dictionary, you can now refine your English within a single app seamlessly. Imagine you have a sentence that needs refinement; you start with Grammar Check. Copy the corrected version generated by AI and utilize the Paraphrase feature to find the best choice. Furthermore, you can use our Dictionary to enhance your understanding of unfamiliar words. Experience instant results through an intuitive interface, making it effortless to correct English grammar and rectify errors, rephrase paragraphs in various tones, and compose professional emails. Why is this app outstanding in the market? ✅ Real-time grammar check and auto-correction: Say goodbye to red squiggly lines, as our app automatically detects and rectifies grammar and spelling mistakes in real-time, allowing you to focus on expressing yourself effectively. ✅ Grammar Explanation: Following the grammar check, a detailed description of your mistakes is provided, enabling you to thoroughly understand and learn from your errors for the future. ✅ Dictionary: Deepen your understanding of English words with our comprehensive dictionary, which includes word types, IPA, and examples to help you master each and every word. ✅ Enhanced Input Options: In addition to traditional typing, our app offers the convenience of text scanning through your camera or inserting pictures. Furthermore, you can even use your voice for text input. ✅ Word Relations: This feature is designed to enrich your text by suggesting alternative words and expressions, enhancing the quality of your writing with a variety of vocabulary options. ✅ Tone Transformation: Easily adjust the tone of your writing to suit any situation. Whether you need your essay to sound professional or wish to write a casual email to a friend, it's easily accomplished. ✅ Email Composition: Whether you're sending a crucial work email or catching up with friends, Grammar Check by AI Writing has you covered. Our AI can craft emails aligning with your objectives, ensuring your messages are clear, concise, and error-free. You can have confidence in the professionalism and effectiveness of your emails. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply aiming to enhance your writing skills, this app is the perfect writing assistant to help you achieve your goals. With real-time grammar checks and corrections, you can be confident that your writing is both clear and effective. Privacy Policy: https://metaverselabs.ai/privacy-policy/ Terms of use: https://metaverselabs.ai/terms-of-use/ You are welcome to contact us at support@metaverselabs.ai

title: LogicLike: ABC & Math for kids
description:
LogicLike is the ultimate educational game for kids, designed to develop cognitive skills, problem-solving abilities, and school readiness in a fun and engaging way. With over 6,200 interactive learning challenges, LogicLike fosters critical thinking, math skills, and logical reasoning, making learning enjoyable for children aged 3 and up.

🧠 Boost Cognitive Skills Through Play
LogicLike offers age-appropriate learning activities designed by expert educators and psychologists, like painting games for kids, math games and others. Whether it's early childhood education, preschool learning, or elementary school preparation, our structured puzzles and logic games promote essential cognitive growth. Pre-k preschool learning games, kids coloring and ABC learning activities are available to nurture essential early skills.

🎮 Interactive & Engaging Educational Content
• Math & Logic Games – Strengthen problem-solving skills with number puzzles and brain teasers.
• 3D Geometry & Spatial Reasoning – Explore shapes, patterns, and object recognition.
• Chess for Beginners – Develop strategic thinking and planning skills.
• Preschool & Kindergarten Math Readiness – Build a solid foundation for early education with Pre-k learning activities and Preschool games.
• Family-Oriented Educational Games – Encourage collaborative learning experiences with games designed for all ages, like abc learning, coloring for kids, 123 numbers game, pre k preschool games for kids.
• General Knowledge & Science Quizzes – Learn about animals, geography, and more!

✨ Why Kids & Parents Love LogicLike
✔ Adaptive learning tailored to your child’s progress, from 3-year-old games to 5yo games.
✔ Step-by-step guidance with interactive hints for a smooth learning experience.
✔ Engaging animations & voiceovers for immersive learning.
✔ Short, focused sessions (20 minutes) to prevent screen fatigue and keep children engaged.
✔ Certificates & achievement tracking to celebrate progress.

🌍 Multilingual Learning for Global Access
LogicLike supports multiple languages, allowing children to develop language, math, and logical skills in an interactive environment. Parents can explore free educational games for kids, including learning games for kids in various categories, and experience the benefits firsthand.

📚 Continuous Content Updates
New educational mini-games, logic puzzles, and learning activities are regularly added to enhance the learning experience. Whether you're looking for early childhood learning tools, interactive brain-training challenges, or free puzzle kids games, LogicLike provides a comprehensive educational journey.

📗 Perfect for Kids Aged 4+
LogicLike nurtures a love for learning through fun, structured, and research-backed activities that make learning for kids a natural part of their daily routine. Try it today and watch your child’s cognitive skills grow!

Privacy policy - https://logiclike.com/en/docs/privacy-app
Terms of service - https://logiclike.com/en/docs/public-app
Have questions? Contact us at office@logiclike.com

We are constantly updating LogicLike math, abc learning, fun educational games for kids, drawing for kids and pre school games also 123 for kids because we are always experience the excitement of their leisure. If you liked our logic puzzle and kids educational games, please tell your friends about the LogicLike 😊

title: LinkedIn Learning
description:
Achieve your next career goal with LinkedIn Learning—the only skill development platform based on the real-time skill and career insights from LinkedIn.

With the LinkedIn Learning Android app, you can:
- Learn from industry experts on the most in-demand business, tech, and creative skills
- Get real-time advice with AI-powered coaching in your pocket
- Get personalized content recommendations based on your skills and goals
- Stay up-to-date on the latest skills with new courses added weekly
- Learn the way you want online or offline—with bite-sized video, audio, or full course options
- Start learning a little bit every day with Daily
- Earn Professional Certificates and Continuing Education Credits
- Add certificates of completion to your LinkedIn profile 
- Learn in the language that's best for you, including English, German, French, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, Portuguese, Dutch, Indonesian, Polish, Turkish, and Korean

Trending topics include:
- Artificial intelligence and generative AI
- Business productivity and software
- Cybersecurity
- Diversity, equity, and inclusion
- Leadership and management
- Software development

The LinkedIn Learning app is free to download. With a subscription, you can access our full library as well as LinkedIn Premium networking tools. 

If you choose to subscribe, your subscription will automatically renew until canceled and will charge your credit card. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your LinkedIn account.


LinkedIn is committed to making its products and features accessible. Please find our statements to support this commitment https://linkedin.com/accessibility/reports

LinkedIn privacy policy: https://linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy
LinkedIn terms of use: https://linkedin.com/legal/user-agreement

title: Audible: Audio Entertainment
description:
Escape into stories you love with Audible. Discover a world of audiobooks, podcasts, and Audible Originals—where powerful storytelling meets immersive sound. Read more with hands-free listening. Download audiobooks & podcasts to listen offline, so you are never without a great story.

Find the perfect titles, bestsellers, exclusive Originals, and podcasts. Escape from the everyday with the award-winning fantasy series available on Audible. Discover genres like: health and wellness, mystery, fantasy, true crime and more. Personalize your experience with features such as adjustable narration speed, sleep timer, and bookmarks & notes.

Slow your heart rate and relax your body as you unwind with podcasts and bestsellers. Stream your favorite audiobook or podcast series narrated by a star-studded voice cast. Audiobooks purchased with cash or a credit are yours to keep.

Start building better habits with Audible today: listen to meditation books or inspiring health & wellness podcasts. Trade endless scrolling for hands-free listening.

Dive into the audiobooks of your favorite books before they hit the screen. Download an audiobook to enjoy on your next flight or listen to podcasts on the road with Car Mode. Listen while driving to work, cooking, working out, or winding down. Listen on your Wear OS or connect with any Bluetooth or Alexa-enabled device for hands-free playback.

AUDIBLE FEATURES

PODCASTS, & AUDIOBOOKS: ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
Dig into thrilling listens, popular audiobooks or eye-opening podcasts:
• Offline listening – Download your favorite titles and enjoy them wherever you are, without Wi-Fi
• Audiobooks or podcast stories – Listen on the road with Car Mode
• Read a book on your Kindle or switch to listen on your phone, tablet, or Wear OS
• Build better habits with audio content centered on fitness, workouts, and health & wellness

CULTIVATE YOUR CURIOSITY WITH AUDIO ENTERTAINMENT
Take your library with you — your stories go where you go. Audiobooks travel light.
• Listen to your reading list while tackling chores
• Create personalized playlists with podcasts and audiobooks
• Audio entertainment with customizable narration speed — up to 3.5x
• Stay in the know and browse collections like "Goodreads members' picks" and "#BookTok finds" discover trending book titles

KIDS PROFILES
Create a Kids Profile for your child and share family-friendly listens from our extensive catalog of children’s audiobooks, podcasts and Originals, right from the app.

THE PLUS CATALOG: LISTEN TO ORIGINALS
Podcasts, audiobooks, and Originals. Listen to thousands of titles, including exclusive series and educational audio.
• Download audio content in the Plus Catalog anytime you want, no credits necessary
• Audio library with all genres – listen to your favorite audiobook & podcast stories
• Originals & bestsellers – purchase and listen to trending favorite books

AUDIBLE MEMBERSHIP
New to Audible? Try membership free for 30 days. Amazon Prime members get 2 free credits with their first Audible trial that can be used on any 2 titles from our premium selection. Try cash purchases for titles you love and benefit from discounted prices as an Audible member.

AUDIBLE PREMIUM PLUS
With Premium Plus, you can access the Plus Catalog and much more:
• Plus Catalog – thousands of titles, podcasts, and Originals
• Get 1 monthly credit to choose any title you want
• Listen to an extended selection of bestsellers, Originals, and new releases
• A permanent library! Titles purchased with credits are yours to keep, even if you cancel

Purchase titles directly or acquire individual credits through the app and expand your audio library anytime with Audible.

-

The most compelling stories and podcasts, told by inspiring voices. Listen to storytelling that speaks to you, anytime, anywhere. Fall in love with books all over again with Audible, an Amazon company.

title: Apple Music
description:
Apple Music is all about the music, with the highest audio quality; exclusive, in-depth content and unparalleled access to the artists you love–all ad-free.

• Get unlimited access to 100 million songs.
• Listen to personalized new releases and find out about big moments in music, handpicked by our editors.
• Go deep with artists you love through exclusive interviews, live performances, and more content only found on Apple Music.
• Explore dozens of exclusive radio shows, created by the most iconic names in music, live or on demand.
•Experience the highest audio quality, from immersive Spatial Audio with Dolby Atmos to the unmatched clarity of Lossless Audio.
• Make and share playlists with friends, and collaborate on playlists together.
• Control the music together with SharePlay in the car.
• Download your favorite music and listen offline.
• Find your Discovery Station, personalized picks, mixes, and more in Listen Now.
• Follow and sing along with your favorite music with precise, beat-by-beat lyrics, and share the lines that move you.
• Enjoy a continuous listening experience with crossfade.
• Keep the music going with AutoPlay.
• Stream your favorite music via Chromecast to your favorite device. 
• Get personalized new releases and find out about big moments in music, handpicked by our editors.
• Find something new with hundreds of daily charts for cities and countries worldwide.
• Listen while on the go with Android Auto.

Availability and features vary by country and region, plan, or device. Subscriptions automatically renew unless they are canceled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage or cancel your subscriptions in Settings after purchase. Apple Media Services Terms and Conditions can be found at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/.

Optional App Permission
Notifications: To send push notifications about upcoming releases, new artists, friend activity, and other happenings on Apple Music.
Contacts: To recommend friends you may want to connect with on Apple Music. 
Camera: If you want to create a personal profile on Apple Music to share and connect with others, you can choose to take a profile photo. You can also choose to take a photo to add to your Personal Playlists.
You can use Apple Music even without providing consent to any of the above optional app permissions. However, some features of the service may not be available.

title: Learn French Daily with Readle
description:
Your French Learning App for Daily French Language News & Stories. Teacher-Crafted. Student-Ready.

Readle is a language learning app with real-world news & stories. It is the world's first CEFR-graded reader to help you learn French. Easily read & listen to news & stories anytime, anywhere – Take 5 minutes a day to learn French. === Why you should learn French with this French Learning App • Our language experts turn real-world news & stories into fun & bite-sized A1 – B2 French learning courses tailored to your level. • Your best companion for reading, listening, comprehension & flashcard vocabulary training with thousands of story courses. Download Readle for FREE and start to learn French the new way! ============== Learn languages with the Readle French Learning App, and be a part of the revolution: ► LEARN FRENCH EFFECTIVELY THROUGH IMMERSION Use our scientifically proven immersion method to learn French and create a real learning habit. Real-world stories & news curated by our language experts and turned into French classes ranging from A1 A2 B1 B2 levels. ► BITE-SIZED STORY LANGUAGE LEARNING COURSES +2000 interesting stories & news for you to learn French. Readle allows you to learn them effectively in context, including grammar tips and vocabulary flashcard training. ► PERFECT PRONUNCIATION Listen to the story audio sentence by sentence. It will help you practice pronunciation and improve your listening skills. ► INSTANT DICTIONARY Quickly look up a word translation in every article with a tap on the word – the easiest way to learn vocabulary, phrases, verbs, and conjugation. Save your time switching between, Reverso, Leo, Duden, or other French dictionaries. ► GRAMMAR HELPER French grammar helpers in each language learning course bring your grammar into action. Learn French grammar quickly from the story context with real examples. ► VOCABULARY LIST & FLASHCARDS Learn French vocabulary or verb conjugation in the story courses. Use spaced repetition to study a word – a scientifically proven learning method to review and recall vocabulary at an optimal time. ► QUIZ FOR COMPREHENSION Test your reading comprehension and practice French grammar, vocabulary, and articles (el & la) with quizzes in each story – a great way to challenge your French language skills and prepare yourself for Pipplet, TFI, DELF, DALF or other French language learning exams. ► STORY LIBRARY & DAILY NEW STORIES 2000+ news & stories courses for you to learn French in a wide range of topics that are available for your French learning: - Travel - Culture - Food - Latest News - Transportation - Entertainment - Science and Medical - Technology - People - Parties Plus many more – add on a daily basis! Readle is a must-have French learning app for living and traveling in French-speaking countries. Download Readle now and start to learn French! Questions or comments about learning with Readle? Please email us at support@readle-app.com Privacy policy: https://readle-app.com/privacy-policy/ Terms of use: https://readle-app.com/term-of-use/ Readle is the best companion for your language learning education & upcoming language learning tests to get ahead. Download Readle and start to learn French!

title: Preply: Language Learning App
description: Learn Languages with Preply Ready to learn languages and finally get fluent? Preply is the go-to language learning app for 1-on-1 lessons with expert tutors-personalized, flexible, and tailored to your goals. Whether you’re learning for travel, work, or personal growth, Preply connects you with the right tutor to help you succeed. Join over 2 million learners using Preply to study anywhere, anytime. Learn Mandarin Chinese or Spanish, English or German, Italian or French, Dutch or Japanese - Preply makes language learning achievable and rewarding. Learn a Foreign Language with 1-on-1 Lessons Choose from 50+ languages and get fluent with help from tutors who personalize each lesson around your needs: 🇬🇧🇺🇸 English 🇪🇸🇲🇽 Spanish 🇩🇪 German 🇮🇹 Italian 🇫🇷 French 🇨🇳 Chinese 🇯🇵 Japanese 🇷🇺 Russian 🇹🇭 Thai ★ 20% off your first lesson – use code APP20 Book a tutor through the Preply app and start learning a new language with a discount! ★ Start Learning a Foreign Language Today Your language learning journey begins with a single step. Preply gives you access to tutors who specialize in helping learners get fluent in Spanish, French, Dutch, Italian, German, Japanese, and more. Whether you’re preparing for life as an expat, working on pronunciation, or in need of accent training, your tutor will guide you every step of the way. Preply’s language learning app makes it easy to learn Mandarin Chinese, English, Spanish, or French - at any level. Lessons are personalized to fit your schedule, goals, and budget. Ideal for students, professionals, expats, and even kids. ★ Find Your Ideal Tutor Easily find a tutor who matches your learning style. Watch tutor videos, read reviews, and book a trial lesson to start your language learning journey with confidence. ★ Book a Trial Lesson and Make Progress from Day One Not sure where to start? Book a trial lesson with an expert who will tailor a plan just for you-whether it’s Business English, Mandarin Chinese for expats, or Dutch learning for beginners. Your tutor will personalize each lesson around your goals. ★ Focus on Your Language Goals With Preply, language learning fits your life. Choose when and how often you want to learn, and work toward goals like accent training, pronunciation improvement, or mastering a foreign language. ★ Stay Motivated and See Progress Track your language learning progress with every lesson. Whether you’re brushing up on your French learning or deepening your vocabulary in Italian, Preply keeps you moving forward. Every session brings you closer to being fluent. ★ Keep Learning Between Lessons Don’t stop at your lessons-keep practicing with Preply’s tools like the vocabulary trainer and study time calculator. From expanding your Spanish vocabulary to sharpening your pronunciation, Preply helps you stay consistent. ★ Learn a foreign language on Your Schedule With the Preply language learning app, you can learn anytime, anywhere. Whether you’re commuting, traveling, or on your lunch break, your tutor is just a tap away. Learn Mandarin Chinese, Spanish, German, Dutch, Japanese, Italian, or English-wherever life takes you. Why Choose the Preply language learning app? 1-on-1 lessons with expert tutors Personalized learning plans and goals (learn a new language, accent training, expanding your vocabulary, refresh your knowledge, and many more) Flexible scheduling that fits your life Progress you can feel-and measure Designed for learners at every stage Whatever your reason for learning a foreign language-career growth, connection, or confidence-the Preply language learning app helps you reach fluency, one lesson at a time.

title: Brilliant: Learn by doing
description:
Brilliant helps you excel in math and computer science with visual, interactive learning and personalized practice. Whether you’re a student or lifelong learner, Brilliant is designed to strengthen your STEM skills and turn you into a more confident thinker and problem solver.

Brilliant believes that everyone is a “math person”– it’s the way we learn math that can feel confusing. Here, you don’t memorize formulas. You explore concepts hands-on until they make sense. Brilliant guides you to real “aha” moments, helping you build the problem-solving skills, logic, and mathematical intuition needed for success in school, careers, and technical fields.

Our award-winning team of teachers and researchers from MIT, Harvard, Stanford, Microsoft, Google, and more has built a world-class library of STEM courses. Learn everything from foundational math and algebra to college-level calculus, Python, programming, computer science, AI, neural networks, algorithms, data analysis, physics, and quantum computing. Join over 10 million learners using Brilliant’s interactive lessons to master math, computer science, and more.

WHY BRILLIANT WORKS

- Reach serious learning goals
Brilliant teaches through active problem solving – a method shown to be far more effective than passive learning like videos or lectures. Interactive problems, motivating challenges, and real-time feedback help you understand math, coding, and science concepts.
    
- Learning that adapts to you
Brilliant personalizes your experience, tailoring practice sets to your skill level and helping you progress at the right pace. Smart, adaptive learning tools reinforce core skills and prepare you for more advanced STEM topics.
    
- Build true problem-solving skills
Brilliant doesn’t give you answers – it gives just enough guidance to help you reason through problems yourself. So while you learn, you build the critical thinking and analytical skills needed for real-world problem solving.
    
- A massive library of expert-crafted content
With new and updated courses added every month, there’s always something to explore in algebra, geometry, calculus, statistics, algorithms, Python, electrical engineering, data analysis, and more. Every course is crafted by human experts – not AI.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING

“Brilliant has taught me mathematical concepts that I previously struggled to understand.” — Jacob S.

“Our kids are engaged in critical thinking and complex problem solving – but just feel like they’re having fun!” *—* Mark

“I am using this app while taking CS classes and it often does a better job at explaining concepts than my professors.” — Erald C.

Send feedback to android@brilliant.org.

LIKE US: https://facebook.com/brilliantorg

FOLLOW US: https://x.com/brilliantorg

Privacy Policy: https://brilliant.org/privacy_policy/

Terms of Use: https://brilliant.org/terms-of-use/

title: Learn Japanese Speak Language
description:
Learn Japanese language, alphabet (hiragana, katakana, kanji & roomaji) and grammar with LuvLingua.

Begin the learning experience already enjoyed by millions around the world.
LuvLingua education apps teach you through fun games, and beginner to intermediate level courses.
Study core words and essential phrases to build a strong foundation of Japanese.
Understand and speak Japanese to communicate more effectively!
Recommended for students, teachers, travellers, and business people who want to learn Japanese.

Gain confidence and level up your ability with the beginner course.
200+ lessons that systematically teach and review new vocabulary, as well as help you construct sentences and questions.
Designed for students to train and improve fundamental language skills & knowledge.

Made by teachers to support and cater to different learning styles.
 - Visual (Picture & Memory Game)
 - Auditory (Listening Quiz)
 - Read-Write (Writing & Multichoice Quiz, Word Guess)
 - Kinesthetic (Animation & Target Game)
Progress in simple, easy stages and remember new lingo in a fast, fun way.

Convenient and interactive phrasebook, full of useful everyday conversation, and sorted into helpful categories.
The phrasebook includes vocabulary and dialogues for greetings, asking directions and telling time.
Test the basics with flashcards of numbers, food, clothing, colors and body parts.
Learn vocabulary and conversation to use in emergencies, school, shopping, travel and work.

Listen to high quality authentic audio of native speakers with clear pronunciation.
Test your listening and speaking ability, and master the correct pronunciation.

Alphabet (hiragana, katakana, kanji & roomaji) lookup menu and quiz.
Recognise, read and test the alphabet (hiragana, katakana, kanji & roomaji).

Grammar section and sentence builder.
Practice, review and improve your grammar ability.
Study the nouns, verbs and adjectives you need.

Quickly and easily lookup a word or phrase in the search section and save it to your favorites for later study.
Track your progress and gain achievements.
Options to change user language, hide / show romanisation.

Words are translated into over 30 languages including English, Spanish, French, German and Chinese (simplified and traditional characters).
Carefully translated by bilingual native speakers and not by computers / online translators.

Learn offline without internet connection.
This app is for all ages. All content in this app is safe for kids and adults.
Lots of free content. Buy the subscription to access all the content.

More advanced curriculum will be added soon.
We are committed to regularly updating this app.
Please send us suggestions about what we can add or improve.
Bugs, feedback or support => luvlingua@gmail.com

Learn Japanese for travel in Japan, work, school, or to talk to friends.

Love Learning Languages
LuvLingua

title: Talkpal - AI Language Learning
description:
🌍 Talkpal AI is a GPT-powered language learning app helping millions of learners speak, listen, read & write more confidently in a new language.
Practice realistic conversations with advanced AI voice & chat, and learn 80+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Korean & more.

🏆 Why choose the Talkpal language learning app?
• GPT-based conversational AI for interactive, adaptive learning
• Learn faster through real speaking practice - not memorization
• 80+ supported languages with dynamic difficulty
• Free to download, some features available at no cost
• Trusted by millions of language learners worldwide

Join 5,000,000+ language learners using Talkpal to speak confidently in 80+ languages, including:
🇬🇧🇺🇸 English
🇪🇸🇲🇽 Spanish
🇩🇪 German
🇫🇷 French
🇮🇹 Italian
🇯🇵 Japanese
🇨🇳 Chinese
🇰🇷 Korean
🇸🇦 Arabic
🇳🇱 Dutch
🇧🇷🇵🇹 Portuguese
🇸🇪 Swedish
🇮🇱 Hebrew
🇬🇷 Greek
🇹🇷 Turkish
🇫🇮 Finnish
… and Afrikaans, Albanian, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Burmese, Cantonese, Catalan, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Estonian, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Lao, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian, Odia, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Swahili, Tagalog, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Zulu and more.

Start speaking from day one with bite-sized lessons. Practice with immersive AI language learning modes designed to build real fluency & improve your speaking skills:
💬 Chat Mode: Speak with a GPT-powered personalized AI language tutor
🗣️ Word Mode: Learn core vocabulary & perfect pronunciation
📝 Sentence Mode: Strengthen grammar and sentence structure
👩‍🏫 Dialogue Mode: Practice daily phrases with pre-scripted conversations
📱 Call Mode: Audio-only speaking practice for fluency & confidence
🎭 Roleplays: Real-life speaking scenarios (travel, work, dating, & more)
🧛 Characters: Engage in dynamic conversations with famous characters
⚖️ Debates: Discuss topics to develop logic & spontaneous speech
📸 Photo Mode: Describe images & receive real-time AI feedback

🧠 Language learning skills you’ll improve:
• Speaking: Clear pronunciation & real conversational flow
• Listening: Understand natural conversations & diverse accents
• Writing: Clear, accurate phrasing & grammar
• Reading: Comprehension & understanding of everyday vocabulary

🎯 Focus on your language goals:
• Travel: Learn useful phrases and local expressions
• Career: Practice interviews, meetings & presentations
• Study: Enhance grammar, vocabulary & listening skills
• Daily life: Order food, make plans & communicate naturally

🔍 Feedback & progress tracking:
• Personalized AI pronunciation & grammar corrections
• Track progress with streaks, achievements & personalized lesson stats
• Short, efficient & engaging practice sessions
• Improve speaking, listening, writing & reading skills

🎯 Improve speaking & fluency with interactive language learning modes: Chat Mode, Word Mode, Sentence Mode, Dialogue Mode, Call Mode, Roleplays, Characters, Debates, Photo Mode, and personalized AI-generated Courses tailored to your level & learning goals.

👑 Join millions of learners & become a language learning champion. Download now & speak for real. Build your fluency with Talkpal - anywhere, anytime. 

💌 Share your feedback & suggestions at support@talkpal.ai & let's make your language learning experience even more exceptional!

Terms & Conditions: https://talkpal.ai/terms-and-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://talkpal.ai/privacy-policy/

title: Drops: Language Learning Games
description:
Drops is a fun, visual language learning app where bite-size lessons feel like play. Build vocabulary fast with language learning games, word games, and vocabulary games that make every minute count. Perfect for beginners and busy learners who want to learn a new language or improve vocabulary — whether you’re looking to learn Spanish, practice basic spanish, learn English including a1 level english, or explore different languages.

Why choose Drops?
• Game-based learning: quick sessions use matching, swipes, and quiz games.
• Smart review system: practice words at the right time to remember them longer.
• Clear audio by native speakers: ideal if you want to learn pronunciation or speak confidently in English, Spanish, Japanese, or Korean — including korean a1 learners or anyone trying basic japanese speaking.
• Personalised goals: stay motivated and keep your study habit strong.
• Beautiful visuals: icons help you memorise faster, even for complex languages like Japanese, Korean, or Arabic — helpful if you want to learn japanese from scratch or try basic japanese learning apps.

What you’ll learn
• Core vocabulary and phrases for travel, work, and daily life.
• Essential topics: food, numbers, directions, shopping, and more — perfect for learning Spanish for beginners or anyone wondering how to study Korean, as well as beginner swedish, easy swedish, basic swedish, or norwegian for beginners.
• Practice reading and listening with word games that make studying feel fun — even for basic vietnamese, basic greek, or easy mandarin chinese.

Popular language packs
Learn English, Learn Spanish (including Mexican Spanish), Learn Japanese, Learn French, Learn Korean, Learn German, Learn Italian, Learn Chinese, Learn Arabic, and Learn Portuguese. You can also learn Dutch, Turkish, Vietnamese, Polish, Greek, Hebrew, and many more — including a1 level german, german language a1 level, or even esperanto for beginners.

Perfect for quick daily study
Set a daily goal and study for 5–10 minutes. Daily play with language learning games helps you build vocabulary, improve pronunciation, and expand your English or Spanish vocabulary naturally. The more you play, the more you learn.

Key features at a glance
• Language learning games that turn study into play.
• Word and quiz games to learn new words fast.
• Audio pronunciation practice in English, Spanish, French, and more.
• Offline practice available for subscribed users.
• A built-in vocabulary builder that helps you remember words through repetition and visuals.

Who is Drops for?
• Beginners starting a new language — from learn Spanish for free to learn Arabic for beginners, or starting with basic japanese or basic greek.
• Learners refreshing vocabulary — try English grammar practice or irregular verbs through play.
• Travellers who want key phrases before a trip — perfect for learning Japanese, learning Korean, or learning Spanish vocabulary.
• Students and professionals using a study app to boost skills for work or personal growth.

Why it works
• Focus on vocabulary: learn the most useful words for real conversations.
• Micro-learning: short sessions that fit your day.
• Visual learning: icons make memorising easier — ideal for Japanese, French, or English practice.

Get started today
Download Drops now and start learning languages through games. Build confidence as you learn Spanish, learn English, learn Japanese, learn Korean, learn French, learn German, learn Italian, learn Chinese, learn Arabic, and practice Portuguese — then explore even more at your own pace. Drops makes language learning simple, effective, and fun.

Privacy Policy & Terms: http://languagedrops.com/privacypolicy.html
