title: HelloWords Learn Languages Fun
description:
Learn a new language with the most fun educational app in the world!
HelloWords, 120% visual learning! Only 3 minutes a day!

How can I get rid of boring lessons and become more interested when learning a new language? HelloWords has a game-changing approach to language learning! We take the bore out of vocabulary learning! The barriers that keep you from starting to learn languages are finally outdated.

With over 29 free languages to choose from, HelloWords’ quick and interactive word games make learning a new language fun.

Here are the key features that make HelloWords right for you:

【29 languages available】
We offer the following languages that you want to learn for FREE!
Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Cantonese, American English, British English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, European Spanish, Latin American Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, European Portuguese, Arabic, Vietnamese, Turkish, Thai, Norwegian, Polish, Dutch, Swedish, Hindi, Indonesian, Hungarian, Danish, Icelandic, Hebrew

With HelloWords, you'll be able to master language learning with more ease and have real-life conversations with more confidence. Whether you need a Spanish learning app, Japanese learning app, or whether you want to learn Korean or learn French in depth, or improve your German, HelloWords is the choice.

【SRS  memorization method】
In order to never forget vocabulary again, HelloWords uses "spaced repetition system (SRS)" based on the Ebbinghaus forgetting curve. This shows that calculated intervals of repetition allow you to memorize words more effectively.

HelloWords wants to turn you into a language learning addict.

【Game-based vocabulary learning】
Why do people get hooked on playing games? Not only because they're fun but also because you can get feedback on everything you do, and they help you set goals. Now we have integrated these aspects into HelloWords. You'll feel entertained while learning as well!

This is simply the most efficient Japanese, Korean, and Spanish learning app out there.

Notice: With the correct game-based vocabulary learning approach, you accumulate considerable knowledge of a new language instead of wasting time!

【Advanced learning statistics】
After each session you’ll see your daily progress with a detailed report of all the words that you studied, including the words that you've already mastered by clicking "Senior filter".

 As the amount of vocabulary you grasp increases, your language level will improve automatically. Visible signs of progress make you more confident.

HelloWords makes language learning effortless fun. 

【Strategically selected vocabulary】
The foreign language team of HelloTalk handpicked 3000+ practical words from 168 topics that cover 90% of everyday word usage. These are words you’ll actually use when you travel to a country where the language is spoken.

【Fragmented learning: only 3 minutes a day】
HelloWords limits your learning time to 3 minutes. This might sound crazy, but it works like a charm. The time limit encourages intense focus which further enhances the effectiveness of memorization.

Whether you're learning languages for travel abroad, school, career development, family and friends, or just simply enjoy learning languages, you'll love studying with HelloWords.

Learn words in just 3 minutes and easily fit language learning into your busy schedule.

No excuses: you can ALWAYS find 3 minutes!

Have any questions? Feel free to contact us at: hellowords@hellotalk.com
* Privacy Policy: https://www.hellowords.com/privacy-policy
* Terms of Service: https://www.hellowords.com/terms-of-service

title: French Listening & Speaking
description:
Are you looking to learn French? Look no further than French Listening & Speaking! Our app offers immersive video-based learning that caters to beginners as well as advanced learners, enabling everyone to improve their speaking and listening skills through real-life, authentic scenarios.

With French Listening & Speaking, users have access to a wide variety of video lessons that help them practice their conversation skills with genuine French videos. Our dialogue-based approach immerses users in practical scenarios, allowing them to gain first-hand experience with the language.

Our step-by-step learning process has been designed to provide users with a better understanding of the French language. You can touch any word to learn its meaning, and expand your vocabulary in no time.

The app also features native French speakers for conversational practice, enabling users to improve their speaking skills and communicate fluently in French. With a structured curriculum and user-friendly design, French Listening & Speaking is the perfect choice for anyone looking to master the language.

We at French Listening & Speaking are always happy to receive feedback, and are committed to providing a seamless and rewarding learning experience. So why wait? Start your journey to becoming a confident and fluent French speaker today!

Privacy Policy: https://api.ivoca.io/public_static/privacy.html
Terms of Use: https://api.ivoca.io/public_static/terms.html

title: Learn AI: Courses・Skills・Tools
description:
Start learning AI with Sololearn — a fun and interactive way to build your skills anywhere. 
Your personal AI app to study AI, master GenAI tools, and explore real-world use cases through interactive lessons, a hands-on playground, and instant feedback.

Learn AI by Sololearn is the ultimate AI app for anyone curious about how to actually use AI tools—in work, study, or creative projects. Whether you're just starting to study AI or want to deepen your GenAI skills, this app gives you everything you need.

WHAT YOU GET WITH LEARN AI
• Practical AI Use Cases
Understand how to use generative AI for writing, design, data analysis, coding, marketing, and more—with real-world examples.
• AI Tools Playground
Practice with the most popular GenAI tools, including GPT‑4 and DALL·E, in an interactive playground that helps you learn by doing.
• Study AI with Instant Feedback
Build prompts and get immediate feedback to refine your skills. Your learning is guided and hands-on, just like a real AI assistant would do.
• Learn AI Step-by-Step
Bite-sized, beginner-friendly micro-lessons help you study AI efficiently and build confidence fast—no prior experience needed.
• Your Personal AI Coach
Think of this as your own AI app: smart, responsive, and tailored to help you grow. You’ll use real AI tools and get feedback, all in one place.
• Built for Everyone
Designed for marketers, content creators, students, entrepreneurs, and anyone who wants to explore what AI tools can actually do.

WHY USERS LOVE LEARN AI
• Real-world AI app that works with live tools
• Interactive lessons to study AI at your pace
• Safe, hands-on space to test GenAI models
• Feedback that makes you better with every prompt
• Designed for beginners—no jargon, just results

WHO IS THIS FOR?
• Curious minds who want to study AI and use it in daily life
• Professionals looking for smarter AI tools and workflows
• Creators ready to automate and enhance their work with GenAI
• Students who want to learn the real-world impact of AI apps

Make Learn AI your personal, go-to AI app. Whether you’re here to study AI, build prompts, explore GenAI tools, or understand how AI apps change the way we work—this app gives you the tools and guidance to do it all.

Terms of Use: https://www.sololearn.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.sololearn.com/privacy

title: Alison: Online Education App
description:
Learn Anything, Anywhere, Anytime For Free.

Earn globally recognised, CPD-accredited diplomas and certificates from over 6,000 courses. Join Alison’s community of 50 million+ learners from over 195 countries on the world’s largest free online learning and empowerment platform.

Are you looking to upskill? 

Or looking for a career change?

Perhaps, you want to launch a side hustle?

Whether you’re a student, a recent graduate, an employee, an entrepreneur, or simply a lifelong learner – Alison gives you access to the tools you need to empower yourself and get closer to your dream future.

Learn across 9 categories: IT, Health, Language, Business, Management, Personal Development, Sales & Marketing, Engineering & Construction, and Teaching & Academics

WITH ALISON, YOU CAN
Tailor your learning based on your needs and interests
Build job-ready skills for in-demand roles
Grow industry-relevant knowledge and upskill
Showcase accredited Certificates and Diplomas on your resumé 

WITH THE ALISON APP, YOU GET
Free access to 6,000+ mobile-friendly CPD-accredited courses
Course content suitable for use in areas with low internet connectivity
Personalized course recommendations 
Flexible self-paced learning at your own convenience
To schedule study reminders and track your progress
Synced coursework progress across all your devices


POPULAR CERTIFICATE COURSES
Media Studies - Gaming, the Internet and Social Media
Teaching English as a Foreign Language (TEFL)
Fundamentals of Health and Social Care
JavaScript Application Programming
Learning Lean Six Sigma: White Belt
Basics of Motivational Interviewing
Anger Management and Conflict Resolution

POPULAR DIPLOMA COURSES
Diploma in Caregiving
Diploma in Business Administration
Diploma in Customer Service
Diploma in Mental Health
Diploma in Environmental Management
Diploma in Workplace Safety & Health
Diploma in Food Safety

Learn with expert-curated study material: Increase your knowledge by getting access to over 6,000 free courses with certificates created by subject matter experts. Who knows, you might just end up being more skilled than your boss (if you aren't already).

Pick up right where you left off: Whether you’re at the beach, in the mountains, or lazing in bed under a blanket, your learning never has to stop. Unless of course, you want to stop.

Explore our extensive directory of industry-relevant courses: Is there a new skill out there? We've got a course for it. With our ever-evolving course library, learn data science, animation, marketing, cybersecurity, real estate, interior design, creative writing, and much more. When there is solid proof of alien life on Earth, we'll have a course on how to talk to them too.

Share your achievements: Get your certificates and diplomas posted right to your doorstep. Hang it on your wall or just hang out with it, we won’t judge.

Take your career forward with Alison in just a few clicks - empower yourself today!

Alison is a for-profit social enterprise, dedicated to ensuring anyone can study anything, anywhere, at any time, for free online.

title: CoComelon: Learn ABCs and 123s
description:
Ready to learn & play with fun educational games and nursery rhymes for kids and family-friendly activities?—Download CoComelon: Learn ABC and 123s!

Designed by experts for 2-5 year old toddlers, the CoComelon learning app is filled with educational, interactive, fun, and creative mini-games for early learning that your child will love.

LAUGH & LEARN the alphabet, abc letters, 123 numbers, colors, shapes, sounds, creative thinking, daily routines, phonics, fine motor skills and more, with hours of replayable educational games and songs for babies, toddlers, preschool and kindergarten kids!

PLAY & ENJOY fun family-oriented games with JJ at the beach, in the bath, at Old Macdonald’s Farm, and beyond! Put the wheels on the bus and watch them go ‘round and ‘round!

GROW a love for learning and confidence with thinking creatively from an early age using interactivity, early childhood educational games and music!
 
Why choose CoComelon educational kids games?
• Fun, Educative learning games for ages 2-5 & toddlers
• Designed for little learners by experts
• Check activity progress & preferences
* Use subscription across devices
• Safe, simple and secure with no ads

Play-Based Educational Curriculum for Preschool Kids
We’ve combined super fun games with learning! Activities and our kids' games are based on an expert-designed early childhood educational curriculum with child-led activities, including alphabet games, letter trace, puzzles, sorting, songs, nursery rhymes and interactive music videos. These help babies and toddlers prior to preschool and kindergarten-aged to develop fine motor skills, exercise thinking skills, grow their vocabulary, and encourage curiosity in a way that's easy for kids to navigate, understand, and remember.

Perfect for Home or On-the-Go Family Learning
Use the free version or subscribe to unlock all games and activities—online or offline. Subscribers can access the app across devices, making CoComelon a helpful tool for families looking for educational games to play together, or let kids explore on their own.

Safe, Supportive Screen Time
Your child's safety is our top priority. The app is a secure, ad-free environment. Our privacy policy can be viewed at www.moonbug-gaming.com/en/privacy-policy. The app’s dedicated Parental Area lets you keep an eye on your child's progress to determine a healthy balance between screen time and real-world activities.

New Kids Games & Educational Content Added Regularly
Start with a free selection of activities based around your kid's favourite nursery rhymes. Subscribing unlocks all games themed around our bed time classic Bath Song, summer favorite Beach Song, animal-filled Old MacDonald’s Farm Song, festive track Holidays Are Here, and popular CoComelon originals like Yes Yes Vegetables Song and Rocket Ship Song.

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS:
CoComelon: Learn ABC and 123s is a subscription-based preschool learning app. While free activities are available, subscribing grants unlimited access to all educational content and regular updates.
• Payment is charged through your Play Store account.
• Subscription works across all devices linked to your Google Account.
• Manage or cancel anytime via your Play Store settings.
• Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

ABOUT COCOMELON:
CoComelon features JJ, his family, and friends centered on the everyday experiences and positive adventures of young children through relatable characters, timeless stories, and engaging songs. We equip children to confidently embrace life’s everyday experiences using entertaining and educational content focused on social skills, healthy habits, and early life lessons.

Find CoComelon on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube and our website: cocomelon.com

CONTACT US:
Have a question or need support? Reach out to us at app.support@moonbug.com

title: Learn French – Studycat
description:
From the award-winning creators of Studycat for Schools, comes Learn French! The #1 way for kids to learn français!

From preschool and beyond, Learn French by Studycat inspires children's innate love of learning with interactive games and activities.

Our bite-sized lessons will keep your child motivated while they discover a new language and build bilingual skills for a lifetime!

WHY STUDYCAT?

• Learn French, in French. All our activities focus on virtual language immersion, which means your child won't be hearing any English, only French! This might be confusing at first, but trust us, it's the best way to learn.

• Everyday Language. Our lessons teach words and expressions that kids can apply in their everyday lives, so they can get a head start developing their bilingual abilities.

• Get Talking Fast. With our interactive speaking challenges, kids will be encouraged to speak entire words and phrases on their own! The earlier kids start their language-learning journey, the more likely they are to reach proficiency quickly.

• Vocal Variety. Our characters' voices use different tones, expressions, and accents so that kids can pick up on the subtleties of pronunciation from different speakers.

• Designed by Experts. All our activities are designed by language and early-education experts. Thoughtfully developed lessons will build your child's confidence with every step.

• Learner Profiles (coming soon). Create up to four personalized profiles for different family members, allowing tailored learning paths and individual progress tracking.

• Safe for Kids & Ad-Free. Parents can rest easy knowing that there are no pesky ads to distract children from their learning. All content is appropriate for ages 3 and up.

• Offline Learning. On a plane, at a restaurant, or in a park? No problem! Learn French by Studycat is available for both online and offline use.

WHAT ARE PARENTS SAYING?

“As a parent trying to raise bilingual children at home, Studycat is a helpful app to start them off and create excitement about the language.” — Fluent in 3 Months

“Everything has been thought out carefully and the games and activities are really engaging.” — Bilingual Kidspot

“The concept is so simple but extremely effective. I even found myself learning at the same time.” — Bump, Baby & You

--

If you like Learn French by Studycat, try it out for 7 days free! Empower your child to learn like never before, and get extras like printable worksheets.

If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://studycat.com/about/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://studycat.com/about/terms-of-use/

title: IELTS Practice Band 9
description:
IELTS Practice Band 9 is your ultimate study companion to prepare for the IELTS exam. 
Whether you’re aiming for IELTS Academic or General Training, this app provides all the tools and resources you need to succeed, from practice tests to expert strategies. You'll be ready to ace your IELTS exam.

Key Features:

- Vocabulary/Practice: 6,000 Oxford vocabulary words and over 380 practice tests with 4,000 questions.
- Daily Content Updates: Stay up-to-date with daily fresh content to keep your preparation on track.
- Model Answers: Detailed, expert model answers for IELTS Writing Task 1, Task 2.
- Speaking Practice: Over 1,000 Speaking Cue Cards, mock tests, and sample essays to help improve your Speaking skills.
- Listening & Reading Samples: Improve listening and reading comprehension with curated, real exam samples.
- IELTS Video Channel: Access helpful IELTS video tips and strategies for success.
- Interactive Skill-Building Exercises: Practice and hone every IELTS skill with interactive exercises.
- Language Tools: Multi-language translation tool, online dictionary support, and Text-to-Speech functionality for better understanding.
- Tap-to-View Word Information: Tap any word to instantly see its meaning, pronunciation, and examples — without leaving the page.
- Educational Resources: Learn essential idioms, phrasal verbs, and irregular verbs with detailed tables for each.
- Offline Access: Enjoy uninterrupted learning with offline access to key content.
- User-Friendly Design: A clean, Material Design UI for easy navigation, along with smart notifications to keep you on track.
- Dark Mode: Switch to dark mode for a more comfortable learning experience.

Prepare confidently for your IELTS exam with "IELTS Practice Band 9." Download now to start practicing smarter, not harder, and get ready for Band 9!
---
Disclaimer: This app is for informational purposes only. It is not affiliated with, endorsed, or approved by the University of Cambridge ESOL, the British Council, or IDP Education Australia, the owners of the IELTS trademark.

title: LangLearn: Language learning
description:
LangLearn is your personalized AI language companion. It adapts to your level, goals, and busy life. Whether you're a beginner, a professional, or a traveler, LangLearn helps you speak English and Spanish fluently with speaking practice, grammar, and real-world immersion in quick, fun lessons.


◆ For Every Level: Tailored Learning Paths ◆

-Beginners: Start with the Basics!

*Learn essential greetings, basic grammar (e.g., "I am/he is"), and survival phrases for travel with AI.

*Build confidence by practicing with AI in real-life situations like ordering food or asking for directions.

-Intermediate Learners: Think Deeper, Speak Smoother!

*Have debates, tell stories, or roleplay workplace meetings with AI.

*Improve grammar by correcting mistakes with tailored feedback (e.g., "If I were..." vs. "If I was...").

-Advanced Speakers: Perfect Your Edge!

*Master idioms, refine writing, or focus on accent reduction.

*Tackle expert scenarios like negotiating, giving TED talks, or analyzing news with AI.


◆ For Every Scenario: Learn Exactly What You Need, Right When You Need It ◆

-Traveler Mode: Master travel Language—practice airport conversations, hotel check-ins, directions, and cultural tips for a smooth trip.

-Career Mode: Improve professional Terms. Practice job interviews, write emails, and give presentations with confidence. Get feedback with prompts like “Pitch your idea to an AI CEO.”

-Exam Mode: Ace language tests like TOEFL and IELTS. Take timed speaking simulations with AI scoring to know exactly where to improve.

-Daily Life Mode: Practice everyday phrase. Chat about hobbies, movies, tech trends, or anything you enjoy—make learning fun and easy!



◆ Learn in 10 Minutes a Day ◆

Short on time? No problem! LangLearn fits into your everyday life, helping you improve your spoken language no matter where you are.

-During Your Commute: Turn traffic or transit time into productive practice with hands-free AI lessons for real-life conversations.

-While Getting Ready: Use your morning or evening routine to listen to short lessons or practice phrases aloud, building fluency with the AI.

-Before Bed: Let AI summarize your day’s learning in minutes, highlighting your strengths, new vocabulary, and areas to improve, so you’re ready for the next day.



◆ Your Personal AI Language Coach: Patient, Intelligent, and Always There for You ◆

-Real-Time Speech Feedback: Speak with confidence! Get instant, precise analysis on your pronunciation, intonation, and fluency—like “Your ‘th’ sounds a bit like ‘d’—let’s practice together!” Receive practical tips that really make a difference.

-Personalized Challenges: Say goodbye to one-size-fits-all. Your AI coach continuously tracks your progress and adapts lesson difficulty—so you’re always challenged, but never overwhelmed or bored.

Encouragement & Emotional Support: Feeling stuck or stressed? Your AI coach notices and offers uplifting words and mindful tips. Learn at your own pace, with kind support every step of the way.


================================


Subscription terms:

Unlock unlimited access to everything in the app and take your spoken language to the next level

App Store offers auto-renewing subscriptions with unlimited access. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each subscription term unless you turn off the auto-renewal in your iPhone Settings, at least 24 hours before the current period ends.


================================


Have questions or feedback about LangLearn? We’re here to help!

Feel free to reach out to us at langlearn08@gmail.com — we’d love to hear from you.

title: Aomi Japanese: Speaking
description:
Aomi Japanese is the very 1st app that trains your Japanese speaking skills and pronunciation by using pitch-accent recognition & visualization technology.

Practicing with Aomi Japanese will:

• Develop your articulation
• Help you to learn proper pronunciation
• Activate your listening comprehension
• Enrich your vocabulary with a variety of useful expressions used by native speakers in everyday life

The unique feature of Aomi is its visualized pronunciation. You are not only comparing yourself with the native speaker just by listening to pronunciation, but also by actually seeing how well you match it.

Why is it important?

The Japanese language is a musical language. Unlike English, it doesn’t have a stress-accent but it has a “musical accent” known as pitch-accent. 

Pitch-accent is a decrease or increase in the tone of voice between syllables in a single word. Our technology analyzes pitch patterns of your voice and compares them to the proper pitch patterns of a native speaker. Then it presents your pronunciation visually in the form of a "wave". The wave indicates the highs and lows of the pitch. 

It helps you to compare your pronunciation not only by audio but also visually by comparing your “wave” with the “wave” of the native speaker.

By following visualized pronunciation you will see the actual patterns of the Japanese speech and learn proper pronunciation much faster than you would do just by listening. 

Everyday, Aomi provides you with a training, which consists of expressions that native speakers use in their daily life + the examples of how those expressions can be used. 

As you continue practicing day after day, you will naturally develop a proper articulation, which will make you sound like a native speaker. And your speech will be enriched with useful vocabulary that can’t be found in an ordinary textbook. 

All the materials from Trainings will be accessible to you in the app's “Glossary”. You can practice pronunciation of any word or phrase as much as you want at any time, anywhere. 

In addition to Training and Glossary you can freely explore and practice slang, loan words, tongue twisters and many other words and phrases that will boost your speaking skills even further.

Practicing with Aomi everyday you will create your personal language environment free of any embarrassment, available to you at any time, anywhere. 

=======================


PLEASE NOTE:

To access all Trainings and features of Aomi Japanese app you will need to have a subscription. You can always try the app for free with a limited access. 

• Payment will be charged to Google Play at confirmation of purchase.
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscription may be managed by the user by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. 


=======================

title: Conjuu - French Conjugation
description:
Learning verb conjugations is fundamental to mastering the French language.

Perfect your spellings of all verb tenses, from the most commonly used to those more advanced. Verbs and tenses are organised into logical groups, as well as regular and irregular forms, allowing you to customise the test to best suit your learning.

A must have for students learning French of all levels from high school to university and anybody preparing for a French proficiency exam.

# Features
- Learn all irregular forms, accents and spellings.
- Contains over 600 most commonly used verbs with full conjugation tables.
- Fully personalisable verbs and tenses.
- Explanation and usage examples on every tense.
- French - English translation.
- Intelligently tests you on the verbs you need to practice the most.
- Word pronunciation to improve memorisation.

# Why use Conjuu to learn French conjugations?
Conjuu breaks the task of learning conjugation into little bite sized tests, allowing you to focus on just the areas you need to improve on. Your answers are checked straight away to improve your certainty and assuredness. When in pressured situations like speaking, you will be able to recall the correct conjugation with confidence.

title: English for Kids Learning game
description: English for Kids is an educational application for learning vocabulary, grammar, writing, and pronunciation. Fun activities and play encourage easy and fast language learning for toddlers, preschoolers and schoolchildren. You can study for free online or without the Internet. Fixies (Fixiki), funny heroes, from the cartoon. Educational app for kids of different ages: ● toddlers (2, 3, 4 years old) – first words and letters ● preschoolers (6, 7 years old) – learning games, listening - easy and fun ● children in elementary school (grades 1-5) – they can already read and write; they know the alphabet, grammar; they want to expand their vocabulary ● bilingual, beginners, online tutors, self-learners. English Lessons for Kids are more interesting than in school: ● 50 teaching games; learn the numbers, colors, etc. ● smart method of memorization ● system of awards and achievements makes the process exciting and fun ● voice of a native speaker used throughout the lessons ● parents get detailed statistics every day ● system of lessons and tasks for quickly learning a foreign language ● Fixies from the cartoon series with colorful graphics and animations ● children's online tutor for beginners wanting to study independently and be bilingual ● words on flashcards to quickly increase vocabulary. Learn a language for free in the app — topics always available — learn the colors and the numbers. Subscribe and pay nothing during the trial period. All educational games are available for free until the trial expires. An integrated approach for beginners, suitable as an online tutor and for self-study: ● listening ● flashcards to assist memorization ● expand your vocabulary ● understand spoken phrases ● spell by the alphabet ● sentence structure, grammar basics ● go through ready-made lessons easily Teaching application with Fixies (Fixiki) includes over 400 words and 50 mini games. To get acquainted with colors and numbers, there are developmental activities for ages 2, 3, 4. If a child is already 6, 7 years old and has started learning a foreign language, there are ready-made lessons for the preschooler. There are also tasks for children in grades 1 - 5 (elementary school). They remember the necessary vocabulary required for school, vocabulary-building, grammar, writing. Application Learn English for Kids. The app has free fun facts and tasks. Watch educational cartoons with the Fixies (Fixiki) on YouTube. title: Teacher Simulator: Exam Time
description:
Ready to step into the classroom and rule your school? 

In this exciting teacher game, YOU are the star of the show! 

Get ready to catch sneaky cheaters, break up fights, handle the pop quiz, and get your students through each tricky test, all while you try to keep your cool under pressure. 

It’s time to see if you’ve got what it takes to be a teacher, or the one evil teacher that everyone dreads!

Take charge of your class, from marking papers to crafting lessons that actually make learning fun. You’ll have to manage behaviour and discipline rowdy students, stop the bullies, and be a mentor who inspires, all while you take control of the chaos of school life. Every decision you make has a ripple effect, will you be the school teacher everyone loves, or the one they try to avoid at all costs?

Game Features:
- Catch cheaters red-handed and send them to the principal (nobody’s getting away with it!).
- Handle pop quizzes and tricky exams, your students will either shine or… not.
- Grade papers with care and precision, and watch your students’ results unfold.
- Break up fights, stop the bullies, and manage your classroom like a pro.
- Build your teaching style - make choices; Will you be the kind educator or the mean teacher who rules with an iron fist?
- Daily rewards keep you motivated as you master the art of teaching (or perhaps, surviving school chaos!).
Navigate school life in all its glory, there’s never a dull moment! Marking papers to disciplining students every day in the classroom is a new adventure. 
Will you achieve the “Best Teacher” award, or the one everyone whispers about in the corridors?
The choice is yours: conquer the classroom or tackle the chaos. Test your brain, sharpen your pencils, and prepare for a wild ride!

SUBSCRIBE TO TEACHER SIMULATOR
 
Subscribe to Teacher Simulator for all of the following benefits:
* New 'Arts & Crafts’’ Mini Game
* VIP Outfit
* No Ads
* x2 Earnings
 
SUBSCRIPTIONS INFORMATION:
 
Teacher Simulator VIP Membership access offers two membership options:

1) A weekly subscription costing $5.49 per week after a 3 day FREE trial period.

2) A monthly subscription costing $14.49 per month.

After buying this subscription, you will unlock an exclusive ‘Arts & Crafts’ Mini Game to play, a VIP outfit to wear, remove non-optional ads, and x2 earning from your clients. This is an auto-renewable subscription. The payment is charged to your account after confirmation. The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the period ends. Your account will also be charged for renewal
The prices notes are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may change and actual charges may be converted to local currency.
End of trial and subscription renewal:
- The payment is charged to your iTunes account after a confirmation of purchase
- The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the end of the current period
- The account will be charged for renewal 24 hours before the end of the current period at the standard cost of the weekly subscription
- The user may manage the subscription and auto-renewal by accessing the user's account settings after purchase in the store
- No cancellation of the current subscription is permitted during the active subscription period
- Any unused portion of the free trial period will be forfeited when the subscription is purchased
Cancelling a trial or subscription:
- In order to cancel a subscription during the free trial period you need to cancel it through your account in the Store. This must be done at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period to avoid being charged.

title: Learn to Read - Duolingo ABC
description:
From the creators behind Duolingo, the world’s #1 education app, comes Duolingo ABC! Duolingo ABC is the fun, hands-on way for your child to learn to read and write in English! From preschool to first grade, engage your child with delightful stories for kids and bite-sized lessons teaching the alphabet, phonics, sight words, vocabulary, and more.

The Duolingo ABC kids reading app offers over 700 hands-on reading lessons designed to help kids learn and love to read. We make learning to read both fun and effective with lessons and educational games for kids that include multi-sensory activities, such as tracing, drag-and-drop prompts and more. Our educational learning app offers personalized lessons so your child can learn at their own pace.

Develop reading comprehension skills with educational lessons specially designed to support your child’s lifelong love of learning! Whether your child is in pre-K, preschool, kindergarten, or 1st grade, Duolingo ABC has delightful stories for kids filled with engaging pictures meant to inspire and support your child along their educational journey. 

Help your child learn to read new sight words with our toddler books and kids stories that let you highlight each word spoken. This helps build your child’s multi-sensory learning skills and can help them learn to read independently.

Duolingo ABC makes your child’s education a fun and engaging experience. Our learning app combines educational lessons with fun reading games perfect for kids and toddlers alike! Our rewards work in tandem with bite-sized reading lessons and fun school games for kids, keeping them motivated to learn while building their confidence.

Discover ad free kids educational games filled with exploration and curiosity on Duolingo ABC. Now your kids can have fun while they sound out words, practice reading and writing in English, and build reading comprehension and literacy skills for a lifetime!

DUOLINGO ABC FEATURES:

Kids Learn to Read
- Reading games: Our kids reading app provides hands on learning they will love
- New lessons are added often, so your child never runs out of educational content
- Reading and phonics for kids: Bite-sized lessons help kids learn phonics, sight words & vocabulary
- Every reading lesson is built to feel like a game, so kids can learn to read while having fun

Learning Activities For Kids
- Enjoy fun educational games like letter tracing and gamified stories, suitable for even the youngest learners
- Toddler, kindergarten or first grade, all kids can enjoy the Duolingo ABC learning app while having fun
- From toddler books to 1st grade learning games, Duolingo ABC has lessons for every child
- Designed by literacy & early-education experts to develop kids’ skills in phonics, sight words, reading & more

Kid-Safe & Ad-Free
- Our educational learning app prioritizes a kid-friendly experience
- Rest easy, parents. There are no ads or in-app purchases to worry about
- Content is focused on preschool, kindergarten and first grade level lessons, so you can be safe knowing it is always age-appropriate

Offline Learning
- Your child’s educational journey has no limits with Duolingo ABC’s offline learning capabilities
- On a plane? At a restaurant? Duolingo ABC can be used anytime, anywhere
- Enjoy playing and learning offline - so kids can learn wherever you go

Duolingo ABC is an educational learning app that offers immersive lessons to teach preschool to first grade kids to learn and love to read. Download today and spark your child’s love for learning.

--

title: Speechling - Learn to Speak An
description:
Get free pronunciation coaching with dictation, flashcards, cloze tests, quizzes, and listening comprehension for Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, German, Russian, Korean, Portuguese and English.

Want to sound native fast? Speechling skips the vocab lists and grammar rules.

Get immersed with Speechling: pronunciation coaches, daily feedback, advanced algorithms, and mindblowing endless content.

We have a web and iOS version as well.

----------

Speechling is a 501(c)3 educational nonprofit based in California, USA.

We are committed to providing the highest quality free language education to anyone in the world.

----------

How it works:

1. Listen to a native speaker, of either gender, say a sentence.
2. Record yourself on the microphone.
3. Get feedback within a day.
4. (Soon) Have others think you're native.

----------

The Speechling Method

With a foundation in our mission, the Speechling Method uses a combination of technology and human coaching to help our students learn new languages.

We place an emphasis on speaking, because of the lack of free and affordable tools for helping people speak. By breaking down spoken language barriers, we hope to increase access to education, employment opportunities, and a better quality of life.

----------

Immersion

As a technology platform, we’re available as an educational tool 24/7. Speechling uses spaced repetition and sophisticated algorithms to let our users practice from thousands of sentences with real human voices from both genders.

Unlike other for-profit companies, our platform is entirely free - for eternity. We aim to be build the best platform to learn a language with spaced repetition and adaptive learning algorithms.

----------

Personal Feedback

As a personal tutoring service, our certified pronunciation coaches give feedback on your speaking within 24 hours. Advanced students can answer a question or describe an image, and we will give feedback similar to what a private tutor will provide.

Unlike other for-profit companies, our coaching is also free - but because it has significant overhead costs, we charge just enough to cover our costs and for those who demonstrate that they cannot afford that price, we provide full scholarships.

Do you live or work in France? Our application is made for you. Discover the essential French verbs, adapted to your personal and professional needs. Simple and efficient interface.

- Vocabulary specific to your sector of activity. Access in particular a complete list of verbs for the industrial sector.

- Audio pronunciation. Listen to each verb and its conjugations.

- Examples. See the verbs in action with examples in a real context.

- Flash Cards. Reinforce your learning with smart Flash Cards – a fast, fun, and effective way to memorize verbs.

- Grammar. Explore verb groups, tenses and moods, grammatical constructions, and verb forms through detailed articles to better understand the French language.

- Easily mark verbs. The verbs will be accessible at your fingertips whenever you need them.

Whether you are an experienced professional or just starting out, the application will allow you to progress and succeed in French in your sector of activity. Download the application, improve your mastery of French and create opportunities for your career in France.

title: Mimo: Learn Coding/Programming
description:
Learn coding in Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, or SQL, and master modern AI-assisted development to become a developer in the age of AI. Mimo is a coding app that takes you from zero programming skills to building AI-powered projects. Gain the knowledge and tools to create production-ready software and pursue a job as a developer. Start building strong portfolio projects that help you stand out, future-proof your skills, and take the next step beyond just programming syntax. Download Mimo and launch your developer career now!

Who It's For

The Mimo programming app stands out by guiding aspiring developers through a proven, structured learning process. Unlike other programming apps that focus on passive tutorials, Mimo delivers hands-on, career-relevant coding skills. You progress from your first line of code in HTML, Python, or any other programming language, to mastering AI-assisted software development, building a portfolio of real-world apps that showcase your abilities.

What You Get With Mimo

Mimo is an all-in-one programming app that provides guided learning paths and an AI-powered environment to help you learn programming and build a portfolio.

- Learn coding fundamentals of Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, and more.
- Go from beginner to developer with structured paths in AI-driven Front-End, Full-Stack, Python, and Backend development.
- Build apps, websites, and tools for a professional portfolio that stands out.
- Practice AI-powered software development by building with AI to understand, edit, and improve your code—all reflecting how modern software is built.
- Code anywhere with our mobile IDE. Write, run, and edit Python, JavaScript, and HTML directly in the app.
- Master collaboration, tooling, and workflows used by modern developers.
- Track progress, earn certificates, and stay motivated with streaks and leaderboards.

How It Works

1. Learn to Code Step by Step
Start with beginner-friendly interactive lessons in Python, JavaScript, or HTML to learn programming and build a solid foundation.

2. Build with AI Like Modern Developers
Use AI to enhance your workflow, understand code, debug, and refine your work. You control your code—AI works with you, not for you. See, edit, and take charge of what you create.

3. Create Lasting Projects
Turn your skills into apps, websites, automations, games, and other portfolio-worthy projects.

What Makes Mimo Different 

- Mimo combines hands-on coding with AI-powered development tools.
From your first project, you gain practical skills for today’s tech industry, supported by project experience and AI-driven learning that sets you apart in the job market.

- Learn coding by building software from the very beginning.
You’ll practice Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, TypeScript, and React. Build real software from day one—no waiting through months of tutorials.

- Learn AI-driven software development, not just programming syntax.
Mimo helps you build coding skills faster by using AI to explore solutions, understand code, and move forward with confidence.

- Gain lasting skills and build a portfolio that stays relevant as the industry evolves.
Aiming for a software development career? Mimo offers the skills, practice, and projects to get started.

Reviews and Recognitions:

🏆 Google Play's Editor's Choice
🏅Best Self-Improvement Apps

- "This way, you can work learning to code into your daily routine whenever you have a few minutes." – TechCrunch.
- "The app's lessons are bite-sized to make it easy to squeeze coding into your busy day." – The New York Times.

Learn to code in popular programming languages like Python, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, SQL, and master AI-assisted, modern software development. Build apps, understand code, gain confidence, and become a future-ready developer with Mimo.

Don’t just learn yesterday’s coding syntax or chase today’s vibe coding hype. Get the skills that make you a software developer of tomorrow. 

Start learning with Mimo now!

title: Learn Japanese: N5-N2 News
description:
Daily Japanese Language News & Stories. Teacher-Crafted. Student-Ready.

Master Japanese with Readle, the top-rated language-learning app. 🇯🇵🇯🇵🇯🇵 Immerse yourself in real-world news and stories, boosting your skills from beginner N5 to advanced N2 JLPT levels. Read and listen to Japanese content anytime, anywhere, and expand your vocabulary in just 10 minutes a day. Start learning Japanese the new way with Readle today! Why Choose Readle? • Our team of language experts transforms real-world news and stories into fun & bite-sized Japanese lessons at N5, N4, N3, and N2 levels tailored to your level. • Your best companion for reading, listening, grammar, comprehension, and vocabulary with our extensive collection of story courses and flashcards. • Achieve Japanese fluency with utmost efficiency and effectiveness. Download Readle for FREE and learn Japanese the new way! LEARN JAPANESE THROUGH IMMERSION Study Japanese effectively with our scientifically backed immersion technique. Our language experts curate engaging real-world stories & news, crafting lessons designed explicitly for N5, N4, N3, and N2 JLPT levels. BITE-SIZED JAPANESE STORIES With over 1000 stories & news articles, Readle offers fun and bite-sized learning lessons with audio that will effectively boost your reading, listening, grammar, and vocabulary skills. LEARN JAPANESE WRITING SYSTEMS Read Japanese and learn the three Japanese writing systems with our N5-N2 stories. Read Hiragana, Katakana, and basic Kanji in one place. With practice, you can master Japanese writing systems and read Katakana, Hiragana, and Kanji with ease. PERFECT PRONUNCIATION Discover how Japanese words sound, listen to the story sentence by sentence, and improve your pronunciation by repeating after native Japanese speakers. Our interactive study tools enhance your listening and pronunciation skills. And with our Romaji helper, you'll perfect your pronunciation with a native-sounding accent. INSTANT DICTIONARY & TRANSLATION Tap to access Japanese word translations in stories - the most convenient way to enrich vocabulary, grasp phrases, understand verbs, and master conjugation. Our new sentence translation feature improves comprehensive skills quickly, saving time by eliminating the need to switch between dictionaries or translation tools. JAPANESE GRAMMAR HELPER Learn Japanese grammar through the immersive language learning experience. Discover practical examples embedded in each story context that truly bring the language to life. Enhance your understanding of Japanese grammar with real examples. COMPREHENSION QUIZZES Challenge your reading skills and reinforce your Japanese grammar and vocabulary with our comprehensive quizzes in each story – a great way to challenge your Japanese language skills and prepare yourself for JLPT tests. VOCABULARY WORD LISTS & FLASHCARDS Master Japanese vocabulary and verb conjugation effortlessly with our vocabulary list and flashcards with the spaced repetition learning method. Expand your vocabulary effectively with our carefully crafted study materials. STORY LIBRARY & DAILY NEW STORY Discover an extensive library of over 1,000 news and story lessons covering a wide variety of captivating topics. Immerse yourself in the world of Japanese language learning, expanding your vocabulary and effortlessly acquiring new words. - Travel - Culture - Food - Latest News - Entertainment - Science and Medical - Technology Plus, much more content – updated daily! Readle is the must-have foreign language learning app for self-studying, vocabulary building, living, or visiting Japan. Accelerate your Japanese language learning journey and reach Japanese fluency with Readle. Do you have questions or feedback about learning Japanese with Readle? Contact us at support@readle-app.com. We are here to help! Privacy policy: https://readle-app.com/privacy-policy/ Terms of use: https://readle-app.com/term-of-use/

title: Learn English - 11,000 Words
description: Learn English from 61 native languages, for free & offline, with FunEasyLearn. Learn to READ 📖 WRITE ✍ and SPEAK English 💬 Discover the fun & easy way to learn all the reading rules, all the words you’ll ever need and all the useful phrases in the English language. 🚀 Contents • 6,000 English words (constantly growing): the most common nouns, verbs, adjectives, etc., categorized into 7 levels and 200 topics; • 5,000 English phrases (frequently used): the most important phrases for daily conversations and travelling, categorized into 10 levels and 120 topics. Enhance your vocabulary by learning words, sentences and expressions for beginner, intermediate and advanced learners. 🔔 Why learn English with FunEasyLearn? FunEasyLearn reinvents language learning. Our team of linguists and teachers have developed a unique language learning strategy. The secret lies in combining an alphabet with all the reading rules, all the necessary words and a practical phrasebook into one app. This allows our users to read a word or phrase, pronounce it correctly, associate it with an illustration and practice it with listening, writing and speaking games. 🏆 Top features Hand-drawn illustrations – memorize the new vocabulary faster with intuitive illustrations; Professional audio recordings – listen to audios recorded by native speakers; Detailed statistics – analyze your results and track your progress; Review manager – review everything you learn; Smart search – find quickly the words and phrases you need; Hide what you know – hide the content you already know; Speech recognition – improve your pronunciation; Offline – use the app anywhere in the world, with no internet connection. 💼 English for business Get access to special English lessons created for your business. We provide specialized courses for taxi drivers, hotel & restaurant staffs, flight-attendants, shop-assistants, etc. ✈ English for travelling Learn how to book a hotel room, order a meal in a restaurant, ask for directions, carry out a conversation and speak confidently with the native speakers. 🙌 English for adults We adapt the contents depending on the age of the learner. Both you and your kid can learn English and have fun. FunEasyLearn Free Subscription Subscribe for FREE, with the flowers you earn while playing language learning games. Learn English, play for free! It’s fast & easy. 📴 📥 Download the FunEasyLearn English course right now! Recommend the app to your friends and get a reward. Rate us and write a review ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ It would mean a lot to our team! Contact us: https://www.FunEasyLearn.com/

title: EasySpeak AI: Learn English
description:
Ready to Master English Speaking with AI?
EasySpeak AI - Your Personal English Conversation Partner
Transform your English speaking skills with EasySpeak AI, the revolutionary app that connects you with intelligent AI virtual teachers for immersive English conversation practice. Whether you're a beginner or advanced learner, our AI-powered platform helps non-native English speakers achieve fluency through natural, engaging conversations.
Why Choose EasySpeak AI for English Learning?
Speak English Confidently with AI Virtual Teachers Practice English speaking with our advanced AI virtual instructors who adapt to your learning pace and style. Engage in realistic conversations that simulate real-world scenarios, from casual chats to business meetings. Our AI teachers provide instant feedback, helping you improve pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary naturally.
Personalized English Conversation Practice Every conversation is tailored to your proficiency level and learning goals. Our AI analyzes your speaking patterns and creates customized lessons that target your specific needs. Practice English speaking in a judgment-free environment where you can make mistakes and learn from them.
Real-Time Pronunciation & Grammar Feedback Receive instant corrections and suggestions as you speak. Our AI technology identifies pronunciation errors, grammar mistakes, and vocabulary gaps, providing immediate guidance to help you speak English more accurately and confidently.
Comprehensive English Skills Development
·Speaking Practice: Engage in dynamic conversations with AI teachers
·Pronunciation Training: Perfect your accent with real-time feedback
·Grammar Improvement: Learn through contextual conversations
·Vocabulary Building: Expand your word bank with practical phrases
·Listening Skills: Enhance comprehension through AI interactions
Key Features of EasySpeak AI:
✅ AI Virtual English Teachers - Interactive conversations with intelligent tutors 
✅ Real-Time Speaking Feedback - Instant pronunciation and grammar corrections 
✅ Personalized Learning Path - Customized lessons based on your progress 
✅ Conversation Topics - Business, travel, daily life, and academic scenarios 
✅ Progress Tracking - Monitor your improvement with detailed analytics 
✅ Flexible Learning Schedule - Practice anytime, anywhere at your own pace 
✅ Confidence Building - Safe space to practice without judgment 
✅ Multi-Level Support - From beginner to advanced English learners
Perfect for:
·Professionals preparing for international business meetings
·Students improving academic English communication
·Travelers wanting to speak confidently abroad
·Job Seekers enhancing interview skills
·Anyone looking to speak English more fluently
Start Your English Speaking Journey Today!
Download now and experience the future of language learning through AI-powered conversations.
Download EasySpeak AI and start speaking English confidently in just days!

title: WordUp | AI Vocabulary Builder
description:
The world’s first AI-based English vocabulary builder app. If you are serious about your English, you will fall in love with WordUp. It is the smartest way to perfect your English, and learn every word that matters while enjoying the process!


Vocabulary Builder: 
Vocab builder feature in WordUp utilizes advanced algorithms to expand vocabulary and improve English skills. It recommends a new word each day based on your current knowledge, allowing you to gradually enhance your language proficiency. By incorporating daily words into your learning routine, WordUp ensures steady and consistent growth in your vocabulary.

Knowledge Map
WordUp helps you build a map of your knowledge by identifying the words you know and the words you don't know. It helps you learn new words by identifying the gaps in your vocabulary and suggesting the most important and useful English words to focus on. By incorporating daily vocabulary and tracking your progress, the Knowledge Map enables you to steadily increase your vocabulary and enhance your understanding of English words.
All 25,000 useful English words are ranked in the order of IMPORTANCE, and USEFULNESS, based on how often they are used in real-world spoken English (extracted from thousands of movies, and TV shows).

To actually learn the words that you discover in your Knowledge Map, WordUp gives you everything you need, and more! From word definitions and pictures to tens of entertaining examples from movies, quotes, news, and more. So you get a good feel of how to use each word in context. 

Multilingual Translations
There are also translations in more than 30 languages including French, Spanish, German, Arabic, Turkish, Persian, ...

The daily reviews then kick in. Like flashcards, the words will come back with games and challenges until you master them. It's called Spaced Repetition, and it's scientifically proven to help memorise them forever!

WordUp is unlike any vocabulary builder app you've seen before. It is not another dictionary app, although it can be used as an English dictionary too.

Suitable for Various Users:
WordUp's novel approach to language learning and expanding your vocabulary will leave you feeling confident and empowered. Whether you are new to English, are preparing for an English exam (IELTS, TOEFL, etc), or are a native English speaker, you will find WordUp helpful and entertaining. Just give it a try and see for yourself!

title: Univerbal: AI Language Tutor
description:
🗣️ Univerbal is an AI language tutor focused on speaking. Practice conversations that feel real, get instant feedback, and build confidence.

Try English speaking practice or learn conversational Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, or Turkish. This Speaking AI adapts to your level, helps with pronunciation and grammar, and acts like a language partner so you can progress faster.

Trusted & Proven

Trusted by thousands. Created in collaboration with the Uni of Zurich and backed by ETH Zurich and Y Combinator. 🇨🇭 Made in Switzerland by a small team of 8. Learn with the Univerbal AI Language Tutor in English, Spanish, German, French, Greek, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Chinese, and more. 🌍

Why choose Univerbal?

• 🤖 AI Tutor & Speech Practice: Have natural conversations that prepare you for real situations. • 🎯 Personalized Progress: Your goals, your level, your pace. The tutor adapts as you learn. • ⚡ Instant Feedback: Get helpful corrections while you speak so progress is faster and sticks. Plus, pronunciation practice and feedback to speak clearly.

Results you can feel

• 🌍 Connect anywhere: Feel comfortable in social and professional settings. • 📈 Break through plateaus: Conversations that unlock progress when you feel stuck. • 🏆 Prepare for success: Practice for TOEFL, DELE, DELF, interviews, and more with tailored exercises.

💬 What learners say

“It surprised me how natural the conversation felt. You’re not just memorizing words, Univerbal pushes you to speak and actually use the language, just like real life.” - Lukas “It’s probably the most engaging way I’ve learned a language. The depth of knowledge and automatic feedback from the AI is amazing.” - Erick “Univerbal is the only app where I actually feel my speaking confidence growing. No more fear of mistakes, just real practice whenever I want.” - Leah

Designed for your life

• 🩺 Practice for life: Practice conversations for a doctor visit, a job interview, or learn travel phrases you’ll actually use. • 🧩 Custom experiences: Bring your own scenarios and get practice that fits your world. • 🕒 Private & flexible: Practice anytime and anywhere with tools that fit your routine.

🚀 Get started in seconds

1. Pick a real-world scenario or add your own. 2. Speak or type, and your language partner adapts instantly. 3. Get corrections, tips, and confidence as you go. 🌐 Languages English, Spanish, German, French, Greek, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Chinese, and more coming regularly. 📲 Try free. Go further with Univerbal Pass Download to start practicing and see real progress. Try the free AI tutor to get started, then upgrade to Univerbal Pass for unlimited conversations and faster results. ✨ 📩 Support Questions or feedback? Email us at help@univerbal.app Privacy Policy: https://www.univerbal.app/privacy-policy Terms of Service: https://www.univerbal.app/terms-of-service ⓘ Disclaimer Univerbal AI Language Tutor is not affiliated with Duolingo, Elsa Speak, Babbel, Talkpal, Langotalk, or Jumpspeak.

title: Airlearn - Language Learning
description:
Airlearn: Learn Spanish, German, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Hindi, English, Turkish, and Russian in one intuitive app. Enjoy short lessons, cultural insights, and fun practice slides that make language learning stress-free and engaging.

OUR APPROACH
• Learn First, Practice Next: We teach key grammar, vocabulary, and cultural context before you dive into quizzes. Gain real understanding instead of guessing.  
• Rich Cultural Insights: Explore history, customs, and local expressions. Language is more than words—Airlearn helps you appreciate its cultural essence.  
• Clean & Minimalist: No overblown gamification or cluttered screens. Lessons stay focused, so you can learn at your own pace without distractions.  
• Weekly Leagues & XP: Motivate yourself by competing with others studying the same language. Earn XP from each lesson and climb the leaderboard for extra fun.

WHY AIRLEARN
• Concise Lessons: Each module covers grammar rules, vocabulary, and examples in bite-sized slides.  
• Practical Dialogues: From casual greetings to deeper conversations, practice relevant situations.  
• Spaced Repetition: Lock new words into long-term memory with our smart revision approach.  
• Track Progress: Daily goals, streaks, and achievements keep your momentum alive.  
• Community Feel: Join like-minded learners, share study tips, and celebrate mutual achievements.

DIVE INTO 12 LANGUAGES
1. Spanish: Vibrant dialogues for travel, work, or fun.  
2. German: Master precise grammar for Europe’s economic hub.  
3. French: Absorb its romantic flair and cultural legacy.  
4. Italian: Savor the melodic flow and culinary charm.  
5. Dutch: Expand career options in a globalized world.  
6. Portuguese: Explore Brazil’s rich diversity or Portugal’s historic roots.  
7. Japanese: Conquer kanji, hiragana, and katakana with confidence.  
8. Korean: Learn Hangeul, K-pop phrases, and daily expressions.  
9. Chinese: Build listening and reading skills in one of the world’s most spoken tongues.  
10. Hindi: Unlock India’s cultural treasure, cinema, and business potential.  
11. English: Hone global communication for travel, work, or personal growth.  
12. Russian: Tackle Cyrillic and immerse in a language of literary tradition.

HOW IT WORKS  
1. Install Airlearn: Begin with the basics or jump into advanced modules anytime.  
2. Learn: Study essential grammar and vocabulary in short, clear lessons.  
3. Practice: Tackle engaging quizzes and drills to reinforce your knowledge.  
4. Compete: Earn XP and measure your progress in our fun Weekly League.  
5. Flourish: Speak, read, and write with newfound fluency and cultural understanding.

WHAT SETS US APART
• Genuine Learning: We prioritize understanding over memorization.  
• All Levels Welcome: From novices to pros, our modules adapt to you.  
• Regular Updates: New lessons and features keep it fresh.  
• Lifestyle Friendly: Learn anytime—during breaks, commutes, or weekends.

GET STARTED FOR FREE
Airlearn transforms language study into an immersive experience. Whether you’re planning a trip, boosting your résumé, or simply curious about global cultures, we’ll guide you step by step. Enjoy short lessons that fit smoothly into your day, gather XP, and watch your language skills skyrocket.

Join thousands of motivated learners worldwide. Download Airlearn now for Spanish, German, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Hindi, English, or Russian. Experience the spark of real progress, gain cultural know-how, and feel the thrill of community-powered learning. Go beyond translations—master languages in a way that truly sticks. With Airlearn, you’ll open doors to new friendships, opportunities, and an expanded worldview. Welcome to your next adventure in language mastery!

title: Mondly: Learn 41 Languages
description:
🌟 Learn 41 Languages with Mondly: Your Passport to Fluency! 🌟
Join millions already using Mondly to make language learning fun and effective. Whether you're learning for travel, work, or personal growth, Mondly makes it easy. Enjoy quick, engaging lessons that help you learn and speak with confidence. With smart technology and immersive content, mastering a new language has never been easier.


Explore 41 languages: Learn Spanish 🇪🇸🇲🇽, English 🇬🇧🇺🇸, French 🇫🇷, German 🇩🇪, Portuguese 🇧🇷🇵🇹, Italian 🇮🇹, Russian 🇷🇺, Korean 🇰🇷, Japanese 🇯🇵, Chinese 🇨🇳, Arabic, Greek 🇬🇷, Romanian 🇷🇴, Vietnamese 🇻🇳, Indonesian 🇮🇩, Hindi 🇮🇳, Hebrew 🇮🇱, Polish 🇵🇱, Bulgarian 🇧🇬, Ukrainian 🇺🇦, Hungarian 🇭🇺, Czech 🇨🇿, Croatian 🇭🇷, Finnish 🇫🇮, Turkish 🇹🇷, Thai 🇹🇭, Dutch 🇳🇱, Danish 🇩🇰, Swedish 🇸🇪, Norwegian 🇳🇴, Bengali 🇧🇩, Latin, Catalan, Tagalog 🇵🇭, Persian (Farsi), Afrikaans, Urdu 🇵🇰, Slovak 🇸🇰, Latvian 🇱🇻, and Lithuanian 🇱🇹.

🏆Loved by 125 million people worldwide

🚀 Why Choose Mondly for Language Learning? 🚀

Mondly is for all levels—beginner to advanced. Its unique language learning method focuses on real conversations, smart content, and intuitive tech.

🇬🇧 Want to learn English?
With Mondly, you can learn English through fun, effective English courses designed for all levels. Whether you're a beginner or want to be fluent in English, our app helps you improve quickly. Practice daily with bite-sized lessons, realistic conversations, and smart feedback. Start your journey to learn English and be fluent in English—all at your own pace!

✔️ Fun & Effective Learning
Mondly mixes gamified content with real-world use. Each lesson is short, memorable, and helps you learn languages faster.

✔️ Speech Recognition
Practice pronunciation in every lesson. Mondly listens and gives real-time feedback—just like a private language tutor.

✔️ Real-Life Conversations
Lessons mirror everyday conversations. You’ll learn phrases and grammar you can use immediately.

✔️ Smart Adaptive Learning
Everyone learns differently. Mondly adapts your language lessons to fit your learning style and pace.

✔️ Grammar & Vocabulary Tools
Tap a verb for full conjugation. Expand vocabulary with daily exercises and integrated grammar tips that enhance your language learning.

✔️ Immersive Audio Content
100+ dialogues from native speakers let you learn proper pronunciation and natural flow.

✔️ Progress Tracking
Track your progress and see how much you’ve learned with smart stats.

✔️ Social Motivation
Challenge friends or learners worldwide. Stay motivated with global rankings and competitive streaks.

🌟 App Highlights – What You Get With Mondly 🌟
• Daily language lessons to build confidence
• Weekly quizzes & monthly challenges
• 41 full language courses – 1320 combinations
• 200+ practical lessons (travel, work, family & more)
• 38 vocabulary builders for faster word recall
• 3000+ expert-developed lessons
• 260+ video lessons for advanced English learners
• 30+ Pearson-certified English tests
• 300+ business-focused language lessons
• 100+ native speaker conversations
• Verb conjugations and grammar explanations
• Offline mode for anytime learning
• Hands-free mode to learn on the go
• Designed by experts, powered by AI

✨ Start Learning Today ✨
Whether you’re learning your first language or your fourth, Mondly makes every lesson fun and impactful. Build skills in speaking, listening, reading, and writing through smart, enjoyable language learning.

Download Mondly now and learn the language you’ve always wanted—one exciting lesson at a time!

title: Grammar Check Corrector by AI
description:
Write faster, clearer, and more confidently with Grammar Check Corrector by AI — your go-to writing assistant powered by artificial intelligence. Whether you're composing an email, writing an essay, or posting on social media, this app helps you correct grammar mistakes, paraphrase sentences, and enhance your writing in real time.

Say goodbye to awkward sentences and embarrassing grammar errors. With smart AI technology, you can instantly improve your writing quality and communicate your ideas more effectively — anytime, anywhere.

Key Features:

• Grammar Check: Quickly fix grammar and spelling mistakes with AI-powered precision. Catch typos, grammatical errors, and more before anyone else does.
• Compose: Generate clear, fluent, and well-structured text effortlessly. AI helps you compose messages, emails, or content faster and with better impact.
• Paraphrase: Rewriting sentences while preserving their meaning is ideal for avoiding repetition, improving tone, or making content more engaging.
• Enhance Writing: Make your writing sound more polished, natural, and professional. AI suggestions help improve sentence flow, clarity, and readability.
• AI Keyboard Integration: Use the built-in AI keyboard to get real-time grammar correction, paraphrasing, and suggestions while typing in any app — email, chat, social, or notes.

Why Choose Grammar Check Corrector by AI?

• Powered by advanced AI technology
• Lightweight and easy to use
• Instant grammar correction and rewriting
• Works in any app with the AI keyboard
• Helps you learn and grow as a better writer
• Forget switching between grammar apps and typing tools — now everything is built right into your keyboard.

Go Premium to Unlock All Features

Upgrade to Premium and unlock everything: advanced grammar check, full access to the AI keyboard, unlimited composing and paraphrasing. Enjoy seamless writing support with no limits. Perfect for users who want to write smarter, faster, and better — anytime, anywhere.

Download Grammar Check Corrector by AI today and write like a pro with AI-powered assistance!

title: Learn Japanese: HeyJapan
description: Want to learn Japanese but overwhelmed by scattered materials and endless memorization? HeyJapan offers a complete, fun, and effective solution for Japanese learning, making it easier than ever to study Japanese every day. 4 main courses in HeyJapan - Basic (225 lessons): Start with hiragana, katakana, essential grammar, and beginner kanji vocabulary - Anime (93 lessons): Enjoy learning Japanese through anime with the unique voice-dubbing feature. Step into the characters, practice pronunciation, and improve natural speaking - Travel (57 lessons): Perfect for your next Japan travel adventure, covering real-life phrases, conversations, and survival vocabulary - Interview (27 lessons): Prepare for job interviews, study abroad, and professional communication Key features - Memorize kanji easily with flashcards, supported by images and audio for long-term retention - Expand your Japanese vocabulary by topic: anime, travel, work, daily life, and more - Fun Japanese games and mini challenges that make learning enjoyable - Clear, detailed grammar explanations for easy application - Short, focused lessons – just 15 minutes a day Why HeyJapan is your trusted companion - Over 400+ lessons from beginner to advanced, covering hiragana, kanji flashcards, grammar, and communication - Unique anime-based course – turn your passion into a learning tool - Specialized content for Japan travel and interviews to meet every learning goal - Full support for JLPT preparation, study, work, and cultural exchange With HeyJapan, you don’t just study a language – you explore Japanese culture and real-life communication. Whether your goal is to pass JLPT, prepare for Japan travel, or simply enjoy anime, HeyJapan has a learning path for you. 📩 We’re always ready to support you and value your feedback. Our mission is to deliver the best Japanese learning experience, but mistakes can happen. Please share your thoughts to help us improve HeyJapan.Contact us at: heyjapan@eupgroup.net

title: Beelinguapp Language Learning
description:
Beelinguapp is the bilingual education app that makes language learning fun and effective. Whether you want to learn English, practice Spanish language learning, discover ingles stories, or explore new languages like Japanese, French, or Dutch, Beelinguapp helps you improve reading, listening, and comprehension with side-by-side bilingual texts and audiobooks.

Learn Spanish, Explore Bilingual Books, and Master Language Learning

Read in Spanish to improve your vocabulary skills. Key Features: • Bilingual Books for All Levels: From beginners to experts, find stories tailored to your skill level and interests. • Audiobooks for Language Learning: Listen to authentic pronunciation and train your ears with our native narrators. • Karaoke-Style Scrolling Text: Follow along with synchronized text for bilingual language learning. • Wide Variety of bilingual books: Enjoy classics like Snow White and Sherlock Holmes, cultural guides, daily news articles, and children's books with illustrations. • Quizzes to Test Your Knowledge: Reinforce your language learning with quizzes at the end of each story. Why Choose Beelinguapp? Beelinguapp keeps learners engaged through bilingual education. Whether you want to learn Spanish to English or English to Spanish, or explore other languages like French, German, or Japanese, Beelinguapp has a unique method that makes language learning easy and effective. Learn English with stories: Improve vocabulary and comprehension while reading side-by-side bilingual texts. From classic novels to modern news, Beelinguapp is the perfect app to learn English. Language learning made simple with Spanish Dictionary : Practice English to Spanish with audiobooks and bilingual books. Enjoy cultural narratives, children’s tales, and everyday articles to learn Spanish. Tap a word to see its meaning in the Spanish dictionary. Explore other languages: Discover ingles, French, Japanese, Dutch, Chinese and many more with bilingual education methods that make it easy to learn. Download Beelinguapp and explore a new way of learning languages. Read and listen to your favorite books while improving your language skills for free! Beelinguapp is the perfect choice to learn Spanish. Our innovative method allows you to read in Spanish while referencing your native language, making it easier to grasp and retain new vocabulary and phrases. Whether you're just beginning your Spanish learning journey or you're an advanced learner looking to polish your skills, If you want to learn Spanish, Beelinguapp offers a wide array of captivating stories and audiobooks to fully immerse you in the Spanish language. Looking for an efficient way to learn English? Beelinguapp simplifies the process. With our bilingual books, you can read and listen to stories in English while referencing your native language. This method helps you understand new vocabulary and phrases. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, You are looking for another language? • Learn Spanish • Learn French • Learn English • Learn Japanese • Learn German • Learn Korean • Learn Italian • Learn Russian • Learn Chinese • Learn Arabic • Learn Portuguese • Learn Swedish • Learn Turkish • Learn Hindi • Learn Polish • Learn Dutch • Learn Indonesian • Learn Greek • Learn Norwegian • Learn Finnish • Learn Ukrainian • Learn Vietnamese • Learn Filipino • Learn ingles

title: LingoDeer - Learn Languages
description:
Want to learn a new language, such as Japanese, French, Spanish or Korean on your own? Give LingoDeer a try!

Available courses for English speakers:
Korean, Japanese, Mandarin Chinese, Arabic, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Malay, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Spanish (Latin American or European), Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese.

What can LingoDeer do for you?
※ Learn to read and write a language with a unique alphabet system, such as Korean or Japanese 
※ Learn to form sentences in your own words by following a structured course
※ Learn the essential vocabulary and grammar from beginner to intermediate levels (A1-B1)
※ Improve listening and improve pronunciation with HD recordings by native speakers 
※ Reinforce learning with various review activities: flashcards, quizzes, target trainings and more
※ Track your progress and statistics
※ Download lessons to learn offline

What makes LingoDeer different? Its teaching power. 

Instead of relying on users to figure things out, LingoDeer offers a structured, clear and motivating path toward fluency. 

By providing the best structured curricula among apps and clear explanations on grammar, LingoDeer enables users to form sentences in their own words, not just memorize and repeat after a phrasebook.

As a result, users gain a clear sense of progression through following this path and are able to maintain long-term motivation. 

What’s more, the variety of activities supported in LingoDeer gives users the flexibility to personalize their study. From speaking exercises about food allergies, to drilling words with flashcards or 5-min pop quizzes during lunch breaks, let LingoDeer surprise you with every session.

If you don’t know where to start with learning a new language, start with LingoDeer. 

PLEASE NOTE: 
You will need a LingoDeer membership in order to access all courses and features. 

Support: 
Found a bug? Let us know and help us make LingoDeer better!
Email: hi@lingodeer.com 
https://m.me/lingodeer
